Mkusanyiko huu wa mate huwa mkubwa endapo tezi hizo zilichochewa na ladha tamu au chungu kabla ya kulala, hivyo shinikizo dogo tu la ulimi linatosha kuzindua mtiririko unaoweza kufika mpaka miguu kadhaa mbele yako [2]. Document ID: 2
Title: Why We Accidentally Spray Saliva When We Yawn (brightside.me)
Content: Gleeking happens when a large amount of saliva builds up in your mouth below your tongue: for example, if you’ve eaten something sour or bitter. Saliva is secreted by the major salivary glands. If you look in the mirror while raising your tongue, you can see the ducts that deliver saliva from the glands to the mouth.


Gleeking is achieved by compressing these ducts with muscles in the base of the mouth when you move your tongue upward. If your mouth is wide open the stream can be launched several feet.

Content: Mimi hutoka chini ya ulimi. Gleeking ni makadirio ya mshono kutoka kwa tezi ndogo ndogo juu ya compression na ulimi. Kwa ujumla, gleeking hufanyika wakati mkusanyiko wa mshono kwenye tezi ndogo hutolewa nje katika mkondo wakati tezi inasisitizwa na ulimi. Mtiririko wa mshono hutolewa katika mwelekeo wa jumla wa mbele ya mdomo. Ikiwa mdomo umefunguliwa ndege inaweza kupanga miguu kadhaa. Gleeking inawezekana zaidi wakati tezi ya mate imechochewa hivi karibuni, lakini hata mabaki ya mshono kwenye tezi yanaweza kutolewa na Gleeking. Gleeking inaweza kutokea mara moja kwa sababu ya shinikizo la lugha ya bahati mbaya kwenye tezi ndogo wakati wa kuzungumza, kula, kuamka, au kusafisha meno.

question_src: Baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, ni mabadiliko gani ambayo Ujerumani ilifanya kwa mfumo wake mwenyewe wa kisiasa ili kuhakikisha kuwa takwimu za dikteta haziwezi kuchukua madaraka tena?
report_src: Baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya Pili, Ujerumani iliunda mfumo mpya wa kikatiba: kufikia 1949 eneo la magharibi liliunda Jamhuri ya Shirikisho la Ujerumani na “kuchukua mfano wa demokrasia ya Magharibi,” hatua iliyoanzisha katiba, vyama vingi na chaguzi za mara kwa mara ili kuzuia mtu mmoja kujilimbikizia mamlaka [1]. Mwelekeo huu uliimarishwa mashariki, ambako uchaguzi wa kwanza huru ulifanywa 18 Machi 1990 na ukabadilisha serikali ya kikomunisti kuwa ile iliyochaguliwa kidemokrasia, hivyo kuthibitisha kwamba mamlaka yatokane na wananchi, si dikteta [2]. Kisha Ujerumani Mashariki ilijiunga rasmi na katiba ya Jamhuri ya Shirikisho kupitia Kifungu 23 cha Grundgesetz, na Mkataba wa Umoja wa 30 Agosti 1990 uliidhinisha kisheria marekebisho ya msingi ya katiba, jambo lililopanua na kudumisha utaratibu wa kikatiba unaotenganisha madaraka kote nchini na hivyo kufunga njia kwa udikteta wowote ujao [3].

Title: How Was Germany Divided After World War II? | Synonym (classroom.synonym.com)
Content: The country was divided into four separate zones, each to be governed by one of the Allied Powers and France. The goal was to treat Germany as a single economic zone, but trade issues necessitated that the Western and Eastern zones of the country be considered separately.


By 1949, the Western half of Germany, also known as the Federal Republic of Germany, had taken on the model of a Western democracy, while the Soviet-controlled Eastern side was a socialist state.

Document ID: 2
Title: Historia ya Ujerumani (1945-1990) (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: Waziri Mkuu Hans Modrow aliongoza serikali ya walezi ambayo ilishiriki madaraka na vyama vipya, vilivyoelekezwa kidemokrasia. Mnamo Desemba 7, 1989, makubaliano yalifikiwa kufanya uchaguzi wa bure mnamo Mei 1990 na kuandika tena Katiba ya Ujerumani Mashariki. Mnamo Januari 28, vyama vyote vilikubaliana kuendeleza uchaguzi hadi 18 Machi, haswa kwa sababu ya mmomonyoko wa mamlaka ya serikali na kwa sababu safari ya Ujerumani Mashariki ilikuwa ikiendelea; Zaidi ya 117,000 zilizobaki mnamo Januari na Februari 1990.


Mwanzoni mwa Februari 1990, pendekezo la serikali ya Modrow kwa hali ya umoja, hali ya Ujerumani ilikataliwa na Chancellor Kohl, ambaye alithibitisha kwamba Ujerumani iliyounganika lazima iwe mwanachama wa NATO. Mwishowe, mnamo Machi 18, uchaguzi wa kwanza wa bure ulifanyika huko Ujerumani Mashariki, na serikali iliyoongozwa na Lothar de Maizière (CDU) iliundwa chini ya sera ya umoja wa haraka na Ujerumani Magharibi. Wawakilishi waliochaguliwa kwa uhuru wa Volkskammer walifanya kikao chao cha kwanza mnamo tarehe 5 Aprili, na Ujerumani Mashariki ilibadilika kwa amani kutoka kwa kikomunisti hadi serikali iliyochaguliwa kidemokrasia.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Historia ya Ujerumani (1945-1990) (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: Hitimisho la makazi ya mwisho kulisafisha njia ya umoja wa Mashariki ya Mashariki na Magharibi mwa Ujerumani. Jumuiya rasmi ya kisiasa ilitokea mnamo Oktoba 3, 1990, iliyotanguliwa na GDR ikitangaza kuingia kwake kwa Jamhuri ya Shirikisho kupitia Kifungu cha 23 cha sheria ya msingi ya Ujerumani Magharibi (ikimaanisha kuwa kikatiba, Ujerumani Mashariki ilipewa Ujerumani Magharibi); lakini waliathiriwa katika uhalali madhubuti kupitia Mkataba wa baadaye wa Umoja wa 30 Agosti 1990, ambao ulipigiwa kura katika kanuni zao na Bundestag ya Ujerumani Magharibi na Volkskammer ya Ujerumani Mashariki mnamo 20 Septemba 1990. Kufikia 1949, nusu ya magharibi ya Ujerumani, pia inajulikana kama Jamhuri ya Shirikisho la Ujerumani, ilikuwa imechukua mfano wa demokrasia ya Magharibi, wakati upande wa mashariki uliodhibitiwa na Soviet ulikuwa serikali ya ujamaa.

Document ID: 2
Title: History of Germany (1945–1990) (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: Prime Minister Hans Modrow headed a caretaker government which shared power with the new, democratically oriented parties. On 7 December 1989, an agreement was reached to hold free elections in May 1990 and rewrite the East German constitution. On 28 January, all the parties agreed to advance the elections to 18 March, primarily because of an erosion of state authority and because the East German exodus was continuing apace; more than 117,000 left in January and February 1990.


In early February 1990, the Modrow government's proposal for a unified, neutral German state was rejected by Chancellor Kohl, who affirmed that a unified Germany must be a member of NATO. Finally, on 18 March, the first free elections were held in East Germany, and a government led by Lothar de Maizière (CDU) was formed under a policy of expeditious unification with West Germany. The freely elected representatives of the Volkskammer held their first session on 5 April, and East Germany peacefully evolved from a communist to a democratically elected government.

Kwa kweli, watu ambao hawatawahi kununua dhahabu kwa matumizi ya kila siku watanunua dhahabu kwa sherehe za kidini. Tamasha moja haswa, Dushera, linaonyeshwa na ununuzi wa dhahabu yenyewe.

Sehemu ya kwanini ujanja unaendelea kutokea ni kwa sababu ya ukosefu wa usimamizi. Kanuni za serikali ya India ya kuangalia mizigo na kufuata wasafiri wanaoshuku sio kamili kama inavyohitaji kuwa.


Kwa muda mrefu kama wasafiri wana uwezo wa kuweka dhahabu kwenye ndege na kuifanya iwe kwenye mpaka kutakuwa na suala.

question_src: Je! Ni nini hatua ya karanga?
report_src: Hatua kuu ya “Karanga” (Peanuts) ni kutumia visa vidogo vya kila siku vya watoto ili kuangazia hali halisi ya utu—mchanganyiko wa furaha, upole na kukatishwa tamaa—na hivyo kuwafanya wasomaji wajiulize maswali makubwa ya kimaadili na kifalsafa kuhusu jinsi ya kuishi na kubaki wanadamu wema katika ulimwengu mgumu [1]. Kupitia ucheshi unaoonekana mwepesi, Charles Schulz aliwasilisha “ukweli usiofurahi juu ya upweke wa uwepo wa kijamii,” akionyesha kwamba hata kivuli cha kitoto kinaweza kubeba uzito mkubwa wa kihisia na kiakili [3]. Schulz mwenyewe hakujiita msanii mkuu, lakini aliamini sanaa ya kweli huishi muda mrefu na kuendelea kuibua tafakari baada ya kifo cha msanii; hivyo, kwa “matukio yake madogo,” aliwapa watoto na watu wazima nafasi ya kutafakari masuala makubwa ya maisha bila woga [2]. Kwa kifupi, “Karanga” ni kioo cha utu kinachochanganya ucheshi na huzuni ili kuhamasisha huruma, uelewa na fikra za kina juu ya upweke, urafiki na maadili.

question_src: Je! Ni nini juu ya gesi chafu zinazowafanya gesi chafu?
report_src: Gesi chafu hutofautiana na nitrojeni na oksijeni kwa sababu molekuli zao zina uwezo wa kunyonya mionzi ya infrared (IR) inayorudishwa na uso wa Dunia, badala ya kuiacha ipite moja kwa moja angani [2]. Uwezo huu unatokana na muundo wa molekuli unaoruhusu vifungo kuinama na kutetemeka wanapoguswa na IR, hivyo kufyonza nishati na kuihifadhi kama joto [4]. Baada ya kunyonya, molekuli hupata nishati ya kinetic na kuihamishia kwa gesi zingine, na kuongeza halijoto ya jumla ya anga [4]. Dioksidi kaboni, kwa mfano, hufyonza sana katika wimbo wa 15 μm na hudumu kwa muda mrefu hewani, hivyo kuwa mchango mkubwa wa athari ya chafu [1]. Mvuke wa maji na CO₂ hufyonza wigo mpana wa 4–80 μm (isipokuwa dirisha la 8–12 μm), ilhali ozoni hufyonza zaidi katika 9–10 μm, na zote hupunguza upitishaji huru wa mionzi ya joto kurudi angani [3]. Tabia hii ya kunasa na kutawanya mionzi ya infrared ndiyo inayowapa jina na jukumu lao katika kuongezeka kwa joto duniani [2].

Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Uchunguzi wa Sayansi ya Hali ya Hewa Florida Kusini (www.ces.fau.edu)
Content: Dioksidi kaboni (CO2) pia ni gesi muhimu ya chafu. Inayo maisha marefu katika anga ya Dunia. Dioksidi kaboni huchukua nguvu sana na wimbi la 15 μm (micrometer). Hii inafanya kaboni dioksidi kuwa ya kunyonya nzuri ya miinuko inayoanguka katika mkoa wa mionzi ya infrared ya wigo.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Climate Science Investigations South Florida (www.ces.fau.edu)
Content: You have already learned that Earth's atmosphere is composed primarily of nitrogen and oxygen. These gases are transparent to incoming solar radiation. They are also transparent to outgoing infrared radiation, which means that they do not absorb or emit solar or infrared radiation. However, there are other gases in Earth's atmosphere that do absorb infrared radiation. These gases are known as greenhouse gases. Below are the most important greenhouse gases that influence Earth's climate system.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Uchunguzi wa Sayansi ya Hali ya Hewa Florida Kusini (www.ces.fau.edu)
Content: Uboreshaji mzuri wa mionzi ya infrared ina wasifu mpana wa kunyonya, ambayo inamaanisha kuwa inaweza kuchukua wigo mpana wa mawimbi. Mvuke wa maji na dioksidi kaboni inaweza kuchukua mionzi ya mionzi katika safu ya 4 μM hadi 80 μM, isipokuwa zile kati ya 8 μM na 12 μM. Ozone inaweza kuchukua miinuko kati ya 9 μM na 10 μM, lakini kama umejifunza, hupatikana kwa viwango vya chini. Mchanganyiko wa jua wa jua huingizwa sana na ozoni kwenye stratosphere.

Title: Gesi za chafu (kemia.elmhurst.edu)
Content: Gesi zingine katika anga zina mali ya kunyonya mionzi ya infrared. Oksijeni na nitrojeni gesi kuu katika anga hazina mali hii. Mionzi ya infrared hupiga molekuli kama vile kaboni dioksidi na husababisha vifungo kuinama na kutetemeka - hii inaitwa kunyonya kwa nishati ya IR. Molekuli hupata nishati ya kinetic na ngozi hii ya mionzi ya IR. Nishati hii ya ziada ya kinetic inaweza kupitishwa kwa molekuli zingine kama vile oksijeni na nitrojeni na husababisha joto la jumla la anga. Analogy: Fikiria sehemu ya "toy slinky" - ikiwa utapunguza laini, nishati ya bonge huingizwa na vibrations kwenye laini.

The infrared radiation strikes a molecule such as carbon dioxide and causes the bonds to bend and vibrate - this is called the absorption of IR energy. The molecule gains kinetic energy by this absorption of IR radiation. This extra kinetic energy may then be transmitted to other molecules such as oxygen and nitrogen and causes a general heating of the atmosphere. Ozone inaweza kuchukua miinuko kati ya 9 μM na 10 μM, lakini kama umejifunza, hupatikana kwa viwango vya chini. Mchanganyiko wa jua wa jua huingizwa sana na ozoni kwenye stratosphere.

Document ID: 4
Title: Gesi za chafu (kemia.elmhurst.edu)
Content: Gesi zingine katika anga zina mali ya kunyonya mionzi ya infrared. Oksijeni na nitrojeni gesi kuu katika anga hazina mali hii. Mionzi ya infrared hupiga molekuli kama vile kaboni dioksidi na husababisha vifungo kuinama na kutetemeka - hii inaitwa kunyonya kwa nishati ya IR. Molekuli hupata nishati ya kinetic na ngozi hii ya mionzi ya IR. Nishati hii ya ziada ya kinetic inaweza kupitishwa kwa molekuli zingine kama vile oksijeni na nitrojeni na husababisha joto la jumla la anga. Analogy: Fikiria sehemu ya "toy slinky" - ikiwa utapunguza laini, nishati ya bonge huingizwa na vibrations kwenye laini.

claim: Aina za jibini hutofautiana kwa sababu ya chanzo cha maziwa, viumbe hai (ukungu au bakteria) wanaoongezwa na muda wa kukomaa
question_src: Je! Aina tofauti za jibini hufanywaje?
report_src: Aina za jibini hutofautiana kwa sababu ya chanzo cha maziwa, viumbe hai (ukungu au bakteria) wanaoongezwa na muda wa kukomaa [1]. Maziwa ya ng’ombe hutumika zaidi, lakini maziwa ya mbuzi au kondoo—ambayo huathiriwa na aina ya mnyama, msimu na lishe—hutoa ladha na muundo tofauti wa jibini [2]. Kwa jibini laini linaloiva juu kama Brie na Camembert, ukungu hupakwa kwenye uso na hutoa vimeng’enya vinavyovunja protini za curd wakati wa kukomaa, hivyo kulainisha kiini na kutoa ladha ya kipekee [3]. Jibini ngumu, kinyume chake, hupitia kukata curd ndogo, kupasha moto na kubanwa ili kuondoa unyevu mwingi na kulifanya liwe na muundo thabiti na maisha marefu ya rafu [4]. Kundi la jibini ngumu la “Uswizi” hutumia starter za bakteria za thermophilic zinazostahimili joto, ambazo baadaye huzalisha gesi na kutengeneza mashimo maarufu pamoja na ladha tamu kali [4]. Baada ya kutengenezwa, jibini hukomaa kwenye mazingira yaliyodhibitiwa; kadiri kukomaa kunavyoongezeka—kuanzia siku chache hadi zaidi ya miaka miwili—vijidudu na vimeng’enya huvunja casein, kupunguza unyevu, kutia ukali wa ladha na kuimarisha umbile [5].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Creating different cheese characteristics (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: There’s no single method of classifying cheese, and a number of criteria can be used such as length of ageing, texture and region of origin. However, key differences in cheese characteristics can generally be attributed to:

 * the origin of the milk * * specific moulds and bacteria added * varying lengths of ageing
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Kuunda sifa tofauti za jibini (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: Wakati maziwa yote yameundwa na vitu sawa vya msingi, muundo wake unatofautiana kulingana na:

 * Aina na kuzaliana kwa wanyama * Msimu na eneo la jiografia * Afya na lishe ya mnyama.

Wakati jibini nyingi hufanywa kwa kutumia maziwa ya ng'ombe, maziwa kutoka kwa wanyama wengine, haswa mbuzi na kondoo, pia hutumiwa
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Kuunda sifa tofauti za jibini (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: Jibini laini, iliyoiva kama vile Camembert na Brie imeongezwa kwa uso, ambayo hutoa enzyme ya kuchimba protini. Enzyme huvunja curd wakati wa kucha, na kuunda muundo wa laini na kukuza ladha ya tabia
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Kuunda sifa tofauti za jibini (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: Jibini ngumu hupitia usindikaji ngumu zaidi, na kuna vikundi viwili kuu:

 * Wale walio na microbiota rahisi iliyotengenezwa kwa kutumia waanzishaji wa mesophilic. * Aina za jibini za Uswizi zilizotengenezwa kwa kutumia bakteria ya Starter ya thermophilic, ambayo inaweza kuhimili joto la juu la usindikaji. Ukuaji wa baadaye wa bakteria zinazozalisha asidi wakati wa kukomaa huchangia ladha ya jibini hizi na pia huunda mashimo ya gesi au 'macho'.

Hatua za usindikaji ambazo husaidia kuondoa unyevu ni pamoja na:

 * Kukata na kuchochea curds - Kukata laini kunatoa unyevu zaidi * Inapokanzwa husaidia kunyoa curds na kuondoa Whey zaidi * kubonyeza jibini la mwisho - shinikizo tofauti na wakati huathiri kiwango cha Whey iliyotolewa
---
Document ID: 5
Title: Kuunda sifa tofauti za jibini (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: Jibini iliyotengenezwa upya kawaida huwa na chumvi na bland kabisa, kwani ni kipindi cha kuzeeka au cha kukomaa ambacho husaidia kukuza ladha. Kama umri wa jibini, vijidudu na enzymes huvunja protini za kesi, kubadilisha muundo na kuongeza ladha ya jibini.

Hali ya kukomaa inadhibitiwa kwa uangalifu na joto tofauti na viwango vya unyevu vinavyoathiri kiwango cha kukomaa, upotezaji wa unyevu na malezi ya kutu.

Kipindi cha kukomaa kinaweza kuwa chochote kutoka siku kadhaa hadi miaka 2 au zaidi. Kadiri kipindi cha kucha kinapoongezeka, jibini hupoteza unyevu zaidi, huendeleza ladha yenye nguvu na inakuwa ngumu na zaidi katika muundo

Title: Creating different cheese characteristics (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: Harder cheeses undergo more complex processing, and there are two main groups:

 * Those with a simple microbiota made using mesophilic starters. * Swiss cheese varieties made using thermophilic starter bacteria, which can withstand higher processing temperatures. Subsequent growth of propionic acid-producing bacteria during ripening contributes to the flavour of these cheeses and also creates characteristic gas holes or ‘eyes’.

Processing steps that help remove moisture include:

 * cutting and stirring the curds – a finer cut releases more moisture * heating helps shrink the curds and remove more whey * pressing the final cheese – varying pressure and time affect the amount of whey released

Document ID: 5
Title: Creating different cheese characteristics (www.sciencelearn.org.nz)
Content: Freshly made cheese usually tastes salty and quite bland, as it is the ageing or ripening period that helps develop flavour. As cheese ages, microbes and enzymes break down the casein proteins, changing the texture and intensifying the flavour of the cheese.

Ripening conditions are carefully controlled with different temperatures and humidity levels affecting the rate of ripening, loss of moisture and rind formation.

The ripening period can be anything from several days to 2 or more years. As the ripening period increases, the cheese loses more moisture, develops a stronger flavour and becomes harder and more crumbly in texture

question_src: Fafanua: "Msamaha wa Mikopo ya Shirikisho" kwa Mikopo ya Wanafunzi
report_src: “Msamaha wa Mikopo ya Shirikisho” kwa mikopo ya wanafunzi ni utaratibu wa kisheria unaoruhusu deni la mkopo wa wanafunzi lililodhaminiwa na serikali kufutwa kabisa au kwa sehemu pale mkopaji anapotimiza vigezo maalum vinavyowekwa na Idara ya Elimu ya Marekani. Mfano maarufu ni Public Service Loan Forgiveness, ambapo mkopaji aliyeajiriwa kwa muda wote katika shirika la utumishi wa umma au anayehudumu kwa muda wote kupitia AmeriCorps au Peace Corps anaweza kufutiwa mkopo wa moja kwa moja baada ya kufanya malipo 120 yanayostahili chini ya mpango sahihi wa ulipaji [1]. Kwa upande mwingine, sheria ya Borrower Defense to Repayment inaruhusu msamaha kamili wa mizani ya mkopo endapo chuo kikuu kinachohusika kimefungwa au kimejihusisha na udanganyifu au shughuli haramu, na utawala wa Biden umefanya taratibu hizi kuwa rahisi zaidi kwa wakopaji kupata msamaha [2]. Vilevile, mapendekezo ya sera yanaweza kupanua ufutaji wa deni, kama vile pendekezo la kufuta deni lote kwa wakopaji milioni 14.8 wenye chini ya $10,000 ikiwa litapitishwa na Congress [6].

Mfano maarufu ni Public Service Loan Forgiveness, ambapo mkopaji aliyeajiriwa kwa muda wote katika shirika la utumishi wa umma au anayehudumu kwa muda wote kupitia AmeriCorps au Peace Corps anaweza kufutiwa mkopo wa moja kwa moja baada ya kufanya malipo 120 yanayostahili chini ya mpango sahihi wa ulipaji [1]. claim: Kiini cha harakati kilikuwa hasira dhidi ya serikali, waliyoiona kama mzizi wa vita, chuki na uchoyo uliotawala barabarani, hivyo wakakataa wazo kwamba vita ni suluhisho la matatizo ya taifa
question_src: Je! Harakati ya hippy ilikuwa nini, ilianzaje, na kwa nini?
report_src: Harakati ya hippy ilikuwa mwamko wa kitamaduni ulioongozwa na vijana weupe wa tabaka la kati, wengi wao wanafunzi wa vyuo vikuu, waliokataa maadili ya matumizi na vikwazo vya kijamii vya wazazi wao, wakipigania maisha rahisi yanayotegemea rasilimali za Dunia, upendo na uhuru [1]. Ilianza katikati ya miaka ya 1960 huku mvutano na uchoyo uliochochewa na Vita ya Vietnam ukiongezeka, jambo lililowasukuma vijana hawa kuongoza juhudi za kuibadilisha Marekani [1]. Kiini cha harakati kilikuwa hasira dhidi ya serikali, waliyoiona kama mzizi wa vita, chuki na uchoyo uliotawala barabarani, hivyo wakakataa wazo kwamba vita ni suluhisho la matatizo ya taifa [1]. Ili kufikisha ujumbe, hippies waliandaa maandamano, kukaa-ins, migomo na mabango ya amani na umoja katika miji mbalimbali, wakidai serikali iwarejeshe askari wa Marekani kutoka Vietnam na ibadilishe sera zake za kivita [2]. Kwa jumla, harakati hii ililenga kujitambua, kukuza amani na kupinga utamaduni wa uchoyo na vurugu uliokuwa umetanda nchini.
all_claims: Harakati ya hippy ilikuwa mwamko wa kitamaduni ulioongozwa na vijana weupe wa tabaka la kati, wengi wao wanafunzi wa vyuo vikuu, waliokataa maadili ya matumizi na vikwazo vya kijamii vya wazazi wao, wakipigania maisha rahisi yanayotegemea rasilimali za Dunia, upendo na uhuru [1].

Ili kufikisha ujumbe, hippies waliandaa maandamano, kukaa-ins, migomo na mabango ya amani na umoja katika miji mbalimbali, wakidai serikali iwarejeshe askari wa Marekani kutoka Vietnam na ibadilishe sera zake za kivita [2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: The Hippie Movement – Urban Studies 101 (understandingtheurban.qwriting.qc.cuny.edu)
Content: Hippies were the white, typically middle-class teenagers and college students of the baby boom generation. They were tired of the molds they were forced to fit and the restrictions placed upon them by their parents. Hippies were known to refuse spending any sort of money or earning anything. They believed in more wholesome living and doing what they could with what Earth has to offer.

Much of the hippie movement came about as a result of the Vietnam War. The people of the U.S. were constantly paranoid and developed a sort of greed that came along with the anger of this war. Tensions among Americans built, and these white, middle-class youngsters lead the way to change it. The hippie movement was all about finding oneself and rejecting the need to conform to what society expects of us all. It was also about fighting peacefully against war and violence. Hippies believed that the government was the root of all the country’s problems as well as greed and hatred that ran rampant in the streets. The goal was to get the country to see that war is not the answer to its problems, but rather peace, love, and freedom
---

Title: Harakati ya Hippie - Mafunzo ya Mjini 101 (KuelewaTheurban.qwriting.qc.cuny.edu)

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Harakati ya Hippie - Mafunzo ya Mjini 101 (KuelewaTheurban.qwriting.qc.cuny.edu)
Content: Hippies walikuwa wazungu, kawaida vijana wa kiwango cha kati na wanafunzi wa vyuo vikuu vya kizazi cha watoto. Walikuwa wamechoka na ukungu walilazimishwa kutoshea na vizuizi vilivyowekwa juu yao na wazazi wao. Hippies walijulikana kukataa kutumia aina yoyote ya pesa au kupata chochote. Waliamini katika kuishi bora na kufanya kile walichoweza na kile Dunia kinapaswa kutoa.

Harakati kubwa ya hippie ilitokea kama matokeo ya Vita vya Vietnam. Watu wa Merika walikuwa wakijishughulisha kila wakati na wakaendeleza aina ya uchoyo ambayo ilikuja na hasira ya vita hii. Mvutano kati ya Wamarekani kujengwa, na vijana hawa weupe, wa kiwango cha kati huongoza njia ya kuibadilisha. Harakati ya hippie ilikuwa juu ya kujikuta na kukataa hitaji la kuendana na kile jamii inatarajia sisi sote. Ilikuwa pia juu ya kupigania amani dhidi ya vita na vurugu. Hippies aliamini kuwa serikali ndio mzizi wa shida zote za nchi na uchoyo na chuki ambayo ilienea barabarani. Kusudi lilikuwa kuifanya nchi kuona kwamba vita sio jibu la shida zake, lakini badala ya amani, upendo, na uhuru
---
Document ID: 2
Title: The Hippie Movement – Urban Studies 101 (understandingtheurban.qwriting.qc.cuny.edu)

report_src: Hoja kwamba wahamiaji wasiorasmi wanaorudi Mexico “huongeza” mishahara huko hutegemea tafiti za ndani zinazoangalia mabadiliko makubwa ya idadi ya wafanyakazi katika masoko madogo ya kazi, ilhali watetezi wa uhamiaji nchini Marekani hutumia mbinu tofauti ambazo huonyesha athari ndogo sana kwa mishahara ya wazawa. Uchunguzi wa Marekani mara nyingi hutumia “mbinu ya kitaifa ya ustadi,” inayolinganishwa na seli za elimu-uzoefu kote nchi nzima, na matokeo yake huonyesha mabadiliko madogo ya ujira kwa sababu wahamiaji husambazwa kwenye sekta na majimbo mengi [1]. Ripoti ya Academies ya Taifa pia haikupata ushahidi thabiti wa athari mbaya kwa viwango vya jumla vya ajira au mishahara ya wafanyakazi wa asili, ikihakikisha msimamo wa watetezi wa uhamiaji mwepesi [3]. Kinyume chake, tafiti za Mexico huelekea kutumia mbinu ya “anga safi” — kuchunguza majimbo maalum yanayopokea au kupoteza wahamiaji — ambapo mshtuko wa ghafla wa nguvu kazi unaweza kupandisha bei ya ajira kwa urahisi kwa sababu soko ni dogo na halina uingizaji mkubwa wa wafanyakazi mbadala [1]. Hivyo, tofauti kati ya masoko ya kazi (kubwa dhidi ya ndogo) na mbinu ya uchambuzi, si kutokuelewana kuhusu nadharia, ndicho chanzo cha mitazamo kinzani juu ya kama uhamiaji “hubana” au “hupandisha” mishahara.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Does Immigration Reduce Wages? (www.cato.org)
Content: One reason for the substantial disagreement about the effects of immigration on wages is that there are several different empirical methods that economists use to study the wage relationship even though there is a relatively uniform theory (Altonji and Card 1991). Each empirical method uses a different way of measuring variation in the quantity of immigrants to generate wage estimates. Dustmann, Schonberg, and Stuhler (2016) summarize the three major methods as (1) the national skill-cell approach, (2) the pure spatial approach, and (3) a mixed approach. The national skill-cell approach uses variation in the entry of immigrants to different education-experience groups within the national population. The pure spatial approach uses variation in the immigrant flow across cities or regions. The mixed approach uses variation in immigration inflows across both education groups and regions.
---

claim: Binadamu wanaaminika kuanza kuondoa nywele takriban miaka 100,000 KK, wakiwa wanang’oa nywele moja-moja au kutumia vipande vya mwamba mkali kabla ya kugundua kwamba mawe ya flint yaliyokolea yanaweza kukata nywele haraka zaidi karibu miaka 70,000 baadaye
question_src: Kwa nini wanadamu walianza kunyoa?
report_src: Binadamu wanaaminika kuanza kuondoa nywele takriban miaka 100,000 KK, wakiwa wanang’oa nywele moja-moja au kutumia vipande vya mwamba mkali kabla ya kugundua kwamba mawe ya flint yaliyokolea yanaweza kukata nywele haraka zaidi karibu miaka 70,000 baadaye [1]. Sababu kuu zilikuwa za kiafya na kimazingira: nywele nyingi za mwili ziliunda “makazi” bora kwa chawa na wadudu wengine, na hata kuongeza hatari ya maambukizo ya kuvu katika maeneo ya moto na yenye unyevunyevu, hivyo kunyoa kulisaidia kupunguza vimelea na magonjwa [1]. Nywele pia zilinasua jasho na bakteria, na hivyo kuongeza harufu mbaya ya mwili ambayo ilichukuliwa kuwa ishara ya uchafu katika jamii kama ya Wamisri [1]. Kwa Wamisri kunyoa kulibeba pia maana ya kijamii; kadiri desturi ilivyoimarika, kutokuwa na nywele kichwani na mwilini kulionekana kama alama ya usafi na hadhi, kiasi kwamba matajiri waliwaajiri “waendeshaji wa muda wote” kudumisha muonekano huo unaostarehesha katika joto kali la jangwani [2]. Hivyo, msukumo wa awali wa kunyoa ulikuwa afya na mazingira, kisha ukapanuka kuwa ishara ya ustaarabu na tabaka.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: History of shaving: When did men and women start shaving? (www.scienceabc.com)
Content: Although the exact timeline of shaving isn’t clear, most experts and found artifacts suggest that shaving has been around since approximately 100,000 BC, when cavemen would eliminate hair from their body by pulling them out one at a time, even using rocks or shells like tweezers to speed the process. Fast-forward another 70,000 years and early man has recognized the value of sharpened flint, not only good for striking fire, but also for delicately slicing off hair from the body!

[Image: not only do i keep my face smooth but i also built this computer meme]

The real history of shaving, however, doesn’t begin until we reach the Egyptian civilization, where the act of shaving made its real debut on the world stage. Egyptians had a powerful belief that body hair was a sign of uncleanliness, so both men and women engaged in the complete removal of hair from the body—head to toe! In some cases, caustic ingredients like quicklime and arsenic were used in these primitive depilatory creams and shaving lotions. Early razors also appeared around the time, with the rise in metalworking and mining in many areas of the world. The Egyptian relationship to cleanliness and body hair bordered on the obsessive, and the upper classes often bathed multiple times per day. They would shave their heads completely bald, and then design cooling wigs to wear out in public.

The fear of uncleanliness was a real concern, and may have been the early reason for prehistoric man to shave as well. Body hair provides an ideal environment for lice and other unwanted critters, and can also be a breeding ground for fungal infections, particularly in hot or humid weather. Egyptians attempted to eliminate the risk of pests or pathogens by removing any environment where they could thrive! Furthermore, in the hot and humid weather of Egypt, having an excess of body hair led to the much faster development of body odor, another sign of uncleanliness within the rigid Egyptian society.
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: History of shaving: When did men and women start shaving? (www.scienceabc.com)
Content: Although the exact timeline of shaving isn’t clear, most experts and found artifacts suggest that shaving has been around since approximately 100,000 BC, when cavemen would eliminate hair from their body by pulling them out one at a time, even using rocks or shells like tweezers to speed the process. Fast-forward another 70,000 years and early man has recognized the value of sharpened flint, not only good for striking fire, but also for delicately slicing off hair from the body!

[Image: not only do i keep my face smooth but i also built this computer meme]

The real history of shaving, however, doesn’t begin until we reach the Egyptian civilization, where the act of shaving made its real debut on the world stage. Egyptians had a powerful belief that body hair was a sign of uncleanliness, so both men and women engaged in the complete removal of hair from the body—head to toe! In some cases, caustic ingredients like quicklime and arsenic were used in these primitive depilatory creams and shaving lotions. Early razors also appeared around the time, with the rise in metalworking and mining in many areas of the world. The Egyptian relationship to cleanliness and body hair bordered on the obsessive, and the upper classes often bathed multiple times per day. They would shave their heads completely bald, and then design cooling wigs to wear out in public.

The fear of uncleanliness was a real concern, and may have been the early reason for prehistoric man to shave as well. Body hair provides an ideal environment for lice and other unwanted critters, and can also be a breeding ground for fungal infections, particularly in hot or humid weather. Egyptians attempted to eliminate the risk of pests or pathogens by removing any environment where they could thrive! Furthermore, in the hot and humid weather of Egypt, having an excess of body hair led to the much faster development of body odor, another sign of uncleanliness within the rigid Egyptian society.

prompt:

Title: Historia ya kunyoa: Je! Wanaume na wanawake walianza kunyoa lini? (www.scienceabc.com)
Content: Ingawa ratiba halisi ya kunyoa haiko wazi, wataalam wengi na waligundua mabaki yanaonyesha kuwa kunyoa kumekuwa karibu tangu takriban 100,000 KK, wakati watu wa Cavemen wangeondoa nywele kutoka kwa miili yao kwa kuvuta moja kwa wakati, hata kutumia miamba au ganda kama tweezers ili kuharakisha mchakato. Kusonga mbele kwa miaka 70,000 na mtu wa mapema ametambua thamani ya flint iliyoinuliwa, sio nzuri tu kwa moto, lakini pia kwa kukata nywele kutoka kwa mwili!

[Picha: Sio tu mimi kuweka uso wangu laini lakini pia nimeunda meme hii ya kompyuta]

Historia halisi ya kunyoa, hata hivyo, haianza hadi tufikie ustaarabu wa Wamisri, ambapo kitendo cha kunyoa kilifanya kwanza kwenye hatua ya ulimwengu. Wamisri walikuwa na imani ya nguvu kwamba nywele za mwili zilikuwa ishara ya uchafu, kwa hivyo wanaume na wanawake walihusika katika kuondolewa kabisa kwa nywele kutoka kwa mwili - kichwa hadi! Katika hali nyingine, viungo vya caustic kama QuickLime na arseniki vilitumiwa katika mafuta haya ya kwanza ya kupendeza na kunyoa. Razila za mapema pia zilionekana karibu wakati huo, na kuongezeka kwa utengenezaji wa madini na madini katika maeneo mengi ya ulimwengu. Urafiki wa Wamisri kwa usafi na nywele za mwili zilizopakana na macho, na madarasa ya juu mara nyingi huoga mara kadhaa kwa siku. Wangenyoa vichwa vyao kabisa, na kisha kubuni wigs za baridi ili kuvaa hadharani.

Hofu ya uchafu ilikuwa wasiwasi wa kweli, na inaweza kuwa sababu ya mapema ya mtu wa kwanza kunyoa pia. Nywele za mwili hutoa mazingira bora kwa chawa na wakosoaji wengine wasiohitajika, na pia inaweza kuwa eneo la kuzaliana kwa maambukizo ya kuvu, haswa katika hali ya hewa ya moto au yenye unyevu. Wamisri walijaribu kuondoa hatari ya wadudu au vimelea kwa kuondoa mazingira yoyote ambapo wanaweza kustawi! Kwa kuongezea, katika hali ya hewa ya moto na yenye unyevu wa Misri, kuwa na nywele nyingi za mwili zilisababisha ukuaji wa haraka wa harufu ya mwili, ishara nyingine ya uchafu ndani ya jamii ngumu ya Wamisri.

report_src: Majaji wa Marekani wanapewa mamlaka mapana ya kubuni adhabu ilimradi zizidi au kushindwa kukiuka sheria za juu—k.m. viwango vya juu vya kifungo vilivyowekwa na bunge, haki ya kikatiba ya kutopata “adhabu kali na isiyo ya kawaida,” na kanuni za mwenendo wa mahakama—hivyo wanaweza kuamuru “sentensi za kibinafsi” kama kumkalisha mtuhumiwa kwenye dampo la takataka kwa saa kadhaa. Jaji Michael Cicconetti wa Mahakama ya Manispaa ya Painesville, anayesimamia hadi kesi 40 kwa siku, hujulikana kwa mbinu hii, akisisitiza kwamba adhabu ifanane moja kwa moja na kosa ili kuimarisha athari ya kuelimisha na kuzuia uhalifu [1]. Hoja ya kisheria ni kwamba vikwazo vinavyoaibisha (shaming penalties) ni halali mradi “majaji wasiende mbali sana,” yaani havikiuki utu wa mshitakiwa au haki za kimsingi; hivyo mahakama za juu zimekuwa zikiziacha zisimame isipokuwa zionekane za kikatili kupita kiasi [2]. Wale wanaokosa mafunzo ya kuimarisha misuli maalum ya vidole, mikono na mabega mara nyingi huendelea kuwa na mwandiko usio mzuri [2]. Kuandika kwa mkono kila nafasi itakayotokea hujenga misuli na uthabiti unaofanya herufi ziwe laini na sawia [3]. Kufundisha watoto mlolongo sahihi wa mistari na maumbo kabla ya herufi huweka msingi thabiti wa uandishi mwororo baadaye [4]. Michezo inayoboreshwa uratibu kati ya macho na mkono, kama kutupa begi la maharagwe, inaimarisha uwezo muhimu wa kuona-motor unaosaidia kudhibiti kalamu [5]. Mazoezi haya ya mapema yanaonyeshwa kuongeza ujuzi mzuri wa gari na utendaji wa kuona-motor [6]. Hata kwa watu wazima, kujaza safu za alfabeti na kurekebisha kielekeo au umbo la kila herufi ni njia bora ya kusawazisha mwandiko [7]. tofauti za mwandiko ni zao la mafunzo, mazoezi na maendeleo ya kimuundo, si bahati nasibu.

Title: What is a Visa? | US Visa Help (visahelp.us.com)
Content: The visa is issued by the immigration authorities of the country you are planning to visit, usually, a consulate or embassy in your country. In cases when your destination country does not have a consulate or embassy in your home country, you will have to obtain a travel visa at the embassy of another country which is authorized to issue visas for the country you will visit.


Each country has its own visa policy, but the application process for a visa is generally similar. There are many types of travel visas depending on your nationality, destination country, the purpose of travel and even the number of times you wish to visit that country.


There are also a number of requirements that you will have to fulfill which vary from country to country. Although there are not a lot of differences since most of the immigration authorities ask for approximately the same documents, depending on your purpose of travel, you might have to submit some extra or fewer documents.


However, a visa does not guarantee you will enter that country since the border guard has the final decision to make.

Document ID: 2
Title: What is a Visa? | US Visa Help (visahelp.us.com)
Content: The visa is issued by the immigration authorities of the country you are planning to visit, usually, a consulate or embassy in your country. In cases when your destination country does not have a consulate or embassy in your home country, you will have to obtain a travel visa at the embassy of another country which is authorized to issue visas for the country you will visit.


Each country has its own visa policy, but the application process for a visa is generally similar. There are many types of travel visas depending on your nationality, destination country, the purpose of travel and even the number of times you wish to visit that country.


There are also a number of requirements that you will have to fulfill which vary from country to country. Although there are not a lot of differences since most of the immigration authorities ask for approximately the same documents, depending on your purpose of travel, you might have to submit some extra or fewer documents.


However, a visa does not guarantee you will enter that country since the border guard has the final decision to make.

question_src: Je! Kwa nini Desalination sio suluhisho rahisi kwa uhaba wa maji ujao?
report_src: Desalination si tiba rahisi kwa uhaba wa maji kwa sababu kadhaa: kwanza, ni ghali sana—huko Marekani gharama za miundombinu na uendeshaji hufanya maji yaliyotengwa kugharimu angalau mara tano zaidi ya yale yanayovunwa kutoka vyanzo vingine safi, mzigo ambao ni mkubwa hata zaidi kwa nchi maskini zenye bajeti finyu [1]; hata miradi iliyoboreshwa zaidi, kama ile ya California, bado huzalisha maji ambayo hugharimu takriban mara mbili ya maji ya vyanzo vya kawaida [2]. Pili, mchakato unahitaji nishati nyingi; bila chanzo cha nishati mbadala, matumizi hayo huongeza gharama na hewa chafuzi, na hivyo kupunguza uendelevu wake [2]. Tatu, athari za mazingira ni kubwa: mabomba ya kunyonza maji ya bahari humeza mamilioni ya mabuu na viumbe vidogo, na hivyo kupunguza bioanuwai na kusababisha “gharama iliyofichwa” kwa mifumo ya ikolojia ya bahari [1]. Hivyo, hadi gharama, nishati na ulinzi wa mazingira vidhibitiwe, desalination hubaki suluhisho lenye changamoto nyingi kuliko inavyoonekana.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Je! Kutengwa kwa bahari ni jibu la uhaba wa maji ulimwenguni? (www.thoughtco.com)
Content: DESALINATION - Mchakato ambao maji ya bahari yenye shinikizo kubwa husukuma kupitia vichungi vidogo vya membrane na kuingizwa ndani ya maji ya kunywa - inashikiliwa na wengine kama suluhisho la kuahidi sana kwa shida. Lakini wakosoaji wanaonyesha kuwa haitoi bila gharama zake za kiuchumi na mazingira.

## Gharama na athari ya mazingira ya desalination

Kulingana na chakula kisicho na faida na saa ya maji, maji ya bahari yaliyosababishwa ndio njia ghali zaidi ya maji safi huko nje, kutokana na gharama ya miundombinu ya kukusanya, kuisambaza na kuisambaza. Kikundi hicho kinaripoti kwamba, huko Merika, iliongezeka kwa gharama ya maji angalau mara tano ya kuvuna kama vyanzo vingine vya maji safi. Gharama kubwa zinazofanana ni shida kubwa kwa juhudi za desalination katika nchi masikini pia, ambapo fedha ndogo tayari zimewekwa nyembamba sana.

Mbele ya mazingira, desalination iliyoenea inaweza kuchukua ushuru mzito kwenye bioanuwai ya bahari. "Maji ya bahari yamejazwa na viumbe hai, na wengi wao wamepotea katika harakati za kutengwa," anasema Sylvia Earle, mmoja wa biolojia ya kwanza ya baharini na mtaalam wa kitaifa wa kijiografia. "Wengi ni vijidudu, lakini bomba la ulaji kwa mimea ya desalination pia huchukua mabuu ya sehemu ya maisha baharini, na pia viumbe vikubwa zaidi ... sehemu ya gharama iliyofichwa ya kufanya biashara," anasema.

Title: Will Turning Seawater Into Drinking Water Help Water Shortages? (www.globalcitizen.org)
Content: Water obtained from desalination costs twice the amount of water from freshwater sources. But now, parts of California don’t have many other options.

The only way desalination can be a good option to solving the water crisis is if renewable energy is used, costs are lowered, and environmental protections are put in place for marine life too.

Title: Kuondolewa kwa maji ya bahari: Suluhisho la Uhaba wa Maji: AMPAC USA (www.watenline.com)
Content: * Desalination inatoa faraja ya maji yanayoweza kupatikana bila mkazo wa uchovu. * Kwa kiwango kikubwa, hutoa maji salama ya kunywa kwa maelfu ya kaya kila siku hufanya usambazaji kwa kila mtu huduma thabiti. * Mimea ya hali ya juu zaidi iliyowekwa ulimwenguni kote hutumia reverse osmosis kama mchakato wa msingi wa kuchujwa. Ni njia iliyothibitishwa ya maji ya kunywa yanayoweza kunywa. * Nchi hazitegemei rasilimali asili ambazo sasa zinaweza kuanza kujaza kupitia mzunguko wa maji. * Bora zaidi, mchakato wa utakaso wa taka kutoka kwa viwanda unaweza kutoa maji salama ambayo yanaweza kutumika kujaza maji, maziwa, hifadhi za mkoa huo na kwa upande wake kuinua mafadhaiko kutoka kwa mazingira.

Mimea imewekwa kote ulimwenguni huko Australia, U.S, Saudi Arabia na zaidi ambapo kila siku makumi ya maelfu ya galoni za maji safi hutolewa kutoka kwa usambazaji wa bahari isiyo na mwisho.

"Ni mwenendo unaokua. Imetoa tumaini kwa nchi ambazo jiografia haibariki kwa asili na mito na hifadhi. Watu wameanza umwagiliaji na kilimo kutokana na usambazaji mwingi. Reverse osmosis hufanya mchakato huo uwe mzuri. Bado, tunayo Miles ya kwenda katika teknolojia kuhusu athari zake za mazingira," aliongeza Farag.

question_src: Kwa nini Kiwango cha Moyo wa Run Run ni chini kuliko Mkimbiaji
report_src: Kiwango cha mapigo ya moyo cha mkimbiaji mwenye mazoezi ya uvumilivu huwa chini kuliko cha mtu asiye mkimbiaji kwa sababu mazoezi ya muda mrefu huongeza “sauti ya vagus” (vagal tone) inayopunguza kasi ya mapigo, na pia hufanya misuli ya moyo kukua na kuwa na uwezo wa kusukuma kiasi kikubwa zaidi cha damu kila pigo; hivyo moyo hauhitaji kupiga mara nyingi ili kuhudumia mwili [1]. Ukuaji huu wa kuta na ufanisi wa kusukuma damu husababisha ufanisi mkubwa wa mfumo wa mzunguko, ambapo mapigo ya kupumzika yanaweza kushuka chini ya midundo 60 kwa dakika (bradycardia) bila kuwa hatari kiafya [1]. Kwa maneno mengine, moyo wa mkimbiaji hupata “output” ile ile ya damu kwa mapigo machache, jambo linaloonyesha tu ufanisi ulioimarishwa, si udhaifu wa moyo [2]. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Runners and low heart rate (www.runnersworld.com)
Content: A heart rate of less than 60 is called a bradycardia, or slow heart rate. It is not unusual for healthy people involved in endurance activities to develop a bradycardia based on the increased vagal tone from training that suppresses heart rate. Training also increases the heart size so it can push out a greater volume of blood to the body with each contraction.

Title: Kwa nini wanariadha wana kiwango cha chini cha moyo? | Livestrong.com (www.livestrong.com)
Content: Kuongezeka kwa usawa wa moyo na mishipa husababisha mabadiliko halisi ya mwili katika muundo wa moyo. Misuli iliyo ndani ya ukuta wa moyo inakua, na moyo husukuma damu zaidi na kila kipigo. Wanariadha wengi hawatambui kuwa viwango vya juu vya hali pia husababisha dalili za moyo ambazo madaktari wanaweza kukosea kwa shida kubwa.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Udanganyifu wa picha (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: Udanganyifu wa HotO ulianzia kwenye picha zingine za mapema zilizopigwa kwenye sahani za glasi na bati wakati wa karne ya 19. Kitendo hicho kilianza muda mrefu baada ya kuundwa kwa picha ya kwanza (1825) na Joseph Nicéphore Niépce ambaye alitengeneza heliografia na kufanya kuchapishwa kwa picha ya kwanza kutoka kwa sahani ya kuchapa picha. [3] [4] Prints za jadi za picha zinaweza kubadilishwa kwa kutumia njia na mbinu mbali mbali ambazo zinahusisha kudanganywa moja kwa moja kwa kuchapishwa, kama vile kuweka tena na wino, rangi, kupunguka kwa hewa, au kupiga polaroids wakati wa kukuza (sanaa ya polaroid). [5] Vizuizi vinaweza kudanganywa wakati bado uko kwenye kamera kwa kutumia mbinu za kufichua mara mbili, au kwenye chumba cha giza kwa kupiga picha au hasi pamoja. Baadhi ya udanganyifu wa chumba cha giza ulihusisha mbinu kama vile blekning ili kupunguza sana au kuosha kabisa sehemu za picha, au kuchorea kwa mikono kwa madhumuni ya uzuri au kuiga uchoraji mzuri wa sanaa. [6]

Document ID: 2
Title: Historia fupi ya udanganyifu wa picha (kabla ya Photoshop) (www.creativelive.com)
Content: Katika chapisho la blogi la 2013 kwa Fstoppers, kitaalam Retoucher Pratik Naik alielezea mchakato wenye uchungu kama vile:


"Je! Unahitaji kuvuta picha? Hakikisha kufuta glasi ya kukuza na chupa ya uvumilivu pamoja na mkono wako thabiti. Bila huruma, hakuna historia au tabaka. Unaweza pia kusahau juu ya brashi hiyo nzuri ya uponyaji! Hapa kuna brashi ya rangi badala yake"


Wakurugenzi wa sanaa, wabuni wa picha, na wachapishaji walifanya kazi kwa muda mrefu juu ya picha, kujaribu kukamilisha ngozi, vifaa, na maswala mengine ambayo, leo, yangeondolewa kwa urahisi na kubonyeza panya. Vyombo kama rangi, viboreshaji, vifuniko vya hewa, na vifaa vingine vya sanaa vilikuwa muhimu katika studio yoyote - kama vile mkono uliokuwa thabiti na jicho la kupendeza la rangi na kivuli. Unaweza kuona hata kazi ngumu ambayo ilienda kwenye picha kamili katika maelezo haya ya picha maarufu ya Dennis, ambayo imewekwa alama na Pablo Inirio.

Document ID: 3
Title: What Did We Do Before Photoshop? (www.pbs.org)
Content: MIA FINEMAN: Most of the earliest manipulated photographs were attempts to compensate for the new medium’s technical limitations — specifically, its inability to depict the world as it appears to the naked eye.


When photography was first introduced in 1839, people wondered how a medium that could render forms and textures with such exquisite detail could fail to register the ever-present element of color. Eager to please potential customers, photographers immediately resorted to manual intervention, enlivening their pictures with powdered pigment, watercolor and oil paint.


Early photography was color-blind in other ways as well. In the 19th century, photographic emulsions were much more sensitive to blue and violet light than to other colors on the spectrum, which meant that blue skies almost always appeared blotchy and overexposed. To overcome the problem, many landscape photographers would make two separate negatives — one exposed for the land, the other for the sky — and print them together on a single sheet of paper. The French photographer Gustave Le Gray used this technique in his majestic seascapes of the 1850s. The exhibition features three seascapes by Le Gray, all using the same cloud negative. The show also includes a great pair of before-and-after landscapes by the American photographer Carleton Watkins — one with a blank white sky, the other with added clouds.

question_src: Je! Mwenendo wa kasinon ulikuwaje kuanza uhifadhi wa India? Je! Kwanini walichagua kasinon badala ya kuwa na kitu kingine kulindwa kwenye ardhi yao?
report_src: Mwenendo wa kasinon kwenye uhifadhi wa India ulianza baada ya uamuzi wa Mahakama Kuu uliokataza majimbo kutoza au kudhibiti shughuli za kamari kwenye ardhi ya makabila; ndani ya miaka michache tu makabila mengi yalikuwa tayari yanaendesha bingo za India katika maeneo anuwai kote Marekani [1]. Hali hii ya uhuru ilipewa muundo rasmi na Sheria ya Udhibiti wa Michezo ya Kubahatisha ya India ya 1988, iliyoeleza kwamba majimbo yana mamlaka finyu ya kupiga marufuku kamari kwenye ardhi za kikabila, hivyo kufungua mlango wa kasinon, kumbi za bingo na michezo mingine ya kubahatisha [2]. Makabila yalichagua kasinon kwa sababu michezo ya kubahatisha ilionekana njia ya haraka na yenye faida kubwa ya kujipatia uhuru wa kiuchumi na kisiasa; mapato hayo yamewezesha ufadhili wa makazi, afya, elimu na huduma nyingine muhimu, na hivyo kuwa nyenzo kuu ya kujenga ustawi wa jamii zao [3]. Uteuzi huu umeonyesha mafanikio: kati ya 1996 na 2008 mapato ya kasinon za kikabila yaliongezeka wastani wa 12.9% kila mwaka, na hata baada ya mdororo wa 2009 yakarejea katika ongezeko la wastani wa 1.44% kati ya 2009 na 2013 [4].

Title: Michezo ya Kubahatisha ya Amerika (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: Kamari ya Native American inajumuisha kasinon, kumbi za bingo, na shughuli zingine za kamari juu ya kutoridhishwa kwa India au ardhi zingine za kikabila huko Merika. Title: Native American gaming (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: Indian gaming became the focus for many tribes in efforts to retrieve their sovereignty and economic independence.[17] Native American tribes went through vast political, economic, and social change after the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act of 1988. Non-Native Americans instituted their politics and forced Native Americans onto small reservations. Casino and bingo halls have provided funding for housing, medical, social services, education, and many other resources for the Native American tribes.

question_src: Kwa nini milango ya bafuni haitoi faragha sahihi?
report_src: Milango ya bafuni za umma hutoa faragha isiyokamilika kwa makusudi kwa sababu kadhaa: kwanza, pengo chini na juu huruhusu watu kuona na kugundua haraka iwapo mtumiaji amepoteza fahamu, hivyo wasaidizi wanaweza kumvuta au kutambaa chini ya mlango bila kuuvunja, jambo linaloweza kuokoa maisha [1]. Pili, mwonekano huu kidogo ni kizuizi cha tabia isiyofaa kama kufanya ngono, kutumia dawa za kulevya au kuchora graffiti kwani mtu yeyote anaweza kuonekana kirahisi [1]. Tatu, milango mifupi inahitaji mbao/karatasi chache na haibidi kupimwa kulingana na urefu wa chumba, hivyo inagharimu kidogo kutengeneza na kusakinisha kuliko milango inayogusa sakafu hadi dari [1]. Nne, mapungufu hurahisisha kusafisha kwa kuwa maji au power-wash yana mahali pa kukimbia na mfagiaji hahitaji kufungua kila duka [2]. Tano, mzunguko wa hewa ni bora zaidi, kupunguza unyevunyevu na harufu kali zinazoweza kujikusanya kwenye duka lililofungwa kabisa [2]. Hatimaye, nafasi hiyo pia hutoa “toe space” muhimu kwa watumiaji wa viti vya magurudumu kulingana na matakwa ya ADA [2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: The Reason Public Bathroom Stalls Have Gaps (www.msn.com)
Content: There are actually a number of valid reasons it’s good to increase visibility inside of a stall. If the door went all the way to the floor, other occupants might not be able to notice if someone in a stall was having a problem and lost consciousness. The gap provides visibility in case a person inside is in some kind of distress. It also helps first responders, who could pull the occupant out without having to break down the door.


A gap also provides just enough of a dent in privacy to make any kind of undesirable public behavior—like sexual activity or drug use—less practical.


There are economical and logistical considerations, too. Doors that come only part of the way down are universal, meaning that suppliers and installers don’t need to custom-measure them. This saves on costs. Small doors also make cleaning floors in and around the stalls easier. This was the motivation behind the partitions famed architect Frank Lloyd Wright designed for the influential Larkin Building that stood in Buffalo, New York, from 1903 to 1950. Many of his ideas, like small bathroom doors, became a standard of business construction.


If you’re still not convinced gaps are a design win, consider that an enclosed stall is going to have only limited air circulation. The last thing you want or need in a public bathroom is to trap odors. It also helps keep loitering to a minimum. (Then again, so would the stench.)
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Je! Kwanini Bafuni Hati Kwa Sakafu - Pengo la Duka la Bafuni (OnePointPartitions.com)
Content: Rahisi kusafisha: Kwa kuwa na pengo chini, sehemu za bafuni ni rahisi kusafisha, kama ilivyo choo chote. Unaweza kuweka chini au hata Powerwash choo ambacho kina sehemu zilizo na mapungufu chini kwa sababu maji yana mahali pa kukimbia hata ikiwa hakuna kukimbia kwenye duka fulani. * Ufikiaji wa dharura: Ikiwa mtu atapoteza fahamu katika bafuni iliyofungwa kabisa, inaweza kuchukua masaa kwa mtu kugundua. Ikiwa hii itatokea katika duka na pengo chini, tabia mbaya ni nzuri mtu atagundua haraka, ambayo ni muhimu katika hali ambapo kila sekunde inaweza kumaanisha tofauti kati ya maisha na kifo. Badala ya kuvunja mlango, mhojiwa wa kwanza anaweza kutambaa kupitia pengo chini ya kizigeu na kufungua mlango ili kutoa msaada. * Kuzuia tabia isiyofaa: Kwa sababu watu wanaweza kuona sehemu ya bafuni ambayo ina pengo chini, aina hii ya kizigeu ni kizuizi cha asili kwa tabia isiyofaa, kama vile mtu ananyunyiza kuchora duka na graffiti. * Nafuu zaidi: Sehemu ambazo haziongei kutoka sakafu hadi dari sio lazima zifanyike ili kutoshea vipimo halisi vya chumba na hazihitaji vifaa vingi kuunda. Hii inawafanya wawe na bei nafuu zaidi. * Mzunguko bora wa hewa: Mzunguko bora wa hewa ni moja ya sababu za juu kwa nini kuna mapungufu chini ya maduka ya choo. Wakati vyoo na aina hii ya kizigeu bado vinaweza kunuka mara kwa mara, mambo yangekuwa mengi zaidi katika duka lililofungwa kabisa. . Mwonekano huu huweka mstari kusonga na kuzuia nyakati za kungojea kuwa tena kuliko vile inavyopaswa kuwa. Wakati duka halijafungwa kabisa, mara nyingi watu huhisi kama wanapaswa kutunza biashara zao hata haraka, ambayo pia husaidia kuweka mstari kusonga. * Utaratibu wa ADA: Nafasi inahitajika ili kuruhusu ujanja rahisi kwa walinzi kwenye kiti cha magurudumu. Pengo linaruhusu nafasi ya toe kwa kiti cha magurudumu

Hii inawafanya wawe na bei nafuu zaidi. * Mzunguko bora wa hewa: Mzunguko bora wa hewa ni moja ya sababu za juu kwa nini kuna mapungufu chini ya maduka ya choo. Wakati vyoo na aina hii ya kizigeu bado vinaweza kunuka mara kwa mara, mambo yangekuwa mengi zaidi katika duka lililofungwa kabisa. . Mwonekano huu huweka mstari kusonga na kuzuia nyakati za kungojea kuwa tena kuliko vile inavyopaswa kuwa. Wakati duka halijafungwa kabisa, mara nyingi watu huhisi kama wanapaswa kutunza biashara zao hata haraka, ambayo pia husaidia kuweka mstari kusonga. * Utaratibu wa ADA: Nafasi inahitajika ili kuruhusu ujanja rahisi kwa walinzi kwenye kiti cha magurudumu. Pengo linaruhusu nafasi ya toe kwa kiti cha magurudumu

Pili, mwonekano huu kidogo ni kizuizi cha tabia isiyofaa kama kufanya ngono, kutumia dawa za kulevya au kuchora graffiti kwani mtu yeyote anaweza kuonekana kirahisi [1]. Hatimaye, nafasi hiyo pia hutoa “toe space” muhimu kwa watumiaji wa viti vya magurudumu kulingana na matakwa ya ADA [2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Sababu za bafuni za umma zina mapungufu (www.msn.com)
Content: Kwa kweli kuna sababu kadhaa halali ni vizuri kuongeza mwonekano ndani ya duka. Ikiwa mlango ulikwenda sakafuni, wakaazi wengine wanaweza kukosa kugundua ikiwa mtu katika duka alikuwa na shida na alipoteza fahamu. Pengo hutoa mwonekano ikiwa mtu wa ndani yuko katika aina fulani ya shida. Pia husaidia wahojiwa wa kwanza, ambao wangeweza kumvuta mtu huyo bila kulazimika kuvunja mlango.


Pengo pia hutoa dent ya kutosha katika faragha kufanya aina yoyote ya tabia mbaya ya umma -kama shughuli za ngono au matumizi ya dawa za kulevya - vitendo visivyo.


Kuna maanani ya kiuchumi na ya vifaa, pia. Milango ambayo inakuja sehemu tu ya njia ya chini ni ya ulimwengu wote, ikimaanisha kuwa wauzaji na wasanidi hawahitaji kupima. Hii inaokoa kwa gharama. Milango ndogo pia hufanya sakafu ya kusafisha ndani na karibu na maduka iwe rahisi. Huo ndio ulikuwa motisha nyuma ya mbuni wa mbunifu aliyejulikana Frank Lloyd Wright iliyoundwa kwa jengo lenye ushawishi la Larkin ambalo lilisimama Buffalo, New York, kutoka 1903 hadi 1950. Mawazo yake mengi, kama milango ndogo ya bafuni, ikawa kiwango cha ujenzi wa biashara.


Ikiwa bado haujashawishika mapungufu ni ushindi wa muundo, fikiria kuwa duka lililofungwa litakuwa na mzunguko mdogo wa hewa. Jambo la mwisho unataka au unahitaji katika bafuni ya umma ni kuvuta harufu. Pia husaidia kuweka laini kwa kiwango cha chini. (Halafu tena, ndivyo pia harufu.)
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Why Do Bathroom Stalls Not To The Floor - Bathroom Stall Gap (onepointpartitions.com)
Content: Easier to Clean: By having a gap at the bottom, bathroom partitions are much easier to clean, as is the whole restroom. You can hose down or even powerwash a restroom that has partitions with gaps at the bottom because the water has somewhere to run even if there’s not a drain in a given stall.
* Emergency Access: If someone loses consciousness in a fully enclosed bathroom, it may take hours for someone to notice. If this happens in a stall with a gap at the bottom, the odds are good someone will notice much quicker, which is important in instances where every second can mean the difference between life and death. Instead of having to break down the door, a first responder can crawl through the gap at the bottom of the partition and unlock the door to render help.
* Deterrent to Undesirable Behavior: Because people can partially see into a bathroom stall that has a gap at the bottom, this type of partition is a natural deterrent to undesirable behavior, such as someone spray painting the stall with graffiti.
* More Affordable: Partitions that don’t extend from the floor to the ceiling don’t have to be custom made to fit a room’s exact measurements and they don’t require as many materials to construct. This makes them considerably more affordable.
* Better Air Circulation: Better air circulation is one of the top reasons why there are gaps under toilet stalls. While restrooms with this kind of partition may still get a bit stinky from time to time, things would be even more overwhelming in a fully enclosed stall.
* Keeps the Line Moving: Having a gap at the base of a partition allows people waiting in line to see if a stall is occupied or vacant. This visibility keeps the line moving and prevents wait times from being any longer than they have to be. When a stall isn’t fully enclosed, people often feel like they have to take care of their business even faster, which also helps keep the line moving.
* ADA Compliance: Space is needed to allow for easier maneuverability for patrons in a wheelchair. The gap allows toe space for wheelchair
---

* Keeps the Line Moving: Having a gap at the base of a partition allows people waiting in line to see if a stall is occupied or vacant. Title: Why does Germany have so many names? | Supertext-Magazin (blog.supertext.ch)
Content: Germany was split between East and West during the Cold War, but that was far from the first time the nation was divided into territories. Germany as we know it today didn’t actually form until the 19th century, when Otto von Bismarck united politically independent regions with different customs, names and dialects into an empire in 1871.


This means that most terms for ‘Germany’ stem from a time when Germany didn’t really exist. Instead, there was the ‘Alemanni’ tribe in the German-speaking part of the Alsace and the Baden-Württemberg region bordering France, where they say ‘Allemagne’. Meanwhile, in Estonia and Finland, where Germany today is known as Saksamaa and Saksa respectively, people generally thought of Saxons when dealing with Germans.

Content: Tyskland (Lugha za Scandinavia kama Kidenmaki na Kiswidi), Duitsland (Uholanzi) na, kwa kweli, Deutschland (Kijerumani) zilikuwa maneno ambayo yangeendeleza kutoka kwa proto-Germanic Þeudō au Þeudiskaz, ambayo kwa mtiririko huo inamaanisha 'taifa' na 'ya watu'. Hakika, hizi ni tofauti zinazotumiwa (au ambazo zilitumika) katika lugha za Kijerumani zenyewe.


## Sio watu wetu


Masharti ya Slavic kwa Ujerumani, kama Niemcy (Kipolishi) au Německo (Czech), yana asili tofauti kabisa. Wanatoka kwa proto-slavic němьcь, ambayo inamaanisha 'bubu'. Neno hilo liliendelea kutumiwa kuelezea wageni (i.e. watu ambao hawakuweza kuzungumza lugha za kawaida), ambao mara nyingi waligeuka kuwa watu wa Kijerumani.


## Nani anajua?


Hakuna jibu dhahiri la wapi maneno ya Baltic kama Vācija (Latvian) na Vokietija (Kilithuania) yanatoka. Wengine wanafikiria wanatokana na neno la proto-indo-European *wek (ambayo inamaanisha 'kuongea'), wakati wengine wanapendekeza kwamba wangeweza kutoka kwa masharti yaliyotumiwa kwa Waviking.

Document ID: 3
Title: Why does Germany have so many names? | Supertext-Magazin (blog.supertext.ch)
Content: Tyskland (Scandinavian languages like Danish and Swedish), Duitsland (Dutch) and, of course, Deutschland (German) were terms that likely developed from the Proto-Germanic þeudō or Þeudiskaz, which respectively mean ‘nation’ and ‘of the people’. Indeed, these are the variations used (or that used to be used) in Germanic languages themselves.


## Not our people


Slavic terms for Germany, like Niemcy (Polish) or Německo (Czech), have an altogether different origin. They come from the Proto-Slavic němьcь, which means ‘mute’. The word went on to be used to describe foreigners (i.e. people who couldn’t speak the local languages), who frequently turned out to be Germanic people.


## Who knows?

Title: Why does Germany have so many names? | Supertext-Magazin (blog.supertext.ch)
Content: Tyskland (Scandinavian languages like Danish and Swedish), Duitsland (Dutch) and, of course, Deutschland (German) were terms that likely developed from the Proto-Germanic þeudō or Þeudiskaz, which respectively mean ‘nation’ and ‘of the people’. Indeed, these are the variations used (or that used to be used) in Germanic languages themselves.


## Not our people


Slavic terms for Germany, like Niemcy (Polish) or Německo (Czech), have an altogether different origin. They come from the Proto-Slavic němьcь, which means ‘mute’. The word went on to be used to describe foreigners (i.e. people who couldn’t speak the local languages), who frequently turned out to be Germanic people.


## Who knows?


There’s no definitive answer for where the Baltic terms like Vācija (Latvian) and Vokietija (Lithuanian) come from. Some think they stem from the Proto-Indo-European word *wek (which means ‘to speak’), while others suggest that they could have developed from terms used for the Vikings.

question_src: Je! Chakula na vinywaji ambavyo vinatangazwa kama kalori 0 bado vinaweza kutekelezwa na kutumiwa kama nishati na mwili wako?
report_src: Kalori ni kipimo cha nishati; bila kalori hata kidogo hakuna kinachoweza kuchangia moja kwa moja nishati ya mwili, lakini sheria huruhusu bidhaa zenye hadi kalori 5 kwa posho kutangazwa kama “kalori 0,” hivyo mara nyingi bado kuna kalori chache zinazoweza kutumika kama nishati [4]. Dhana kwamba mboga kama celery huunguza kalori zaidi kuliko zinavyotoa ni hadithi—hazibadilishi sana matumizi yako ya jumla ya nishati, wala haziwezi “kuudanganya” mwili kupunguza uzito [1]. Zaidi ya hapo, vinywaji na vyakula vya bandia visivyo na kalori, kama soda ya lishe, vinaweza kuvuruga udhibiti wa njaa, kuongeza uchochezi wa mfumo wa mmeng’enyo na hatimaye kuchochea ulaji mwingi au kuhifadhi mafuta, licha ya kuwa na kalori sifuri au chache sana wenyewe [3]. Kwa hiyo, “kalori 0” si sawa na kutokuwa na athari mwilini: vinaweza kutoa nishati kidogo inayoonekana kama sifuri kwenye lebo au kuathiri kimetaboliki na tabia ya kula, na hivyo vinaendelea “kutekelezwa” na mwili kwa njia moja au nyingine.

Title: Ukweli juu ya Vinywaji na Chakula cha Zero-Kalori (www.yahoo.com)
Content: Kwa kweli, vyakula vya kalori ya sifuri husababisha sisi kupata uzito kwa njia kadhaa, kulingana na watafiti wetu wa ufa wakati wa kula hii, sio hivyo! (Nani ataendelea kuripoti hadithi hiyo kwenye EatThis.com):


* Wao hupunguza mafuta yako ya asili. Mwili huchoma kalori nyingi kujaribu kugeuza pat ya siagi kuwa pat yako. Lakini vyakula vyenye kusindika sana-ambavyo ndio vyakula vingi vya kalori sifuri-vinasindika sana hivi kwamba vimekuzwa, kwa hivyo hazifanyi moto wa kuchoma mafuta ya mwili.


* Wanasababisha kuvimba -na hiyo husababisha kupata uzito. Tambulisha rundo la kemikali kwenye njia yako ya kumengenya na kwa kweli unaanzisha hasira. Hiyo inaweza kuingiliana na uwezo wa mwili wa kuchukua virutubishi kwenye chakula, na inaita kinga ya mfumo wa utumbo kuwa kucheza, na kusababisha uchochezi. Kuvimba husababisha jeni zetu za mafuta "kuwasha," kuongezeka kwa mafuta ya tumbo. (Kuzungumza juu ya: Kuyeyusha tumbo lako, angalia tabia muhimu za kila siku ambazo zinalipua mafuta ya tumbo)


* Wanachanganya uwezo wetu wa kudhibiti kile tunachokula. Hii ndio sababu: Unapomeza soda ya lishe, ladha tamu hufanya mwili wako kutarajia kuwasili kwa kalori. Na wakati kalori hazionekani, mwili wako unachanganyikiwa, na husababisha majibu yako ya njaa, kukutumia kuangalia juu na chini kwa kalori zile zilizokosekana - na mara nyingi kuzipata kwenye bakuli la vitafunio.

Title: The Truth About Zero-Calorie Drinks and Foods (www.yahoo.com)
Content: In fact, zero calorie foods cause us to gain weight in several ways, according to our crack researchers at Eat This, Not That! (who will continue to report out the story on EatThis.com):


* They dampen your natural fat burners. The body burns a lot of calories trying to turn a pat of butter into a pat of you. But highly processed foods—which is what most zero calorie foods are—come so highly processed that they’re basically digested for you, so they don’t keep the body’s natural fat-burners firing.


* They cause inflammation—and that causes weight gain. Introduce a bunch of chemicals into your digestive tract and you’re basically introducing an irritant. That can interfere with the body’s ability to absorb nutrients in food, and it calls the digestive system’s natural defenses into play, creating inflammation. Inflammation causes our fat genes to “turn on,” increasing belly fat. (Speaking of: To melt away your belly, check out the essential Daily Habits That Blast Belly Fat)


* They mess up our ability to regulate what we eat. Here’s why: When you swallow that diet soda, the sweet taste makes your body anticipate the arrival of calories. And when the calories don’t show up, your body gets confused, and triggers your hunger response, sending you looking high and low for those missing calories—and often finding them in a snack bowl.

Title: How I Sleep in a Noisy City Apartment | Sleeping.Guide (sleeping.guide)
Content: Sleep is extremely important to our well-being. A good sleep means good health, ability to focus, and better happiness overall. Kuruka kwa ghafla kwa decibel 50 ni kubwa, na itakuamka kabisa. Ghafla, kelele hiyo hiyo ya gari 70 ya Decibel ni kuruka tu 20. Haionekani sana, na ina uwezekano mdogo wa kukushtua kuwa macho.

Title: How I Sleep in a Noisy City Apartment | Sleeping.Guide (sleeping.guide)
Content: White noise can help this. Let’s say that the car horn is a 70 decibel sound. If you’re lying in almost complete silence, maybe with a little wind outside, that’s around 20 decibels. That sudden 50 decibel jump is HUGE, and will totally spring you awake. Instead, if you have a white noise generator or are playing white noise from your speakers/laptop, this could be a nice, continuous sound at around 50 decibels (just about the level of normal conversation). Suddenly, that same 70 decibel car noise is only a 20 decibel jump. It’s much less noticeable, and so much less likely to shock you into being jolted awake.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Nini Sehemu za Biashara za Filamu zinaweza kutufundisha juu ya soko la hisa (www.canstar.com.au)
Content: Ndugu za Duke wanajaribu kwenda kwa muda mrefu kwenye hatima ya juisi ya machungwa, wakati Louis na Billy Ray wanatumia mkakati mfupi wa kuuza. Mkakati mrefu ni njia ya jadi ya kupata pesa kwenye masoko ya hisa; kununua chini na kuuza juu. Mkakati mfupi ni wa nyuma, kuuza juu na kununua chini.


Dukes wanaamini kwa sababu ya ripoti ya mazao bandia kwamba kutakuwa na uhaba wa juisi ya machungwa, na kwa hivyo bei itaongezeka. Kwa hivyo, kwa kununua juisi yote inayopatikana sasa, wakati uhaba unafunuliwa, kila mtu atalazimika kuinunua kutoka kwa bei iliyochafuliwa. Louis na Billy Ray, kwa upande mwingine, wanajua kuwa kuna juisi nyingi zinazopatikana, na kuanza kuuza mikataba kwa bei kubwa ambayo Dukes wameunda. Kwa kweli, wanaahidi kutoa juisi ya machungwa ambayo hawamiliki bado, lakini wanapanga kununua juisi wanayohitaji kutoa baada ya ripoti ya mazao kutolewa.


Mara tu ripoti rasmi itakapowekwa wazi, wafanyabiashara wengine wote wanatamani kuuza, ili kupunguza hasara zao. Kwa kweli, tayari wamepoteza hasara, lakini ikiwa wanaweza kuuza juisi ambayo wamenunua, basi wanaweza kurudisha pesa zao kidogo. Kwa sababu wafanyabiashara wengine wanauza kwa nguvu, Louis na Billy Ray wanaweza kununua kwa bei rahisi sana juisi yote ya machungwa wanayohitaji ili kutimiza mikataba ambayo tayari wamefanya. Ikiwa hawakuweza kununua juisi waliyohitaji, wangejiondoa kwenye usafirishaji wao ulioahidiwa, na kuwaacha kwa sababu ya mamilioni ya dola. Uuzaji mfupi unaweza kuwa mkakati wenye faida, lakini pia ni hatari.

Document ID: 2
Title: Short-selling explained (case study: movie "Trading Places") (im-an-economist.blogspot.com)
Content: Going back to the movie, the question is how was it possible for Winthorpe and Valentine to make hundreds of millions in one hour on the trading floor, while simultaneously bankrupting Duke and Duke (the final scene)?


The answer: Short-selling. And of course: rigged insider information. This is the most important piece of the puzzle. Short-selling can only be fully efficient if you know the price will go down. Then you can scam everyone else easily.


The insider information I'm referring to is the Dept of Agriculture crop report for oranges (they're trading a commodity - frozen orange juice). The Dukes hired their secret agent Mr Beeks to get them the report before anyone else sees it. Unfortunately for them, Winthorpe and Valentine get their hands on the report before the Dukes do and feed them false information. The Dukes are led to believe that the weather was bad and so the harvest was less than normal. Therefore the Dukes are expecting high prices (low supply + high demand = high prices). However the actual report signals the opposite - the harvest was unaffected by the bad weather, and the supply will be plentiful. Hence the scope for short-selling, as Winthorpe and Valentine know that the price is likely to go down.
---

question_src: Je! Kwa nini Rais wa Merika anahitaji kuzaliwa nchini Merika kustahiki kukimbia?
report_src: Masharti ya Kifungu II, Sehemu ya 1 ya Katiba yanamtaka rais awe “raia wa asili” ili kulinda ofisi hiyo dhidi ya ushawishi wa mataifa ya kigeni [1]. Wazo hilo liliongezwa nguvu na barua ya 25 Julai 1787 ambako Jaji Mkuu wa kwanza John Jay alimwomba George Washington kuweka “cheki kali kwa idhini ya wageni” na kuhakikisha amri ya jeshi haikabidhiwi mtu asiyezaliwa Marekani, akisisitiza hatari ya uaminifu wa nje [1]. Waandalizi pia waliogopa uwezekano wa mwana-nasaba wa Ulaya kutumia pesa na umaarufu wake kununua kura za Chuo cha Wapiga Kura na kuigeuza Marekani kijicho cha kifalme, hofu iliyoonekana hai kutokana na umaarufu wa mashujaa kama Marquis de Lafayette [2]. Walikumbuka mfano wa Poland ambako madola jirani yalimtumia mfalme “rafiki” kuigawa nchi, wakiona jinsi kiongozi asiye na mizizi ya ndani anavyoweza kudhoofisha taifa [2]. George Mason alionya pia kwamba taifa tajiri la kigeni lingeweza “kutoa rushwa kwa njia yao” katika ofisi za shirikisho ikiwa wageni wangeachiwa mlango wazi [3].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Why must presidents be native-born? (slate.com)
Content: here is scant primary source material attesting to the 1787 Constitutional debate over Article II, Section I, which contains the “natural born” provision. The potential scourge of foreign influence, however, is mentioned several times in the Federalist Papers. And in a letter dated July 25, 1787, John Jay, the future first Chief Justice of the Supreme Court, wrote to George Washington:


> Permit me to hint, whether it would not be wise & seasonable to provide a strong check to the admission of Foreigners into the administration of our national Government; and to declare expressly that the Command in chief of the American army shall not be given to, nor devolve on, any but a natural born Citizen.

Document ID: 2
Title: Kwa nini marais lazima wazaliwa wa asili? (slate.com)
Content: Ingawa wasiwasi wao sasa unaweza kuonekana kuwa wa kizamani, fremu ziliogopa kwa dhati ya ubadilishaji wa kigeni. Miongoni mwa hali zao za usiku ni matarajio ya mtu mashuhuri wa Ulaya kutumia pesa zake na ushawishi wa kuhama chuo cha uchaguzi, kuchukua amri ya Jeshi la Amerika, na kurudisha taifa la Nascent kwenye zizi la Royalist. Wakati huo, takwimu kadhaa za Ulaya-kama vile Marquis de Lafayette wa Ufaransa, shujaa wa Vita vya Mapinduzi-vilikuwa maarufu sana katika Ulimwengu Mpya, kwa hivyo wazo hilo halikuonekana kabisa.


Framers pia walichukua somo kutoka Ulaya, ambapo nasaba kila mara walipanga dhidi ya mwenzake. Wanaume ambao waliandaa Katiba walikuwa wamejua mfano wa kutisha wa Poland, ambapo mawakala kutoka Urusi, Prussia, na Austria walifanya njama ya kufunga mfalme wa kirafiki, Stanislaus II, na baadaye walikamata udhaifu wake na kugawanya nchi kati yao. Kumbuka pia, kwamba nasaba mara kwa mara zilibadilika kote Ulaya bila kujali asili ya kitaifa; Mfalme wa England George I, kwa mfano, alikuwa Hanoverian ambaye alizungumza sifuri Kiingereza.
---

Document ID: 2
Title: Why must presidents be native-born? (slate.com)
Content: Though their concerns may now seem archaic, the framers were genuinely afraid of foreign subversion. Among their nightmare scenarios was the prospect of a European noble using his money and influence to sway the Electoral College, take command of the American army, and return the nascent nation to the royalist fold. At the time, several European figures—such as France’s Marquis de Lafayette, a hero of the Revolutionary War—were quite popular in the New World, so the idea wasn’t completely far-fetched.


The framers also took a lesson from Europe, where dynasties constantly schemed against one another. The men who drafted the Constitution were certainly familiar with the tragic example of Poland, where agents from Russia, Prussia, and Austria conspired to install a friendly monarch, Stanislaus II, and subsequently seized upon his weakness and partitioned the country among themselves. Keep in mind, too, that dynasties occasionally shuffled around Europe regardless of national origin; England’s King George I, for example, was a Hanoverian who spoke zero English.

Title: Kwa nini marais lazima wazaliwa wa asili? (slate.com)
Content: Ingawa wasiwasi wao sasa unaweza kuonekana kuwa wa kizamani, fremu ziliogopa kwa dhati ya ubadilishaji wa kigeni. Miongoni mwa hali zao za usiku ni matarajio ya mtu mashuhuri wa Ulaya kutumia pesa zake na ushawishi wa kuhama chuo cha uchaguzi, kuchukua amri ya Jeshi la Amerika, na kurudisha taifa la Nascent kwenye zizi la Royalist. Wakati huo, takwimu kadhaa za Ulaya-kama vile Marquis de Lafayette wa Ufaransa, shujaa wa Vita vya Mapinduzi-vilikuwa maarufu sana katika Ulimwengu Mpya, kwa hivyo wazo hilo halikuonekana kabisa.


Framers pia walichukua somo kutoka Ulaya, ambapo nasaba kila mara walipanga dhidi ya mwenzake. Wanaume ambao waliandaa Katiba walikuwa wamejua mfano wa kutisha wa Poland, ambapo mawakala kutoka Urusi, Prussia, na Austria walifanya njama ya kufunga mfalme wa kirafiki, Stanislaus II, na baadaye walikamata udhaifu wake na kugawanya nchi kati yao. Kumbuka pia, kwamba nasaba mara kwa mara zilibadilika kote Ulaya bila kujali asili ya kitaifa; Mfalme wa England George I, kwa mfano, alikuwa Hanoverian ambaye alizungumza sifuri Kiingereza.

question_src: Je! Kwa nini ugonjwa wa gari unaonekana kugonga ngumu zaidi wakati unapoangalia chini kwenye simu yako, kitabu, nk?
report_src: Ugonjwa wa gari huonekana kuongezeka unapoinamisha kichwa kutazama kitabu au simu kwa sababu macho yako yanajikita kwenye kitu kisichosogea na kuona tu sehemu ya ndani ya gari, jambo linalomwambia ubongo kuwa mwili uko tuli [1]. Wakati huohuo masikio yako ya ndani, pamoja na misuli na viungo, yanahisi mitetemo, mabadiliko ya kasi na zamu za gari na kutuma ishara kuwa mwili unasogea [2]. Migongano hii ya taarifa—macho yakidai umetulia huku mfumo wa usawa ukidai unasafiri—husababisha ubongo “kuchanganyikiwa” na kuanzisha dalili kama kichefuchefu, kutapika na kizunguzungu [3]. Kuangalia nje dirishani au kutazama upeo wa macho husaidia kwa sababu hutoa kidokezo thabiti cha mwendo kinacholingana na hisia kutoka masikio ya ndani, hivyo kupunguza mgongano wa hisia na uzito wa ugonjwa wa mwendo.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Why does reading in a moving car cause motion sickness? (www.scientificamerican.com)
Content: Consider the situation when one is reading in the back seat of a car. Your eyes, fixed on the book with the peripheral vision seeing the interior of the car, say that you are still. But as the car goes over bumps, turns, or changes its velocity, your ears disagree. This is why motion sickness is common in this situation.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Ugonjwa wa Motion: Dalili na Matibabu (my.clevelandclinic.org)
Content: Ni nini husababisha ugonjwa wa mwendo?


Ubongo wako hupokea ishara kutoka kwa sehemu za kuhisi mwendo wa mwili wako: macho yako, masikio ya ndani, misuli na viungo. Wakati sehemu hizi zinapotuma habari zinazokinzana, ubongo wako haujui ikiwa wewe ni stationary au unasonga. Mwitikio wa ubongo wako unakufanya uhisi mgonjwa.


Kwa mfano, unapopanda gari, yako:


* Macho yanaona miti ikipita na usajili wa harakati.
* Harakati za Masikio ya Ndani.
* Misuli na viungo vinahisi kuwa mwili wako umekaa kimya.
* Ubongo huhisi kukatwa kati ya ujumbe huu.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Jinsi ya kuzuia kichefuchefu wakati wa kusoma kwenye gari (www.wikihow.com)
Content: Wakati mwingine ni ngumu sana kuweka kitabu kizuri, hata kwenye gari. Shida ni kwamba wakati unasoma, macho yako yanaashiria kwa ubongo wako kuwa wewe ni stationary. Hii inapingana na ishara kutoka kwa masikio yako ya ndani, misuli, na viungo ambavyo huhisi viboreshaji vya gari.
