prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Should You Not Drink Ice Cold Water After Exercise? | Livestrong.com (www.livestrong.com)
Content: What about water temperature? In a May 2018 analysis published by the Gatorade Sports Science Institute, the researchers affirmed that drinking cold drinks before exercise, as opposed to during exercise, is more effective at lowering body temperature.


That might help you work out for longer without overheating, especially in hot or humid conditions. But the effect is limited. Drinking too many cold fluids will cause your body to reflexively shiver, which warms you back up again.


The same authors also note that drinking cold water during exercise may help lower your core temperature and reduce fluid lost through sweating. They speculate that drinking cold water after you work out may be particularly effective for helping to lower body temperature. What little clinical research there is on this topic seems to bear that conclusion out, but further study is needed.

Kwa kuwa hatutumii coprophagia kama mkakati wa lishe, miili yetu haijachagua uwezo wa kuhimili mzigo huu wa vimelea; hivyo, wakati mamalia wengine wanaweza “kujisafisha” bila athari, binadamu lazima tuepuke uchafu wowote ili kuepuka maambukizi na madhara makubwa ya kiafya.

Mbwa wengine hupata mbolea ya farasi na matone ya goose ya kupendeza. Kula poo yao wenyewe haina madhara, lakini kula poo kutoka kwa wanyama wengine kunaweza kusababisha shida za kiafya ikiwa kinyesi kimechafuliwa na vimelea, virusi, au sumu. Content: Mtu anayeingiza kinyesi cha binadamu au wanyama anaweza kuwa katika hatari ya kuambukizwa virusi kadhaa, bakteria, au vimelea.

Vimelea kama vile Cryptosporidium na Giardia vinaweza kusababisha dalili ikiwa ni pamoja na kuhara na upungufu wa maji mwilini.


Daktari anaweza kuagiza dawa ili kuondoa vimelea.


Hepatitis A ni ugonjwa wa ini ambao unaweza kupitisha kwa mtu ikiwa wataingiza kinyesi kilichochafuliwa.

claim: Acetaminophen (Tylenol) hupunguza maumivu na homa lakini haiathiri uvimbe, na ina uwezekano mdogo wa kusababisha matatizo ya tumbo kuliko dawa nyingi nyingine za OTC
question_src: Ikiwa ninahitaji unafuu wa maumivu, nije kujua kama kuchagua kati ya aspirini, Tylenol, Advil, nk? Zote zinaitwa kama kupunguza maumivu.
report_src: Chaguo lako la dawa ya maumivu linategemea aina ya dalili na hatari zako. Acetaminophen (Tylenol) hupunguza maumivu na homa lakini haiathiri uvimbe, na ina uwezekano mdogo wa kusababisha matatizo ya tumbo kuliko dawa nyingi nyingine za OTC [1]. Ibuprofen (Advil) ni NSAID inayopunguza homa, maumivu na uvimbe, na ni bora kwa maumivu ya hedhi, kichwa, meno, mgongo, misuli na gout [2]. Naproxen (Aleve) pia ni NSAID na hutoa unafuu sawa na ibuprofen kwa maumivu ya hedhi, mgongo, homa, kichwa, meno na arthritis [3]. Aspirini ni NSAID ya muda mrefu inayotumika kwa maumivu ya kichwa, meno na homa [4]. Kwa hivyo, ikiwa maumivu yako yanahusisha uvimbe (k.v. arthritis, maumivu ya misuli), chagua ibuprofen, naproxen au aspirini; ikiwa hutaki athari nyingi za tumbo au unahitaji tu kupunguza homa/maumivu yasiyo na uvimbe, acetaminophen ni salama zaidi. Kila dawa ina hatari zake (kama vidonda vya tumbo, shinikizo la damu au uharibifu wa ini), kwa hivyo fuata kipimo sahihi na wasiliana na mtoa huduma wako wa afya ikiwa una magonjwa sugu au unatumia dawa nyingine za damu.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Which OTC Pain Reliever Is the Right Choice for You? (www.webmd.com)
Content: ## Acetaminophen


This type of medication works on the parts of your brain that receive pain messages and control your body temperature. It can ease pain and lower a fever, but it won’t reduce any swelling and inflammation.


It may be a good choice to treat a headache, arthritis pain, or a fever.


Bonus:Acetaminophen is less likely to cause stomach issues than other OTC pain-relievers.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Je! Ni chaguo gani cha maumivu ya OTC ndio chaguo sahihi kwako? (www.webmd.com)
Content: ## Ibuprofen


Dawa hii ni aina ya dawa ya kuzuia uchochezi isiyo na uchochezi (NSAID) ambayo hupunguza fevers, maumivu, na uchochezi. NSAIDs hufanya kazi kwa kupunguza kiwango cha vitu kama homoni inayoitwa prostaglandins. Hizo husababisha hisia za maumivu kwa kukasirisha mwisho wako wa ujasiri. Kwa hivyo ikiwa unayo kidogo, utahisi bora.


Ibuprofen inaweza kuwa chaguo nzuri kwa kutibu tumbo la hedhi, maumivu ya kichwa, maumivu ya meno, maumivu ya mgongo, ugonjwa wa arthritis, misuli ya misuli, na gout.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Je! Ni chaguo gani cha maumivu ya OTC ndio chaguo sahihi kwako? (www.webmd.com)
Content: ## Naproxen


Hii ni NSAID nyingine ambayo husaidia na maumivu. Inafanya kazi vivyo hivyo kwa Ibuprofen, na inapunguza uchochezi na fevers pia.


Inaweza kuwa chaguo nzuri kwa kutibu tumbo la hedhi, maumivu ya nyuma, homa, maumivu ya kichwa, maumivu ya meno, na ugonjwa wa arthritis.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Je! Ni chaguo gani cha maumivu ya OTC ndio chaguo sahihi kwako? (www.webmd.com)
Content: ## Aspirini


Asili yake ya kupunguza maumivu inarudi zaidi ya miaka 2000. Lakini aspirini ambayo unaweza kuwa nayo katika baraza lako la mawaziri la dawa leo imetoka mbali. Ni katika darasa la NSAID la meds.


Inaweza kuwa chaguo nzuri kwa kutibu maumivu ya kichwa, maumivu ya meno, homa, na homa.

Ibuprofen (Advil) ni NSAID inayopunguza homa, maumivu na uvimbe, na ni bora kwa maumivu ya hedhi, kichwa, meno, mgongo, misuli na gout [2].
Naproxen (Aleve) pia ni NSAID na hutoa unafuu sawa na ibuprofen kwa maumivu ya hedhi, mgongo, homa, kichwa, meno na arthritis [3].
Aspirini ni NSAID ya muda mrefu inayotumika kwa maumivu ya kichwa, meno na homa [4].
Kwa hivyo, ikiwa maumivu yako yanahusisha uvimbe (k.v.
arthritis, maumivu ya misuli), chagua ibuprofen, naproxen au aspirini; ikiwa hutaki athari nyingi za tumbo au unahitaji tu kupunguza homa/maumivu yasiyo na uvimbe, acetaminophen ni salama zaidi.

Kila dawa ina hatari zake (kama vidonda vya tumbo, shinikizo la damu au uharibifu wa ini), kwa hivyo fuata kipimo sahihi na wasiliana na mtoa huduma wako wa afya ikiwa una magonjwa sugu au unatumia dawa nyingine za damu.
claims_retained: Acetaminophen (Tylenol) hupunguza maumivu na homa lakini haiathiri uvimbe, na ina uwezekano mdogo wa kusababisha matatizo ya tumbo kuliko dawa nyingi nyingine za OTC [1].

Aspirini ni NSAID ya muda mrefu inayotumika kwa maumivu ya kichwa, meno na homa [4].

Document ID: 2
Title: Which OTC Pain Reliever Is the Right Choice for You? (www.webmd.com)
Content: ## Ibuprofen


This medication is a type of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces fevers, pain, and inflammation. NSAIDs work by lowering the amount of hormone-like substances called prostaglandins. Those cause the feeling of pain by irritating your nerve endings. So if you have less, you'll feel better.


Ibuprofen may be a good choice for treating menstrual cramps, headaches, toothaches, backaches, arthritis, muscle strains, and gout.

claim: Sayari zilianza kama makundi ya vumbi na gesi ambayo yalipokua yalipata kizio chao cha mvuto wenyewe
question_src: Kwa nini kuna sayari za mviringo tu? Kwa nini hakuwezi kuwa na mraba au mstatili?
report_src: Sayari zilianza kama makundi ya vumbi na gesi ambayo yalipokua yalipata kizio chao cha mvuto wenyewe [1]. Mvuto huo huvuta nyenzo kwa usawa kutoka kila upande kuelekea kitovu, na kwa sababu sayari changa zilikuwa zimeyeyuka kama vimiminika, muundo pekee unaoruhusu kila chembe kuwa karibu zaidi na kituo ni duara kamili—mchakato uitwao “marekebisho ya isostatic” [1]. Ili sayari idumu kama mstatili au mraba, nguvu ya kimuundo ya miamba ingebidi ishinde mvuto katika pembe na kingo zake, jambo lisilowezekana kwa miili mikubwa ambako mvuto hushinda uimara wa kimaunzi [4]. Miili midogo kama asteroidi yenye kipenyo cha takriban kilomita 20 haina mvuto wa kutosha kuvunja miamba yake, hivyo hubaki na maumbo yasiyo ya duara—lakini ikifikia ukubwa wa sayari, hali hii haitoshi tena [4]. Hata hivyo, sayari si nyanja timilifu; mzunguko wao huwasukuma kidogo kwenye ikweta na kuwafanya kuwa “spheroid” iliyopanuka, kadiri kasi ya mzunguko inavyoongezeka [2]. Ndiyo maana tunaona sayari zilizojongeka kidogo lakini hakuna “sayari za mraba.”

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Why Are All Planets Spheres? (www.wonderopolis.org)
Content: The spherical shape of all the planets can be explained by one force that we're all familiar with: gravity. When the planets in our solar system began to form, space was filled with billions and billions of pieces of dust and gas.


As these pieces bumped into each other, they began to form clumps that slowly grew larger and larger. Eventually these clumps of material grew large enough to develop their own gravitational fields.


As the forming planets continued to grow, the force of the collisions with additional matter caused them to become hot and molten, acting much like a liquid. Each planet's gravitational force is centered at its core. It pulls equally in every direction from the core, thus pulling all the molten material into a spherical shape. Scientists call this process "isostatic adjustment."
---

Title: Kwa nini sayari ziko karibu spherical? (Sayansi.HowStuffworks.com)
Content: "Lakini mvuto sio hadithi nzima," anasema Carpenter. Wakati nguvu ya nguvu ya nguvu ya kutoa sayari za spherical, kasi ya mzunguko wao ni wakati huo huo kujaribu kuziba. Kwa haraka mwili wa mbinguni, hugawanyika zaidi kwa usawa wake. "Hii ndio sababu hakuna nyanja kamili katika mfumo wetu wa jua ... tu wasaidizi wa spheroids," Carpenter anatuambia. "Jua ni karibu na nyanja kamili, kwa sababu ya mvuto wake mkubwa na kiwango cha polepole cha siku 25. Asilimia kubwa ya nyota angani huzunguka haraka na bulge dhahiri kwa ikweta zao."

Content: Derek Sears, profesa wa cosmochemistry katika Chuo Kikuu cha Arkansas, anaelezea.


Sayari ni pande zote kwa sababu uwanja wao wa mvuto hufanya kana kwamba unatoka katikati ya mwili na huvuta kila kitu kuelekea hiyo. Pamoja na mwili wake mkubwa na inapokanzwa ndani kutoka kwa vitu vyenye mionzi, sayari hufanya kama maji, na kwa muda mrefu wa muda hujitokeza kwa kuvuta kwa mvuto kutoka katikati ya mvuto. Njia pekee ya kupata misa yote karibu na kituo cha mvuto wa sayari iwezekanavyo ni kuunda nyanja. Jina la kiufundi kwa mchakato huu ni "marekebisho ya isostatic."


Na miili midogo zaidi, kama vile asteroids ya kilomita 20 ambayo tumeona katika picha za hivi karibuni za spacecraft, kuvuta kwa mvuto ni dhaifu sana kushinda nguvu ya mitambo ya asteroid. Kama matokeo, miili hii haifanyi nyanja. Badala yake wanadumisha maumbo ya kawaida, ya vipande.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Why Are All Planets Spheres? (www.wonderopolis.org)
Content: The spherical shape of all the planets can be explained by one force that we're all familiar with: gravity. When the planets in our solar system began to form, space was filled with billions and billions of pieces of dust and gas.


As these pieces bumped into each other, they began to form clumps that slowly grew larger and larger. Eventually these clumps of material grew large enough to develop their own gravitational fields.


As the forming planets continued to grow, the force of the collisions with additional matter caused them to become hot and molten, acting much like a liquid. Each planet's gravitational force is centered at its core. It pulls equally in every direction from the core, thus pulling all the molten material into a spherical shape. Scientists call this process "isostatic adjustment."

Document ID: 4
Title: Why are planets round? (www.scientificamerican.com)
Content: Derek Sears, professor of cosmochemistry at the University of Arkansas, explains.


Planets are round because their gravitational field acts as though it originates from the center of the body and pulls everything toward it. With its large body and internal heating from radioactive elements, a planet behaves like a fluid, and over long periods of time succumbs to the gravitational pull from its center of gravity. The only way to get all the mass as close to planet's center of gravity as possible is to form a sphere. The technical name for this process is "isostatic adjustment."


With much smaller bodies, such as the 20-kilometer asteroids we have seen in recent spacecraft images, the gravitational pull is too weak to overcome the asteroid's mechanical strength. As a result, these bodies do not form spheres. Rather they maintain irregular, fragmentary shapes.

Document ID: 2
Title: Why Are Planets Almost Spherical? (science.howstuffworks.com)
Content: "But gravity is not the whole story," says Carpenter. While gravity conspires to render the planets spherical, the speed of their rotations is simultaneously trying to flatten them. The faster a celestial body spins, the more disproportionate its equatorial bulge gets. "This is why there are no perfect spheres in our solar system ... only oblate spheroids," Carpenter tells us. "The sun is almost a perfect sphere, due to its immense gravity and relatively slow rotation rate of 25 days. A significant percentage of stars in the sky rotate much faster and bulge noticeably at their equators."

Title: An estimated 90% of adults in the US have fillings — here's why we can't just regrow our teeth (www.businessinsider.com)
Content: Mammals, on the other hand, developed more specific diets. Like grazers who only eat grass and hunters who rip flesh from their kills. As a result, mammals evolved different shaped teeth for different purposes. And it's this difference, that could also explain why most mammals can't regrow more teeth.


Now, let's say you could regrow your molars multiple times, for example. It's important that the top and bottoms sets match up. Otherwise, they can't grind up food as efficiently. It sounds good in principle, but with each new set, there's a risk that the regrown teeth won't line up. So the leading theory is that adult humans can't regrow our teeth because it was better for survival to only grow one, well-aligned adult set.

Content: Only a handful of mammals can regrow teeth multiple times, compared to the 50,000 species of reptiles and fish. Take geckos, for example, who will replace all 100 teeth, or so, every 3 to 4 months. And since geckos can live for 6 to 10 years, they'll grow anywhere from 1,800 to 4,000 teeth in a lifetime! It's all thanks to a special type of cell in their gums, called stem cells.


Stem cells are handy because they can morph into different cells when needed. Like tooth stem cells to build new teeth. Humans have these stem cells when we're younger. But after our adult teeth grow in, the stem cells die and disappear.

Title: Automatic Transmission Fluid - an overview (www.sciencedirect.com)
Content: Automatic transmissions (wet clutches) require hydrodynamic clutches, torque converters and wet brakes. Title: Longboards Vs. Skateboards (www.redbull.com)
Content: If you put a longboard and skateboard side by side, you'll notice how flat the nose and tail of the longboard are. On a skateboard, you'll see more of a curve on its nose and tail to make it easier to land tricks and flips.

It should be no surprise that longboards are, of course, longer. They can be as long as 59 inches, while the typical skateboard is around 36 inches. Here's where it gets confusing: longboards also come in sizes as small as 28 inches long. If the length trips you up, just remember the key difference between the two is that longboards are flat and skateboards curve. So, if you see a flat, shorter board, it's probably just a short longboard.

Title: Longboard VS Skateboard – Pros, Cons, and Differences – BoardCoast (www.boardcoast.com)
Content: Longboards are typically much longer and wider than skateboards. They also have different types of wheels. Longboards have large, soft wheels whereas skateboards have small, hard wheels. Longboards are also much more flexible and tend to be easier to ride for beginners.

The soft wheels on a longboard are great for riding, and rolling over cracks and small debris at high speeds, but they are bouncier than hard wheels. Typically you don’t want to use soft wheels when performing tricks because the board can possibly bounce back up after the wheels hit the pavement. It makes it much more difficult to land tricks and remain stable.

The trucks of skateboards and longboards are also different. Skateboards have small trucks, that stay underneath the board but longboards have wide trucks with a different design. Wide trucks provide more stability which is needed at high speeds.

claim: Wanawake wa Marekani hujikuta wakicheza mpira wa laini badala ya baseball kwa sababu mnyororo rasmi wa baseball kwa wanawake ulivunjwa baada ya Vita vya Pili vya Dunia, kisha katika miaka ya 1950 wanawake “walirudishwa nyumbani” na baseball ya kibiashara kwao ikafa kabisa
question_src: Je! Kwa nini wanawake kawaida hucheza mpira wa laini badala ya baseball huko Merika?
report_src: Wanawake wa Marekani hujikuta wakicheza mpira wa laini badala ya baseball kwa sababu mnyororo rasmi wa baseball kwa wanawake ulivunjwa baada ya Vita vya Pili vya Dunia, kisha katika miaka ya 1950 wanawake “walirudishwa nyumbani” na baseball ya kibiashara kwao ikafa kabisa [1]. Sheria ya Kichwa IX ya 1972 ilipoamuru fursa sawa za michezo shuleni, haikutaja lazima baseball; shule ziliruhusiwa kutoa “mchezo sawia,” na zikachagua softball, hivyo kisheria ziliweza kuwakataa wasichana waliotaka baseball bora mradi timu ya softball ipo [2]. Wakati Little League iliporuhusu msichana wa miaka 12 kucheza 1972, uongozi wake ulitishia kufuta ushirika wa timu hiyo na badala yake ukaanzisha ligi mahususi ya softball, hatua iliyoimarisha zaidi mwanzo wa wasichana kwenye softball kuliko baseball [1]. Matokeo yake, katika ngazi za shule ya upili na vyuo, softball ndilo mchezo rasmi wa wanawake, hivyo wasichana wanaotamani ufadhili wa masomo au uchezaji wa kisasa hukabiliwa na shinikizo “kuhama kutoka baseball hadi softball” ili kuepuka upweke na kupata nafasi za udhamini [3]. Mfumo huu wa kimfumo na kihistoria ndicho husababisha wanawake wengi Marekani leo kucheza softball badala ya baseball.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Why Can’t American Women Play Baseball? (www.thedailybeast.com)
Content: However, like so many advancements for U.S. women during World War II, baseball later ceased to be a professional option. “In the 1950s, we shoved women out of everything,” Ring said. “We have this unfortunate decade for women in American history. It’s a decade when women are sent back into the home.”


With the women’s liberation movement and Title IX, sports reemerged in the 1970s for women, but baseball did not. “Baseball never turned a corner and opened the doors to women,” said Ring.


Indeed, there’s evidence there was a concerted effort to keep girls out of baseball. In 1972, the national Little League organization threatened to revoke the charter of a team in Hoboken, New Jersey, because they allowed 12-year-old Maria Pepe to play. The National Organization for Women took on the case and successfully sued to allow for Pepe and other girls to be able to try out. In response to the pressure, Little League created Little League Softball.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Kwa nini usiwaache wasichana kucheza baseball badala ya laini? (www.carolinacoastonline.com)
Content: Wakati Kichwa IX, sheria ya 1972 ambayo ilihitaji ufadhili sawa kwa timu za michezo za kiume na za kike, hatimaye zilionekana, wanawake walipewa msingi mzuri karibu kila mchezo.


Baseball haikuwa kwenye orodha hiyo, ingawa. Badala yake, sheria iliamuru kwamba shule lazima itoe mchezo sawa, na kwa hali hiyo, ilikuwa laini. Kwa hivyo, shule zilikuwa ndani ya haki yao ya kukataa wasichana ambao walikuwa wanavutiwa na baseball kwa muda mrefu kama timu ya mpira wa miguu ilitolewa.


Tangu wakati huo, wanawake kote nchini, na sasa ulimwengu, wamepigania nafasi ya kucheza kwenye timu ya baseball ya shule yao. Wengine wamefanikiwa, na wengi wameshindwa, lakini hakuna aliyefanya athari kubwa.

Document ID: 3
Title: Je! Wanawake watacheza baseball kubwa ya ligi? (Na sio tu kwenye Runinga) (www.nytimes.com)
Content: Baseball ya wanawake sio mchezo wa shule ya upili nchini Merika, ingawa ni katika mataifa mengine, kama Canada na Japan. Katika nchi hii, wasichana wameelekezwa kwa mpira wa miguu, ambayo ni mchezo wa wanawake katika shule ya upili na kiwango cha pamoja, Dk. Ring anasema.


"Ikiwa msichana hapa anataka kucheza baseball, karibu lazima kucheza na wavulana na shinikizo la kubadili kutoka baseball hadi laini inaweza kuwa kubwa," anasema. "Watu watamwambia, unakosa masomo ya vyuo vikuu" na pia wanaweza kupendekeza kwamba anaumiza mwili wake wote na uwezekano wa wapinzani wa kiume ikiwa atashikamana na mpira wa miguu.


Kucheza baseball wasomi pia inaweza kuwa mpweke sana kwa mwanamke, anasema Bi Hudek, mchezaji wa chuo kikuu cha Bossier na mmoja wa vijana waliofanikiwa zaidi wa kike wa miaka ya hivi karibuni.

Title: Why Can’t American Women Play Baseball? (www.thedailybeast.com)
Content: However, like so many advancements for U.S. women during World War II, baseball later ceased to be a professional option. “In the 1950s, we shoved women out of everything,” Ring said. “We have this unfortunate decade for women in American history. It’s a decade when women are sent back into the home.”


With the women’s liberation movement and Title IX, sports reemerged in the 1970s for women, but baseball did not. “Baseball never turned a corner and opened the doors to women,” said Ring.


Indeed, there’s evidence there was a concerted effort to keep girls out of baseball. In 1972, the national Little League organization threatened to revoke the charter of a team in Hoboken, New Jersey, because they allowed 12-year-old Maria Pepe to play. The National Organization for Women took on the case and successfully sued to allow for Pepe and other girls to be able to try out. In response to the pressure, Little League created Little League Softball.

Title: Will Women Play Major League Baseball? (And Not Just on TV) (www.nytimes.com)
Content: Women’s baseball is not a high school sport in the United States, although it is in other nations, like Canada and Japan. In this country, girls are directed to softball, which is a women’s sport at the high school and collegiate level, Dr. Ring says.


“If a girl here wants to play baseball, she almost has to play with the boys and the pressure to switch from baseball to softball can be overwhelming,” she says. “People will tell her, you’re missing out on college scholarships” and may also suggest that she is hurting both her body and possibly male opponents’ egos if she sticks with hardball.


Playing elite baseball also can be profoundly lonely for a woman, says Ms. Hudek, the Bossier Parish college player and one of the most successful young female pitchers of recent years.

question_src: Je! Kwa nini 'mchanga wa haraka' hufanya uweke na mchanga huenda wapi?
report_src: “Mchanga wa haraka” ni tabaka la chembe ndogo (k.m. mchanga au silt) lililosheheni maji kutoka chanzo cha chini ya ardhi, hivyo hutenda kama tope lenye maji mengi kuliko mshikamano; unapokanyaga, shinikizo husababisha maji kupenya kati ya chembe, kupunguza msuguano na kuyaachia yateleze, ndipo mwili huanza “kuzama” kwa sababu mchanga unakuwa kama kioevu [1]. Unazama tu hadi uzito wako uwe sawa na uzito wa mchanganyiko wa mchanga-maji uliouhama; kwa kuwa wiani wa mchanga wa haraka ni takriban 2 g/ml dhidi ya 1 g/ml ya mwili wa binadamu, kawaida mtu hufikia mstari wa kiuno kisha kusimama kuelea, isipokuwa akijaribu kupambana [2]. Chembe zilizosukumwa kando ya miguu hujiweka tena juu yako, na kadiri mwendo unavyopungua maji huruhusu mchanga kutulia na kuunda “kitanda” kipya cha nusu-ngumu kinachokukaza, ndiyo maana kujitoa ni kugumu—nafaka nzito zaidi hukushikilia mahali pamoja badala ya “kutoweka” [3]. Hivyo, mchanga hauendi mbali; hushamiri kama tope lenye mtiririko wakati wa msukumo kisha hurudi kuwa safu ngumu karibu na mwathiriwa unapoacha kusogea.

Title: Will Quicksand Really Kill You? (thescienceexplorer.com)
Content: In fact, studies have found it is impossible to be completely submerged in quicksand because humans are less dense than quicksand and a person would only sink to their chest before they begin to float.


But what can make quicksand deadly is its ability to trap and hold unsuspecting victims.


Quicksand occurs when fine sediment such as clay, sand, silt, or other grainy soil becomes saturated with water, typically from a subterranean source. Often these traps are found near the periphery or edge of natural water sources. Often the sand on top may appear solid, but with the added pressure of a footstep, the sand will mix with the water beneath it forming a thick sludge.

question_src: Je! Walifanyaje misa ya Phillae ya Comet ilitua?
report_src: Ili kupata thamani ya wingi wa kometi ambamo kitoro cha Philae kiliwasili, wahandisi wa ESA kwanza walikusanya picha za dijiti zenye azimio kubwa kutoka kamera mbalimbali za Rosetta na kuziunganisha katika ramani ya eneo, kisha wakaunda mfano wa kijiometri wa “mesh” ulio na paneli za pembetatu unaozunguka uso wa kometi; mfano huu uliwapa ujazo sahihi wa mwili huo mbinguni [1]. Hatua iliyofuata ilikuwa kupima “kuvuta kwa mvuto” (gravitational tug) wa kometi hiyo kwa kufuatilia mabadiliko madogo katika mwendo wa Rosetta na Philae zinapokaribia na kuzunguka kometi, kisha kutumia usambazaji huo wa mvuto kwenye mfano wa umbo uliokwishapimwa; kwa kulinganisha nguvu ya mvuto iliyopimwa na ujazo uliohesabiwa, timu iliweza kuamua msongamano (density) na hatimaye kukokotoa wingi kamili wa kometi kwa kutumia uhusiano ρ = m/V [1]. Njia hii ya kuchanganya ramani ya uso-3D na vipimo vya mvuto ndiyo iliruhusu ESA kujua kadirio la wingi wa kometi kabla na baada ya kutua kwa Philae, bila kuhitaji kuchimba ndani ya mwili wa kometi.

Content: To land on the comet, the ESA had to figure out the best way to orbit Rosetta around it. Rosetta has to be in front of the comet for the best light conditions from the sun. Using high-resolution digital images collected from several cameras on the spacecraft, including a wide angle lens, and scientific cameras to help map the area, the team generated a triangular orbit pattern around the comet. The challenge is now to figure out the gravitational pull of the comet. A pyramid shape allows them to better receive and analyze that data, eventually figuring out the density and mass of the comet.

question_src: Je! Hali ya hewa au dhoruba zinaweza kudhibitiwa au mwanadamu? Ikiwa ni hivyo, kwa kiwango gani na vipi?
report_src: Ndiyo, binadamu anaweza kuathiri hali ya hewa lakini kwa kiwango kidogo na kwa muda mfupi; mbinu kuu ni “cloud seeding,” ambapo chembe za iodini ya fedha au chumvi hupuliziwa ndani ya mawingu ili kuchochea mvua, kupunguza ukubwa wa mawe ya mvua au kufukuza ukungu karibu na viwanja vya ndege [1]. Hata hivyo, utafiti wa zaidi ya miaka 30 umeonyesha matokeo yasiyotabirika, na sayansi haijathibitisha ufanisi wa uhakika wa mbinu hizi [1]. Uchunguzi Afrika Kusini na Mexico umebaini kuwa miche ya mawingu ya joto kwa chumvi inaweza kufanya kazi vizuri zaidi kuliko ile ya iodini ya fedha, lakini bado ni urekebishaji mdogo badala ya udhibiti kamili [1]. China imedai kuweza kuhakikisha siku fulani kuwa na mvua au jua, mfano wakati wa ufunguzi wa Olimpiki ya Beijing 2008, ingawa madai hayo hayajathibitishwa kwa upana [1]. Kwa jumla, hatuna uwezo wa kuongoza dhoruba kubwa kama vimbunga au kubadilisha mifumo ya hali ya hewa duniani; tunachoweza ni kurekebisha matukio madogo ndani ya eneo dogo kwa muda mfupi.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Can we control the weather? (science.howstuffworks.com)
Content: Finally, scientists had found a way to control the weather -- at least in the lab. For the next 30 years, researchers and entrepreneurs across the world began applying the principles developed by Langmuir, Schaefer and Vonnegut to real-world cloud seeding. They flew airplanes into the clouds, releasing their own clouds of silver iodide as they went, or fired artillery shells filled with silver iodide into clouds. In some cases, these weather modifiers were trying to produce rain in drought-afflicted areas, mitigate hail damage by preventing hailstones from growing so large, or disperse fog banks around airports. Many proprietors of this new technology made audacious claims about their cloud seeding services. Unfortunately, hard science could never substantiate the claims. If anything, rigorous experimentation seemed to suggest that cloud seeding barely worked or, worse, didn't work at all.

Still, enough tantalizing evidence has accumulated over the years to keep interest in weather modification alive. For example, research conducted in South Africa and Mexico has shown that seeding warm rain clouds with salt particles -- what is known as hygroscopic seeding -- is more effective than seeding cold rain clouds with silver iodide. And Chinese scientists believe they have mastered cloud seeding to such a degree that they can guarantee a certain day will be rainy or sunny, like say the opening ceremony of the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, as this related article describes.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Vita vipya vya Ulimwengu: Vita vya hali ya hewa (www.newworldwar.org)
Content: Mgomo wa umeme wa usahihi na umeme wa syntetisk pia inawezekana. Kitabu cha 2005, Silaha Daraja: Jinsi Vita vya kisasa vilizaa ulimwengu wetu wa hali ya juu, ilisema kwamba umeme wa bandia ulikuwa umekamilika kwa kutumia lasers. Mtu ameripotiwa alikuwa na anuwai ya mita 200, lakini inaweza kupanuliwa hadi maili 2. Vita vya hali ya hewa ya 1997: Pentagon inapanga hali ya hewa kama nakala ya silaha na New York Times ilibaini kuwa Jeshi la anga la Amerika lilikuwa likifikiria kutumia lasers kama hizo kwa shambulio la umeme.

Jeshi la Anga la Amerika yenyewe lilirejelewa kwa kutumia migomo ya umeme iliyodhibitiwa kushambulia malengo yake. Tofflers walipendekeza kwamba lasers inaweza kutumika hata kukata shimo kwenye safu ya ozoni juu ya ardhi ya adui.

Haarp

Kulingana na habari hii, muundo wa hali ya hewa unawezekana kwa kutumia mawimbi ya umeme. Katika Amerika na nchi zingine, majukwaa makubwa ya silaha kukamilisha hii yanaonekana kuwa yameundwa.2

Silaha moja kama hiyo inajulikana kama Mradi wa Utafiti wa Auroral Active Active (HAARP). Hata hivyo, utafiti wa zaidi ya miaka 30 umeonyesha matokeo yasiyotabirika, na sayansi haijathibitisha ufanisi wa uhakika wa mbinu hizi [1]. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Can we control the weather? (science.howstuffworks.com)
Content: Finally, scientists had found a way to control the weather -- at least in the lab. For the next 30 years, researchers and entrepreneurs across the world began applying the principles developed by Langmuir, Schaefer and Vonnegut to real-world cloud seeding. They flew airplanes into the clouds, releasing their own clouds of silver iodide as they went, or fired artillery shells filled with silver iodide into clouds. In some cases, these weather modifiers were trying to produce rain in drought-afflicted areas, mitigate hail damage by preventing hailstones from growing so large, or disperse fog banks around airports. Many proprietors of this new technology made audacious claims about their cloud seeding services. Unfortunately, hard science could never substantiate the claims. If anything, rigorous experimentation seemed to suggest that cloud seeding barely worked or, worse, didn't work at all.

Still, enough tantalizing evidence has accumulated over the years to keep interest in weather modification alive. For example, research conducted in South Africa and Mexico has shown that seeding warm rain clouds with salt particles -- what is known as hygroscopic seeding -- is more effective than seeding cold rain clouds with silver iodide. And Chinese scientists believe they have mastered cloud seeding to such a degree that they can guarantee a certain day will be rainy or sunny, like say the opening ceremony of the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, as this related article describes.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Vita vipya vya Ulimwengu: Vita vya hali ya hewa (www.newworldwar.org)
Content: Mgomo wa umeme wa usahihi na umeme wa syntetisk pia inawezekana. Kitabu cha 2005, Silaha Daraja: Jinsi Vita vya kisasa vilizaa ulimwengu wetu wa hali ya juu, ilisema kwamba umeme wa bandia ulikuwa umekamilika kwa kutumia lasers. Mtu ameripotiwa alikuwa na anuwai ya mita 200, lakini inaweza kupanuliwa hadi maili 2. Vita vya hali ya hewa ya 1997: Pentagon inapanga hali ya hewa kama nakala ya silaha na New York Times ilibaini kuwa Jeshi la anga la Amerika lilikuwa likifikiria kutumia lasers kama hizo kwa shambulio la umeme.

Jeshi la Anga la Amerika yenyewe lilirejelewa kwa kutumia migomo ya umeme iliyodhibitiwa kushambulia malengo yake. Tofflers walipendekeza kwamba lasers inaweza kutumika hata kukata shimo kwenye safu ya ozoni juu ya ardhi ya adui.

Haarp

Kulingana na habari hii, muundo wa hali ya hewa unawezekana kwa kutumia mawimbi ya umeme. Katika Amerika na nchi zingine, majukwaa makubwa ya silaha kukamilisha hii yanaonekana kuwa yameundwa.2

Silaha moja kama hiyo inajulikana kama Mradi wa Utafiti wa Auroral Active Active (HAARP). Katika kitabu chao Malaika hawacheza hii Haarp: Maendeleo katika Teknolojia ya Tesla, Jeane Manning na Dk Nick Begich hurejelea kama moja ya silaha zenye nguvu zaidi za kusudi nyingi zilizotengenezwa na jeshi la Merika.

prompt:

Title: Je! Tunaweza kudhibiti hali ya hewa? (Sayansi.HowStuffworks.com)
Content: Mwishowe, wanasayansi walikuwa wamepata njia ya kudhibiti hali ya hewa - angalau katika maabara. Kwa miaka 30 ijayo, watafiti na wafanyabiashara kote ulimwenguni walianza kutumia kanuni zilizotengenezwa na Langmuir, Schaefer na Vonnegut kwa miche ya wingu ya ulimwengu wa kweli. Waliruka ndege ndani ya mawingu, wakitoa mawingu yao wenyewe ya iodini ya fedha wakati wanaenda, au kurusha ganda la sanaa lililojazwa na iodini ya fedha ndani ya mawingu. Katika hali nyingine, modifiers hizi za hali ya hewa zilikuwa zinajaribu kutoa mvua katika maeneo yenye ukame, kupunguza uharibifu wa mvua ya mawe kwa kuzuia mawe ya mvua ya mawe kutoka kwa kubwa, au kutawanya benki za ukungu kuzunguka viwanja vya ndege. Wamiliki wengi wa teknolojia hii mpya walifanya madai mazuri juu ya huduma zao za miche ya wingu. Kwa bahati mbaya, sayansi ngumu haiwezi kamwe kudai madai hayo. Ikiwa kuna chochote, majaribio magumu yalionekana kupendekeza kwamba miche ya wingu haifanyi kazi au, mbaya zaidi, haikufanya kazi hata kidogo.

Bado, ushahidi wa kutosha wa kutatanisha umekusanyika kwa miaka ili kuweka shauku katika muundo wa hali ya hewa hai. Kwa mfano, utafiti uliofanywa nchini Afrika Kusini na Mexico umeonyesha kuwa miche ya mvua ya joto na chembe za chumvi - kile kinachojulikana kama miche ya mseto - ni bora zaidi kuliko miche ya mvua ya mvua na iodini ya fedha. Na wanasayansi wa China wanaamini kuwa wamepata miche ya wingu kwa kiwango kwamba wanaweza kuhakikisha kuwa siku fulani itakuwa ya mvua au ya jua, kama inavyosema sherehe ya ufunguzi wa Olimpiki ya Majira ya 2008 huko Beijing, kama nakala hii inayohusiana.

Content: A precision lightning strike with synthetic lightning is also possible. The 2005 book, Weapons Grade: How Modern Warfare Gave Birth to Our High-Tech World, mentioned that artificial lightning had been accomplished using lasers. The 1997 Weather Wars: Pentagon Plans Weather as a Weapon article by the New York Times noted that the US Air Force was considering using such lasers for lightning attacks.

The US Air Force itself referenced using controlled lightning strikes to attack its targets. The Tofflers suggested that lasers can even be used to cut holes in the ozone layer above the land of an adversary.

HAARP

According to this information, weather modification is possible using electromagnetic waves. In the US and other countries, large weapons platforms to accomplish this appear to have been created.2

Document ID: 3
Title: How does a lake freeze? (whyfiles.org)
Content: As winter sets in, lakes lose energy to the atmosphere, and water near the surface cools, becomes more dense, and sinks. Warmer, less dense water under the surface will rise to replace this surface water. When the entire lake reaches 40 F, the surface water cools further, dropping below 40 F. Because this water is now less dense than the surrounding water, it will stay on the top and continue to cool.


Once the surface water falls to 32 F, it freezes. The freezing then spreads downward into the lake and the ice thickens. Unless the lake is very shallow, you will find liquid water below the ice. This deeper water is about 40 F

Content: As you all know, water freezes at 32 degrees Fahrenheit. That doesn’t mean, however, when the air temp reaches 32 the lakes freeze. Water is a great insulator and good at holding heat, which is why the lake temperature doesn’t fluctuate much day to day like the air does. Therefore, below freezing temperatures are needed for a week or more to form ice on a large lake.

Hata hivyo, cores ni idadi ya vitengo vya usindikaji huru; kwa mfano, prosesa mbili-msingi 3.0 GHz ina vitengo viwili vinavyoendesha kila kimoja kwa 3.0 GHz [4].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Dreaming of the Future (www.psychologytoday.com)
Content: Throughout history, people have believed that prophetic dreams can give us glimpses of future events. Is there any reason to believe such dreams are possible?


It would seem not. Most instances of a dream predicting a significant event in waking life are probably just coincidences. For example, people periodically dream of car crashes, so at some point, a person will dream of a car crash the night before actually getting in a car crash. That’s not prophecy, that’s just the law of averages. The claims people make about future-telling dreams are most likely to be fantasies, fabrications, or failures of causal reasoning.


That may be the safest position to take. It’s not the most scientific position, however, because it isn’t based on evidence, just a resolute skepticism. The actual evidence in support of anticipatory dreaming is not so easily dismissed and merits more serious attention than it typically receives.
---

claim: Mfumo wa reli wa Merika ni dhaifu kwa sababu kadhaa: kwanza, nchi haina mtandao wa kweli wa reli ya kasi kubwa; sehemu pekee inayokaribia viwango hivyo ni Acela, ambayo hukimbia maili 34 tu kwa 150 mph kwenye njia yake ya jumla ya maili 457 na hivyo kufikia wastani wa 65 mph kati ya New York na Boston, kiwango kinachoshindwa na mifumo ya Asia na Ulaya
question_src: Kwa nini mfumo wa reli ya Merika ni mbaya sana?
report_src: Mfumo wa reli wa Merika ni dhaifu kwa sababu kadhaa: kwanza, nchi haina mtandao wa kweli wa reli ya kasi kubwa; sehemu pekee inayokaribia viwango hivyo ni Acela, ambayo hukimbia maili 34 tu kwa 150 mph kwenye njia yake ya jumla ya maili 457 na hivyo kufikia wastani wa 65 mph kati ya New York na Boston, kiwango kinachoshindwa na mifumo ya Asia na Ulaya [1]. Pili, miradi mipya kama reli ya kasi ya California imekumbwa na sintofahamu—kuongezwa kwa vituo visivyo lazima, ujenzi wa haraka usio na mpango na maamuzi mabaya ya kifedha—na hata ilipoteza ruzuku ya shirikisho ya dola milioni 929 kufuatia mvutano wa kisiasa, jambo linaloonyesha jinsi pendulum ya kisiasa inavyoweza kuua miradi kabla haijakamilika [2]. Hatimaye, utamaduni wa “gari kwanza”: Marekani ina kiwango cha juu cha umiliki wa magari, hivyo raia na wanasiasa husita kutoza kodi kubwa kwa magari au mafuta ili kufadhili reli ya kasi kubwa, tofauti na mataifa mengine yanayofaulu katika sekta hiyo [3].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: The US is terrible at building high-speed rail — here's why (www.cnbc.com)
Content: China has the world's fastest and largest high-speed rail network — more than 19,000 miles, the vast majority of which was built in the past decade.


Japan's bullet trains can reach nearly 200 miles per hour and date to the 1960s. They have moved more than 9 billion people without a single passenger casualty.


France began service of the high-speed TGV train in 1981 and the rest of Europe quickly followed.


But the U.S. has no true high-speed trains, aside from sections of Amtrak's Acela line in the Northeast Corridor. The Acela can reach 150 mph for only 34 miles of its 457-mile span. Its average speed between New York and Boston is about 65 mph.


California's high-speed rail system is under construction, but whether it will ever get completed as intended is uncertain.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Sababu halisi ya Merika haina mtandao wa reli ya kasi kubwa (www.grunge.com)
Content: Reli yenye kasi kubwa sio tu inayoweza kufikiwa: tayari ipo. Walakini, kama ilivyo kwa kitu kingine chochote huko Merika leo, kikwazo kikubwa katika njia ya reli ya kasi ya Amerika ni siasa. Kuharakisha Acela Express, kwa mfano, kunahitaji mabilioni katika ufadhili wa serikali, kulingana na Bahati. Bahati nzuri na hiyo katika mazingira ya leo ya polar. Wakati huo huo, milio ya kisiasa ambayo imekabiliwa na matamanio ya gari la California sasa ni hadithi, na sio kwa njia nzuri. Wakati wazo la kuunganisha miji mikubwa ya Jimbo la Dhahabu kupitia treni ya risasi ni nzuri, Vox anasema mipango imekuwa ya kutisha, kati ya nyongeza ya vituo visivyo na maana na ghali, ujenzi wa haraka, na maamuzi mabaya ya kifedha. Vita vya kisiasa vilikuwa vikali zaidi mnamo 2019, wakati utawala wa Trump ulipotoa dola milioni 929 katika ruzuku ya shirikisho kwa reli ya kasi kubwa ya California, kulingana na MSN.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Sababu halisi ya Merika haina mtandao wa reli ya kasi kubwa (www.grunge.com)
Content: Uchunguzi wa gari la Merika ni kikwazo kwa ndoto za reli ya kasi kubwa, kulingana na Forbes, kwa sababu utamaduni wa utamaduni unaathiri maamuzi ya ufadhili. Merika ina viwango vya juu vya umiliki wa gari kuliko mataifa mengine, kwa hivyo nchi hizi ziko wazi zaidi kwa wazo la kuweka ushuru mkubwa kwa magari kupunguza mahitaji - wakati mwingine hadi kufikia wanunuzi wa ushuru asilimia 150 kwa bei ya msingi ya gari. Je! Unafikiria ushuru kama huo utawahi kuruka huko Merika? Sio katika maisha haya.
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: HTTPS: Cheti cha SSL ni nini na kwa nini unahitaji moja? | Redwood Valley Solutions Solutions Wavuti (rvtechsolutions.com)
Content: [Picha: Cheti cha SSL Salama ya Kuvinjari] HTTPS na SSL ziko mahali ili kuhakikisha kuwa tovuti yako inaaminika na inawajibika. Kupitia kupitisha ukurasa wako wa wavuti, watazamaji wako wanajua kuwa wanalindwa zaidi au chini wakati wa kuvinjari au kununua kutoka kwa ukurasa wako.

Ikiwa haujafahamu HTTPS na SSL, utataka kujiongezea maana na nini wanajumuisha. Wacha tuanze kwa kuangalia ni nini HTTPS na SSL zinasimama.

HTTPS inasimama kwa itifaki ya uhamishaji wa mseto salama. HTTPS ndio toleo salama la HTTP, ikimaanisha kuwa mawasiliano kati ya mgeni wako na wavuti yako ni salama na kusimbwa.

Kuna faida kadhaa za kuwa na wavuti ya HTTPS juu ya kiwango cha kawaida cha HTTP, haswa ikiwa mgeni wako anaingiza habari za kina au nyeti wakati wanapotembelea tovuti yako. Ikiwa mteja wako anahitaji kuingiza habari ya kadi ya mkopo au habari nyingine ya kibinafsi, utataka kuwa na ukurasa wa HTTPS.

Kuwa na HTTPS inaonyesha mgeni wako kuwa wewe ni kampuni halali, kwa hivyo hawahitaji kuwa na wasiwasi juu ya kuingia habari ya kadi ya mkopo kufanya ununuzi mkondoni. Habari wanayoingia itasimbwa, kwa hivyo haiwezi kuibiwa au kutengwa.

Wavuti yako ya HTTPS inaweza kuanzisha kiwango cha nguvu cha uaminifu na mteja wako. Wakati wanajua kuwa habari zao zinalindwa, watakuwa na uwezekano mkubwa wa kununua kutoka kwa kampuni yako juu ya ushindani wako.

## SSL ni nini?

SSL, ambayo inasimama kwa safu salama ya tundu, inafanya kazi na wavuti yako ya HTTPS kulinda habari na faragha ya mteja wako. SSL, ambayo inaweza pia kuitwa TLS, au usalama wa safu ya usafirishaji, ni mawasiliano ya usimbuaji ambayo wavuti yako ya HTTPS itatumia kubatilisha habari ambayo mteja au mteja huweka kwenye wavuti yako.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: SSH vs SSL | Top 8 Differences and Comparisons You Should Learn (www.educba.com)
Content: Both SSH and SSL are public-key cryptography protocols that create a secure, confidential exchange of data and connection across the Internet. Let’s discuss some of the major key differences:

 1. Usually, SSH uses Port 22, whereas SSL uses Port 443. 2. SSH uses a username/password authentication process to establish a secure connection, whereas SSL does not consider it. 3. SSH is based on network tunnelling, whereas SSL is based on certificates. 4. SSL is used for securely transmitting critical information like credit cards and banking. Whereas SSH is used for securely executing commands across the Internet. 5. SSL is used for encrypting communication between browser and server. On the other hand, SSH is used for encrypting communication between two computers over the Internet. 6. In SSL, the communication is authenticated via the private-key/public-key pair. Whereas in SSH, the communication is authenticated via private-key/public-key pair or username/password pair. 7. Technically, SSH is for securing computer networks, whereas SSL is for securing online data transfers. 8. SSL generally (except exceptions) uses X.509 digital certificates for server and client authentication processes, whereas SSH does not. 9. Another major difference is that SSH has more built-in functionality than SSL. It helps in enabling users to log in to a server and execute commands remotely, whereas SSL does not have this functionality. To achieve this functionality, you need to pair it with another protocol like HTTP, FTP.

Ikiwa haujafahamu HTTPS na SSL, utataka kujiongezea maana na nini wanajumuisha. Wacha tuanze kwa kuangalia ni nini HTTPS na SSL zinasimama.

HTTPS inasimama kwa itifaki ya uhamishaji wa mseto salama. HTTPS ndio toleo salama la HTTP, ikimaanisha kuwa mawasiliano kati ya mgeni wako na wavuti yako ni salama na kusimbwa.

Kuna faida kadhaa za kuwa na wavuti ya HTTPS juu ya kiwango cha kawaida cha HTTP, haswa ikiwa mgeni wako anaingiza habari za kina au nyeti wakati wanapotembelea tovuti yako. Ikiwa mteja wako anahitaji kuingiza habari ya kadi ya mkopo au habari nyingine ya kibinafsi, utataka kuwa na ukurasa wa HTTPS.

Kuwa na HTTPS inaonyesha mgeni wako kuwa wewe ni kampuni halali, kwa hivyo hawahitaji kuwa na wasiwasi juu ya kuingia habari ya kadi ya mkopo kufanya ununuzi mkondoni. Habari wanayoingia itasimbwa, kwa hivyo haiwezi kuibiwa au kutengwa.

Wavuti yako ya HTTPS inaweza kuanzisha kiwango cha nguvu cha uaminifu na mteja wako. Wakati wanajua kuwa habari zao zinalindwa, watakuwa na uwezekano mkubwa wa kununua kutoka kwa kampuni yako juu ya ushindani wako.

## SSL ni nini?

SSL, ambayo inasimama kwa safu salama ya tundu, inafanya kazi na wavuti yako ya HTTPS kulinda habari na faragha ya mteja wako. SSL, ambayo inaweza pia kuitwa TLS, au usalama wa safu ya usafirishaji, ni mawasiliano ya usimbuaji ambayo wavuti yako ya HTTPS itatumia kubatilisha habari ambayo mteja au mteja huweka kwenye wavuti yako.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: SSH vs SSL | Top 8 Differences and Comparisons You Should Learn (www.educba.com)
Content: Both SSH and SSL are public-key cryptography protocols that create a secure, confidential exchange of data and connection across the Internet. Let’s discuss some of the major key differences:

 1. Usually, SSH uses Port 22, whereas SSL uses Port 443. 2. SSH uses a username/password authentication process to establish a secure connection, whereas SSL does not consider it. 3. SSH is based on network tunnelling, whereas SSL is based on certificates. 4. SSL is used for securely transmitting critical information like credit cards and banking. Whereas SSH is used for securely executing commands across the Internet. 5. SSL is used for encrypting communication between browser and server. On the other hand, SSH is used for encrypting communication between two computers over the Internet. 6. In SSL, the communication is authenticated via the private-key/public-key pair. Whereas in SSH, the communication is authenticated via private-key/public-key pair or username/password pair. 7. Technically, SSH is for securing computer networks, whereas SSL is for securing online data transfers. 8. SSL generally (except exceptions) uses X.509 digital certificates for server and client authentication processes, whereas SSH does not. 9. Another major difference is that SSH has more built-in functionality than SSL. It helps in enabling users to log in to a server and execute commands remotely, whereas SSL does not have this functionality. To achieve this functionality, you need to pair it with another protocol like HTTP, FTP.

Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Designing “Read More” And “Continue Reading” Links — Smashing Magazine (www.smashingmagazine.com)
Content: Before we present the showcase, let’s understand why “Read more” links are so important. They are important for several reasons, most importantly because they allow designers to compress content on the home page. By compressing content, you fit more content in less space. This means that readers can scan headlines more quickly and that you can fit more information above the fold.


More after jump! Continue reading below ↓


Also, “Read more” links allow website administrators to more easily track the most popular content. Designers who put entire articles on the home page may make it difficult for website administrators to track the most popular articles and understand what users want to see.


The third and probably most practical reason for having “Read more” links on a website is money. Websites that monetize traffic understand that the more their readers click on links, the more likely they will look at and click on advertisements. “Read more” links can double or even triple the number of page views a website receives, making it more attractive to advertisers.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Kubuni Viungo vya "Soma Zaidi" na "Endelea Kusoma" - Jarida la Smashing (www.smashingmagazine.com)
Content: Kabla ya kuwasilisha onyesho, wacha tuelewe kwa nini viungo vya "soma zaidi" ni muhimu sana. Ni muhimu kwa sababu kadhaa, muhimu zaidi kwa sababu wanaruhusu wabuni kushinikiza yaliyomo kwenye ukurasa wa nyumbani. Kwa kushinikiza yaliyomo, unastahili yaliyomo zaidi katika nafasi ndogo. Hii inamaanisha kuwa wasomaji wanaweza kuchambua vichwa vya habari haraka na kwamba unaweza kutoshea habari zaidi juu ya zizi.


Zaidi baada ya kuruka! Endelea kusoma hapa chini ↓


Pia, viungo vya "Soma Zaidi" huruhusu wasimamizi wa wavuti kufuata kwa urahisi zaidi yaliyomo maarufu. Wabunifu ambao huweka nakala nzima kwenye ukurasa wa nyumbani wanaweza kufanya kuwa ngumu kwa wasimamizi wa wavuti kufuata nakala maarufu na kuelewa kile watumiaji wanataka kuona.


Sababu ya tatu na labda ya vitendo zaidi ya kuwa na viungo "zaidi" kwenye wavuti ni pesa. Wavuti ambazo zinafanya mapato ya trafiki zinaelewa kuwa wasomaji wao wanapo bonyeza viungo, ndivyo wanavyoweza kutazama na bonyeza kwenye matangazo. Document ID: 2
Title: How “Hiding” Content Behind a Read More Button Impacts SEO (www.dealer.com)
Content: At this year’s SMX Advanced in Seattle I asked Google’s Gary Illyes if “hiding” content behind a Read More button affects websites’ SEO.


His answer wasn’t surprising considering Google’s stance on user experience. This practice, which essentially directs users to click a button/link that says Read More or Read On to view the full content, does have an effect on sites’ SEO, including auto retailers using Dealer.com Websites. Specifically, Google does not index content hidden behind these buttons on desktop sites.

Ingawa uhusiano wa moja kwa moja kwa binadamu bado haujathibitishwa kikamilifu, uwepo wa kemikali hizi zenye uwezo wa kubadilisha DNA umefanya wataalam kupendekeza kupunguza au kuondoa sehemu zilizochomeka na kupika kwa joto la wastani ili kupunguza hatari [2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Acrylamide (www.niehs.nih.gov)
Content: When certain foods are cooked at high temperatures, sugars, such as glucose and fructose, can react with the free amino acid, asparagine, to form acrylamide. Acrylamide forms as part of a chemical reaction, known as the Maillard reaction, which contributes to the aroma, taste, and color of cooked foods. Acrylamide is one of the hundreds of chemicals that can form during the Maillard reaction.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Maswali na Majibu ya Acrylamide (www.fda.gov)
Content: Acrylamide ilisababisha saratani katika wanyama katika masomo ambayo wanyama walifunuliwa na acrylamide kwa kipimo cha juu sana. Mnamo mwaka wa 2010, Shirika la Pamoja la Chakula na Kilimo/Kamati ya Wataalam wa Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni juu ya Viongezeo vya Chakula (JECFA) ilihitimisha kuwa Acrylamide ni wasiwasi wa afya ya binadamu, na alipendekeza masomo ya muda mrefu. Wataalam wa FDA walishiriki katika tathmini na walitoa data kutoka kwa tafiti mpya za utafiti juu ya hatari ya acrylamide.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Je! Chakula kilichochomwa husababisha saratani? | Taasisi ya Saratani ya Dana-Farber (blog.dana farber.org)
Content: Linapokuja suala la kupikia nyama, kuna kemikali mbili tofauti ambazo hufanyika wakati nyama imepikwa.


Polycyclic kunukia hydrocarbons (PAHs) huundwa wakati mafuta na juisi zinawaka moto wakati wa kukaanga, kuoka, au nyama ya grill. Heterocyclic amines (HCAs) hutolewa kutoka kwa athari kati ya molekuli pamoja na asidi ya amino na sukari.


[Picha]


Fomu ya HCAS wakati nyama hufunuliwa na joto la juu kwa muda mrefu; Mfiduo zaidi, HCAs zaidi huundwa. Kuweka nyama kwa kifupi kabla ya kupika kwa joto la juu hupunguza wakati nyama inahitaji kupikwa, na kwa hivyo HCAs chini hutolewa. Ingawa tafiti zingine jinsi ya kuchoma, kukaanga, au nyama iliyokatwa inahusishwa na hatari kubwa ya saratani fulani katika vipimo vya maabara, uhusiano kati ya chakula kilichochomwa na hatari ya saratani haijathibitishwa kwa hakika.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Heterocyclic amine - muhtasari (www.sciencedirect.com)
Content: Fomu ya HCAS wakati asidi ya amino na ubunifu huathiri kwa joto la juu la kupikia na huundwa kwa idadi kubwa wakati nyama imejaa au weusi. HCAs kumi na saba zinazotokana na kupikia kwa nyama ya misuli zimetambuliwa, ambazo zinaweza kusababisha hatari ya saratani ya binadamu.


HCAs huendeleza uwezo mkubwa wa kasinojeni wakati uliamilishwa na oxidation ya cytochrome P450 1A2-upatanishi wa kikundi cha amino, ambayo inafuatwa na acetylation au sulfation kuunda mutajeni wa kaimu wa moja kwa moja ambao hushambulia vitu muhimu katika DNA. Wakati wa kulishwa kwa panya, kadhaa ya HCA hizi zinaweza kusababisha saratani ya tezi za mammary, koloni, na kongosho.

Document ID: 3
Title: Does Burnt Food Cause Cancer? | Dana-Farber Cancer Institute (blog.dana-farber.org)
Content: When it comes to cooking meat, there are two different chemicals that occur when meat is cooked.


Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) are formed when fat and juices drip onto flames while frying, baking, or grilling meat. Heterocyclic amines (HCAs) are generated from reactions between molecules including amino acids and sugars.


[Image]


HCAs form when meat is exposed to high temperatures for a prolonged period of time; the longer the exposure, the more HCAs are formed. Microwaving meat briefly before cooking at a high temperature reduces the time the meat needs to be cooked, and therefore less HCAs are produced. Although some studies how burnt, fried, or barbecued meat is associated with higher risk of certain cancers in lab tests, the connection between charred food and increased cancer risk is not proven for certain.

Content: HCAs form when amino acids and creatine react at high cooking temperatures and are formed in greater quantities when meats are overcooked or blackened. Seventeen different HCAs resulting from the cooking of muscle meats have been identified, which may pose human cancer risk.

Google na kampuni zingine zilizingatia maombi ya kuchukua picha hizo, kwa sababu watu hao walikuwa na picha zao na walikuwa na sababu za kuomba kuondolewa.

Document ID: 4
Title: Why The Stolen Ashley Madison Data Is (Legally) Fair Game For The Internet (consumerist.com)
Content: Parts of the Ashley Madison data dump are copyrightable information. The source code for their websites, for example, is original work. Any advertising copy they published on their sites is, likewise, original to them. (And the source code for all of Avid Life’s sites has, indeed, been leaked, so they have some grounds there.)


But a big fat *.csv file full of data? That’s a set of facts, and as such, not a thing that is subject to being copyrighted.


Plenty of other information Ashley Madison has or had access to is also subject to copyright: anything the users write on their profiles, and the images they share. But the account-holders — all 30-odd million of them — are the ones who own that material. That’s been how leaked or stolen material has been successfully taken down before, for example when celebrities’ private photos were stolen from their phones in 2014. Google and other companies did comply with requests to take the images down, because those individuals owned their images and had grounds to request their removal.


You Can’t Put The Toothpaste Back In The Tube
As much as Ashley Madison and all its users wish it were not so, not only is the data probably not subject to copyright claims… but also even if it were, the media can still talk about it as much as they want.


The hackers absolutely broke laws when they stole information from inside Avid Life Media. But media who report on the information are not breaking laws. National security concerns aside (that’s covered by different law), the press can basically run with any information given to them innocently, even if the person giving it to them obtained it illegally.

Title: Chain letters (www.units.miamioh.edu)
Content: Why do people send chain letters? There are several known reasons to explain the chain letters' popularity. One reason is that it is a great source for obtaining new e-mail addresses. These addresses may lead to new contacts. This tactic can be considered an example of the "free-rider effect". The "free-rider effect" involves depending on others to collectively complete a task. The original senders may, for some reason, decide that they need to obtain e-mail addresses. In order to find these addresses, the senders will initiate a chain letter and rely on the recipients to pass the letter to others. Each time the letter is sent to someone new, their address will be added to the list of recipients and the original senders will have obtained the addresses they wanted while exerting little effort.

Usambazaji wa herufi za mnyororo kupitia huduma ya posta umekaribia kutoweka bado kompyuta zimeongeza maisha ya aina hii ya mawasiliano.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Barua za mnyororo (www.units.miamioh.edu)
Content: Wanaweza kusema utani, kuahidi bahati nzuri, kukutishia kwa bahati mbaya, au kukujulisha juu ya janga la mwingine au bahati mbaya. Barua hizi mara nyingi huahidi wapokeaji aina fulani ya thawabu ikiwa watapitisha ujumbe kwa wengine. Unapotumwa kupitia barua-pepe, kawaida kuna orodha ndefu ya wapokeaji wa zamani, lakini hakuna anwani au jina la kutambua mtumaji wa asili. Hii inaweza kuwa shida kwa sababu hakuna njia ya kuangalia ukweli wa barua. Ingawa inawezekana kwa habari hiyo kuwa na ukweli fulani, barua za mnyororo zinaweza pia kuwa na habari ambayo ni ya uwongo kabisa.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Barua za mnyororo (www.units.miamioh.edu)
Content: Kwa nini watu hutuma barua za mnyororo? Kuna sababu kadhaa zinazojulikana za kuelezea umaarufu wa herufi za mnyororo. Sababu moja ni kwamba ni chanzo kizuri cha kupata anwani mpya za barua-pepe. Anwani hizi zinaweza kusababisha anwani mpya. Mbinu hii inaweza kuzingatiwa kuwa mfano wa "athari ya mpandaji wa bure". "Athari ya mpandaji wa bure" inajumuisha kulingana na wengine kukamilisha kazi kwa pamoja. Watumaji wa asili wanaweza, kwa sababu fulani, kuamua kuwa wanahitaji kupata anwani za barua-pepe. Ili kupata anwani hizi, watumaji wataanzisha barua ya mnyororo na kutegemea wapokeaji kupitisha barua kwa wengine. Kila wakati barua inapotumwa kwa mtu mpya, anwani yao itaongezwa kwenye orodha ya wapokeaji na watumaji wa asili watakuwa wamepata anwani walizotaka wakati wa kufanya juhudi kidogo.

report_src: Mbwa wa mwongozo hawajui kiotomati wapi mmiliki anataka kufika; uelekeo unaoanza hutolewa na mmiliki kupitia amri za sauti kama “mbele”, “kulia” na “kushoto” pamoja na ishara za mkono [2]. Ili kufanya hivyo kwa uhakika, mmiliki lazima awe na hisia nzuri ya mwelekeo na awe ameunda ramani ya njia kichwani mwake kabla ya safari, kisha amwongoze mbwa hatua kwa hatua [2]. Mbwa hufuata amri hizi, lakini pia hupima mazingira; wakati wa kuvuka barabara mmiliki atasikiliza magari na kutoa amri ya kuvuka, lakini mbwa ana haki ya kukataa kama anahisi si salama, tabia inayoitwa “uasi wa busara” [1]. Kwa hivyo, ushirikiano—maarifa ya njia kutoka kwa binadamu na ufafanuzi wa vikwazo kutoka kwa mbwa—ndio hufanya timu hii kujua pa kwenda salama na kwa ufanisi.

Title: Je! Mbwa za mwongozo hufanyaje kazi? (chicagolighthouse.org)
Content: Swali: Je! Miongozo ya mbwa inajuaje kwenda wakati wa kusafiri?


J: Hii ni juhudi ya timu kati ya mbwa na mmiliki wake. Mmiliki anajua ni wapi na jinsi anataka kufika mahali fulani, na ana jukumu la kumwambia mbwa kupitia ishara za maneno na za mikono. Maagizo ni pamoja na mbele, kushoto na kulia. Wakati wa kuvuka barabarani, mmiliki ana jukumu la kuhukumu wakati ni salama kuvuka kulingana na sauti ya magari, na kisha anapaswa kuamuru mbwa kuanza kuvuka. Uasi wa busara ni wakati mbwa anakataa kuvuka barabara kwa sababu sio salama kufanya hivyo, hata wakati mmiliki ameamuru kwenda mbele.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Good to know (www.blindenhundeschule.ch)
Content: Guide dogs don’t know where the visually impaired or blind person wants to go. The guide dog owner communicates via vocal cues which direction the dog needs to follow. Therefore, guide dog owners need to have a good sense of direction and to keep a map of their route in mind.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: How do Guide Dogs work? (chicagolighthouse.org)
Content: Q: How do dog guides know where to go when traveling?


A: This is a team effort between the dog and its owner. The owner knows where and how he wants to get to a certain place, and he or she is responsible for telling the dog through verbal and hand signals. Directions include forward, left and right. When at a street crossing, the owner is responsible for judging when it is safe to cross based on the sound of the cars, and should then command the dog to begin crossing. Intelligent disobedience is when a dog refuses to cross the street because it is unsafe to do so, even when the owner has commanded it to go forward.

Title: Je! Mtu anaweza kunipa muhtasari wa safu ya Metal Gear Solid? (Gaming.stackexchange.com)
Content: ## Metal Gear Solid


Foxhound waasi na inachukua kiwanja katika Alaska inayojulikana kama Kivuli Musa. Kwa mara nyingine tena Nyoka wa Mango lazima atoke kwa kustaafu kukabiliana na watu wabaya. Kwa bahati nzuri wakati huu bosi mkubwa amekufa, lakini kwa bahati mbaya wana gia mpya ya Metal: Rex. Pia wana mateka kadhaa ikiwa ni pamoja na mpwa wa Roy Campbell (sikuwahi kuwa 100% kwa nini Foxhound yote isipokuwa Campbell aliasi). Unaingia na kuokoa mateka, pigana na Revolver Ocelot, ambaye anaonekana kudhani hii ni miaka ya 1800, huokolewa na Cyborg Ninja, ambaye hakuna mtu anayejua na anaweza kuwa rafiki na kuwa na hadithi fupi ya upendo na Meryl Silverberg (mjukuu wa Campbell).

Document ID: 2
Title: Can someone provide me with a summary of the Metal Gear Solid series? (gaming.stackexchange.com)
Content: ## Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater


After the cliff hanger at the end of MGS2, in true Metal Gear Solid fashion, MGS3 has nothing to do with it. Instead, MGS3 is a prequel. You're Naked Snake (see how hard was that) who was trained under The BOSS a hero of WW2 who also defects to the Russians. You infiltrate their base, learn about an Illuminati-esque organization The Philosophers who may or may not be dead, meet a young Revolver Ocelot, find out The BOSS didn't defect and is only on a mission, beat up everybody, save the world (but in secret), get dubbed the boss of all bosses: BIG BOSS, and finally get to have sex with a hot chick. Oh and Ocelot works for the CIA under the call sign ADAM... no clue why.

Title: Can someone provide me with a summary of the Metal Gear Solid series? (gaming.stackexchange.com)
Content: ## Metal Gear Solid


FOXHOUND rebels and takes over a compound in the Alaska known as Shadow Moses. Once again Solid Snake has to come out of retirement to deal with the bad guys. Luckily this time BIG BOSS is actually dead, but unluckily they have a new METAL GEAR: REX. They also have a couple hostages including Roy Campbell's niece (I never was 100% why all of FOXHOUND except Campbell revolted). You sneak in and save the hostages, fight Revolver Ocelot, who seems to think this is the 1800s, get saved by a creepy Cyborg Ninja, who no one knows and may or may not be a friend and have a short love story with Meryl Silverberg (Campbell's niece).

Baada ya mwamba wa mwamba mwishoni mwa MGS2, kwa mtindo wa kweli wa Metal Gear, MGS3 haina uhusiano wowote nayo. Badala yake, MGS3 ni prequel. Wewe ni uchi wa Nyoka (tazama jinsi hiyo ilikuwa ngumu) ambaye alifundishwa chini ya bosi shujaa wa WW2 ambaye pia huwa na kasoro kwa Warusi. Unaingiza msingi wao, jifunze juu ya shirika la Illuminati-esque Wanafalsafa ambao wanaweza au hawatakufa, kukutana na kijana wa Revolver Ocelot, kujua bosi hakuwa na kasoro na yuko kwenye misheni tu, kumpiga kila mtu, kuokoa ulimwengu (lakini kwa siri), kumtaja bosi wa wakubwa wote: bosi mkubwa, na hatimaye kupata kufanya ngono na kifaranga moto. Ah na Ocelot hufanya kazi kwa CIA chini ya ishara ya simu Adamu ... hakuna kidokezo kwanini.

Title: Je! Mtu anaweza kunipa muhtasari wa safu ya Metal Gear Solid? (Gaming.stackexchange.com)
Content: ## Metal Gear Solid


Foxhound waasi na inachukua kiwanja katika Alaska inayojulikana kama Kivuli Musa. Kwa mara nyingine tena Nyoka wa Mango lazima atoke kwa kustaafu kukabiliana na watu wabaya. Kwa bahati nzuri wakati huu bosi mkubwa amekufa, lakini kwa bahati mbaya wana gia mpya ya Metal: Rex. Pia wana mateka kadhaa ikiwa ni pamoja na mpwa wa Roy Campbell (sikuwahi kuwa 100% kwa nini Foxhound yote isipokuwa Campbell aliasi). Unaingia na kuokoa mateka, pigana na Revolver Ocelot, ambaye anaonekana kudhani hii ni miaka ya 1800, huokolewa na Cyborg Ninja, ambaye hakuna mtu anayejua na anaweza kuwa rafiki na kuwa na hadithi fupi ya upendo na Meryl Silverberg (mjukuu wa Campbell).

Content: ## Metal Gear Solid 3: Kula nyoka


Baada ya mwamba wa mwamba mwishoni mwa MGS2, kwa mtindo wa kweli wa Metal Gear, MGS3 haina uhusiano wowote nayo. Badala yake, MGS3 ni prequel. Wewe ni uchi wa Nyoka (tazama jinsi hiyo ilikuwa ngumu) ambaye alifundishwa chini ya bosi shujaa wa WW2 ambaye pia huwa na kasoro kwa Warusi. Unaingiza msingi wao, jifunze juu ya shirika la Illuminati-esque Wanafalsafa ambao wanaweza au hawatakufa, kukutana na kijana wa Revolver Ocelot, kujua bosi hakuwa na kasoro na yuko kwenye misheni tu, kumpiga kila mtu, kuokoa ulimwengu (lakini kwa siri), kumtaja bosi wa wakubwa wote: bosi mkubwa, na hatimaye kupata kufanya ngono na kifaranga moto. Ah na Ocelot hufanya kazi kwa CIA chini ya ishara ya simu Adamu ... hakuna kidokezo kwanini.

Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Your Brain Has 2 Clocks (www.scientificamerican.com)
Content: Neuroscientists believe that we have distinct neural systems for processing different types of time, for example, to maintain a circadian rhythm, to control the timing of fine body movements, and for conscious awareness of time passage. Until recently, most neuroscientists believed that this latter type of temporal processing – the kind that alerts you when you’ve lingered over breakfast for too long – is supported by a single brain system. However, emerging research indicates that the model of a single neural clock might be too simplistic. A new study, recently published in the Journal of Neuroscience by neuroscientists at the University of California, Irvine, reveals that the brain may in fact have a second method for sensing elapsed time. What’s more, the authors propose that this second internal clock not only works in parallel with our primary neural clock, but may even compete with it.


Past research suggested that a brain region called the striatum lies at the heart of our central inner clock, working with the brain’s surrounding cortex to integrate temporal information.

Title: Fizikia inaelezea kwa nini wakati hupita haraka kadri uzee (qz.com)
Content: Kulingana na Bejan - ambaye alikagua masomo ya zamani katika nyanja mbali mbali kwa wakati, maono, utambuzi, na usindikaji wa akili kufikia hitimisho lake - wakati tunapopata uzoefu unawakilisha mabadiliko ya ushawishi wa akili. Inahusiana na kile tunachoona. Kama wakati wa usindikaji wa akili ya mwili na haraka ya picha tunazochukua katika mabadiliko, ndivyo pia maoni yetu ya wakati. Na kwa maana fulani, kila mmoja wetu ana "wakati wetu wa akili" ambao hauhusiani na kupita kwa masaa, siku, na miaka kwenye saa na kalenda, ambayo inaathiriwa na kiasi cha kupumzika tunapata na mambo mengine.

Document ID: 3
Title: Kuweka kwa mtazamo wa ubongo wa wakati (www.theerdian.com)
Content: Imeonyeshwa pia kuwa cerebellum ina jukumu muhimu katika kazi za gari zinazohitaji mtazamo wa wakati kamili. Sehemu zingine za ubongo zinaweza kuhusika katika makadirio ya wakati kamili: kwa mfano, gamba la kushoto la parietali, ambalo linasimamia harakati zilizokusudiwa, na cortex ya kushoto, ambayo inapanga na kupanga harakati. Wakati mwingine cortex ya haki ya utangulizi, ambayo kawaida huhusika katika makadirio ya wakati ulio wazi, huamilishwa kwa makadirio kamili, kwa mfano, wakati tukio halijatokea haraka iwezekanavyo: taa ya trafiki inakaa nyekundu kwa muda mrefu zaidi kuliko hapo awali. Ubongo husasisha utabiri wa wakati wake, kwa mara nyingine tena ukitarajia muda.


Kwa kuongezea, "mikoa ya ubongo inayohusika inatofautiana kulingana na muktadha, haswa ikiwa kichocheo kinadumu kwa muda mfupi sana, chini ya millisecond 200," anasema Coull. Cortex ya kuona imeamilishwa wakati tunakadiria muda wa kichocheo cha kuona. Vivyo hivyo, cortex ya msingi ya gari inakuja kucheza wakati makisio ya wakati yanahusishwa na hatua, wakati kortini ya ukaguzi ina sehemu katika kukadiria urefu wa kichocheo cha sauti.


Zaidi ya yote, mtazamo wa ubongo wa wakati unajumuisha michakato iliyounganishwa na kumbukumbu na umakini: kushuhudia maoni kwamba wakati unapita haraka wakati tunapokuwa na shughuli, au kufanya kitu cha kufurahisha au cha kufurahisha. Wakati nzi hata wakati tunapenda. Kwa kulinganisha, sufuria iliyoangaziwa kamwe huwaka. Dakika za kuvuta wakati tunapokuwa na kuchoka.

Title: Ubongo wako una saa 2 (www.scientificamerican.com)
Content: Wanasayansi wa Neuroscient wanaamini kuwa tunayo mifumo tofauti ya neural ya kushughulikia aina tofauti za wakati, kwa mfano, kudumisha wimbo wa circadian, kudhibiti wakati wa harakati nzuri za mwili, na kwa ufahamu wa ufahamu wa kifungu. Hadi hivi majuzi, wataalamu wengi wa akili waliamini kuwa aina hii ya mwisho ya usindikaji wa muda - aina ambayo inakuonya wakati umekaa juu ya kiamsha kinywa kwa muda mrefu sana - inasaidiwa na mfumo mmoja wa ubongo. Walakini, utafiti unaoibuka unaonyesha kuwa mfano wa saa moja ya neural inaweza kuwa rahisi sana. Utafiti mpya, uliochapishwa hivi karibuni katika Jarida la Neuroscience na Wanasayansi wa Neuros katika Chuo Kikuu cha California, Irvine, unaonyesha kwamba kwa kweli ubongo unaweza kuwa na njia ya pili ya kuhisi wakati uliopita. Nini zaidi, waandishi wanapendekeza kwamba saa hii ya pili ya ndani haifanyi kazi tu sambamba na saa yetu ya msingi ya neural, lakini inaweza kushindana nayo.


Utafiti wa zamani ulionyesha kuwa eneo la ubongo linaloitwa striatum liko moyoni mwa saa yetu ya ndani, ikifanya kazi na gamba la ubongo lililozunguka ili kuunganisha habari za kidunia.

Document ID: 3
Title: A stopwatch on the brain's perception of time (www.theguardian.com)
Content: It has also been shown that the cerebellum plays a key role in motor tasks requiring perception of implicit timing. Other parts of the brain may be involved in implicit-timing estimates: for example, the left parietal cortex, which manages intended movement, and the left premotor cortex, which plans and organises movement. Sometimes the right prefrontal cortex, usually involved in explicit-timing estimates, is activated for implicit estimates, for instance, when an event does not occur as soon as expected: a traffic light stays red for longer than foreseen. The brain updates its time forecasts, once again anticipating the interval.


In addition, "the regions of the brain involved differ depending on the context, particularly if the stimulus only lasts for a very short time, less than 200 milliseconds," says Coull. The visual cortex is activated when we estimate the duration of a visual stimulus. In the same way, the primary motor cortex comes into play when a timing estimate is associated with an action, whereas the auditory cortex has a part in estimating the length of a sound stimulus.


Above all, the brain's perception of time involves processes linked to memory and attention: witness the impression that time is passing more quickly when we are busy, or doing something amusing or exciting. Time flies even when we are in love. In contrast, a watched pot never boils. Minutes drag by when we are bored.

Hadi hivi majuzi, wataalamu wengi wa akili waliamini kuwa aina hii ya mwisho ya usindikaji wa muda - aina ambayo inakuonya wakati umekaa juu ya kiamsha kinywa kwa muda mrefu sana - inasaidiwa na mfumo mmoja wa ubongo. Walakini, utafiti unaoibuka unaonyesha kuwa mfano wa saa moja ya neural inaweza kuwa rahisi sana. Utafiti mpya, uliochapishwa hivi karibuni katika Jarida la Neuroscience na Wanasayansi wa Neuros katika Chuo Kikuu cha California, Irvine, unaonyesha kwamba kwa kweli ubongo unaweza kuwa na njia ya pili ya kuhisi wakati uliopita. Nini zaidi, waandishi wanapendekeza kwamba saa hii ya pili ya ndani haifanyi kazi tu sambamba na saa yetu ya msingi ya neural, lakini inaweza kushindana nayo.


Utafiti wa zamani ulionyesha kuwa eneo la ubongo linaloitwa striatum liko moyoni mwa saa yetu ya ndani, ikifanya kazi na gamba la ubongo lililozunguka ili kuunganisha habari za kidunia.

Document ID: 2
Title: Fizikia inaelezea kwa nini wakati hupita haraka kadri uzee (qz.com)
Content: Kulingana na Bejan - ambaye alikagua masomo ya zamani katika nyanja mbali mbali kwa wakati, maono, utambuzi, na usindikaji wa akili kufikia hitimisho lake - wakati tunapopata uzoefu unawakilisha mabadiliko ya ushawishi wa akili. Inahusiana na kile tunachoona. Kama wakati wa usindikaji wa akili ya mwili na haraka ya picha tunazochukua katika mabadiliko, ndivyo pia maoni yetu ya wakati. Na kwa maana fulani, kila mmoja wetu ana "wakati wetu wa akili" ambao hauhusiani na kupita kwa masaa, siku, na miaka kwenye saa na kalenda, ambayo inaathiriwa na kiasi cha kupumzika tunapata na mambo mengine.

Document ID: 3
Title: A stopwatch on the brain's perception of time (www.theguardian.com)
Content: It has also been shown that the cerebellum plays a key role in motor tasks requiring perception of implicit timing. Other parts of the brain may be involved in implicit-timing estimates: for example, the left parietal cortex, which manages intended movement, and the left premotor cortex, which plans and organises movement. Sometimes the right prefrontal cortex, usually involved in explicit-timing estimates, is activated for implicit estimates, for instance, when an event does not occur as soon as expected: a traffic light stays red for longer than foreseen. The brain updates its time forecasts, once again anticipating the interval.


In addition, "the regions of the brain involved differ depending on the context, particularly if the stimulus only lasts for a very short time, less than 200 milliseconds," says Coull. The visual cortex is activated when we estimate the duration of a visual stimulus. In the same way, the primary motor cortex comes into play when a timing estimate is associated with an action, whereas the auditory cortex has a part in estimating the length of a sound stimulus.


Above all, the brain's perception of time involves processes linked to memory and attention: witness the impression that time is passing more quickly when we are busy, or doing something amusing or exciting. Time flies even when we are in love. In contrast, a watched pot never boils. Minutes drag by when we are bored.
---

question_src: Je! Kwa nini biashara ya USS CVN-65 ilikataliwa?
report_src: USS Enterprise (CVN-65) ilisitishwa matumizi kwa sababu ilikuwa imehudumu kwa zaidi ya miaka 55 na hivyo kuwa miongoni mwa meli kongwe zaidi za Jeshi la Wanamaji la Marekani, jambo lililoongeza gharama na changamoto za kuiendeleza kiteknolojia na kiusalama [1]. Jaribio la kuibakiza kama jumba la kumbukumbu lilikataliwa kwa kuwa mwaka 2012 ilikadiriwa kuwa ghali sana kufanikisha hilo, hasa kutokana na ukweli kwamba meli ingehitaji kuvunjwa kwa sehemu ili kuondoa kwa usalama rekta zake nane za nyuklia, hatua iliyoongeza zaidi gharama na hatari za kiufundi na kimazingira [2]. Hivyo, mchanganyiko wa uzee, gharama kubwa za uendeshaji na ugumu wa kushughulikia mifumo yake ya nyuklia ulipelekea kuikataa na kuiondoa rasmi katika huduma.

Alikuwa mtoaji wa ndege wa kwanza wa nguvu ya nyuklia na chombo cha nane cha majini cha Merika kubeba jina hilo. Kama mtangulizi wake wa umaarufu wa Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, anaitwa "Big E". Katika futi 1,123 (342 m), [6] [7] Yeye ndiye chombo refu zaidi cha majini kilichowahi kujengwa. Tani yake 93,284-urefu wa tani (94,781 T) [5] inamwondoa kama mchukuaji wa 12, baada ya wabebaji kumi wa darasa la Nimitz na USS Gerald R. Ford. Biashara ilikuwa na kikundi cha washiriki wa huduma 4,600. [8]


Meli pekee ya darasa lake, Enterprise [15] ilikuwa, wakati wa uvumbuzi, chombo cha tatu cha zamani zaidi katika Jeshi la Merika la Merika baada ya Katiba ya USS ya Wooden na USS Pueblo. [16] Hakutekelezwa mnamo 1 Desemba 2012, [17] na kutengwa rasmi mnamo 3 Februari 2017, [18] [19] baada ya zaidi ya miaka 55 ya huduma.

Content: Enterprise was the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier to be decommissioned.[82] Naval enthusiasts requested that Enterprise be converted into a museum.[83][84] By 2012 this was deemed too expensive to make such an effort practical, in addition to the fact that the ship would need to be partially dismantled anyway to remove the eight reactors safely.[21] A petition was also set up for the next carrier to be named as the ninth USS Enterprise.[85]
