claim: Watendaji na watendaji wa sauti wanaolipwa sana hutengeneza dau kubwa kwa sababu umaarufu wao huwafanya “sanamu” na chapa hutaka kunufaika na mvuto wao kupitia mikataba ya kazi na idhini, hivyo hulipa pesa nyingi ili kufikia hadhira kubwa na kuongeza mauzo
question_src: Kwa nini watendaji na watendaji wa sauti wanapata pesa nyingi?
report_src: Watendaji na watendaji wa sauti wanaolipwa sana hutengeneza dau kubwa kwa sababu umaarufu wao huwafanya “sanamu” na chapa hutaka kunufaika na mvuto wao kupitia mikataba ya kazi na idhini, hivyo hulipa pesa nyingi ili kufikia hadhira kubwa na kuongeza mauzo [1]. Bei yao inachochewa pia na ukweli kwamba idadi ya watu wanaoweza kutekeleza jukumu husika ni ndogo, kwa hivyo upungufu wa vipaji maalumu huongeza thamani yao sokoni [2]. Zaidi ya hapo, jukumu lao mara nyingi huzalisha mapato au sifa kubwa kwa mtayarishaji, hivyo kampuni ziko tayari kulipa zaidi ili kuhakikisha mafanikio ya filamu, tamasha au matangazo [2]. Waigizaji mastaa hutumia nguvu ya majina yao kujadiliana kwa kila mkataba na, kwa sababu bajeti za “blockbuster” hutabiri mapato makubwa, malipo yao huongezeka kadri uzalishaji unavyopanua bajeti [3]. Hata hivyo, muigizaji wa kawaida nchini Marekani alipata wastani wa dola 20.43 kwa saa mwaka 2019, ikionyesha kuwa malipo ya juu yanahusu wachache waliopo kileleni tu [4].

claim: Ukubwa wa faili unaweza kubadilika hata pixel zikibaki zilezile kwa sababu tofauti za kiufundi zinazohusu jinsi data ya picha imehifadhiwa na kubanwa: kwanza, kiwango cha ubora (compression) kinachochaguliwa kwenye kamera au programu kinaamua ni kiasi gani cha data kinachofutwa; ubora wa “Fine” hutumia kubanwa kidogo hivyo faili huwa kubwa, ilhali “Standard” hubana zaidi na kupunguza saizi ya faili bila kuongeza au kupunguza idadi ya pixel
question_src: Je! Kwa nini ukubwa wa faili ya picha za dijiti hutofautiana wakati hesabu ya pixel haibadilika?
report_src: Ukubwa wa faili unaweza kubadilika hata pixel zikibaki zilezile kwa sababu tofauti za kiufundi zinazohusu jinsi data ya picha imehifadhiwa na kubanwa: kwanza, kiwango cha ubora (compression) kinachochaguliwa kwenye kamera au programu kinaamua ni kiasi gani cha data kinachofutwa; ubora wa “Fine” hutumia kubanwa kidogo hivyo faili huwa kubwa, ilhali “Standard” hubana zaidi na kupunguza saizi ya faili bila kuongeza au kupunguza idadi ya pixel [1]. Pili, mbinu ya kubanwa yenyewe—kwa mfano JPEG dhidi ya PNG—inaweza kuwa bora au hafifu; kubanwa kwa ujumla hupunguza nafasi kwa “kuingiza faili kwa njia bora, ikiruhusu iwe ndogo” [2]. Tatu, kina cha rangi (bit depth) hubadilisha kiasi cha taarifa ya rangi kinachohifadhiwa kwa kila pixel: faili ya 24-bit ni takribani mara tatu kubwa kuliko faili 8-bit yenye hesabu sawa ya pixel kwa sababu kila pixel ina taarifa zaidi ya rangi [3]. Kwa hivyo, hata bila kubadili azimio, kuchanganya mipangilio tofauti ya ubora wa kubanwa na kina cha rangi husababisha tofauti kubwa kwenye ukubwa wa faili ya picha.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: What is the difference between image size, file size, and image quality? (www.sony.com)
Content: Image size: This represents the physical size and resolution of an image measured in pixels. For example, A 10 megapixel (MP) camera may provide settings to take pictures in 10.2 MP (3872 x 2592), 5.6 MP (2896 x 1944), and 2.5 MP (1936 x 1296). A higher image size setting means a larger picture and bigger file size. A lower image size setting makes a smaller picture and smaller file size. Depending on your camera, there may be different sizes available.


File size: This is the amount of space that the image file takes up on your memory card, or internal memory if your camera has one. It is measured in megabytes. The actual file size depends on the image size and image quality settings selected on the camera.


Image quality: This dictates how much compression is used to record the file information. Some digital cameras have a Fine and Standard setting where the Fine setting uses less compression than the Standard setting. Therefore, the detail of a picture taken with the Fine setting is a sharper than one taken with the Standard setting. Similar to the image size setting discussed above, this also affects the file size. Since the Fine setting uses less compression and records more detail, the file size will be larger than one recorded with the standard setting.
---

Title: Bitmaps na saizi ya faili | Kuelewa jinsi rangi inavyofanya kazi katika Photoshop (www.peachpit.com)

prompt:

Kwa mfano, kamera 10 ya megapixel (mbunge) inaweza kutoa mipangilio ya kuchukua picha katika 10.2 mbunge (3872 x 2592), 5.6 mbunge (2896 x 1944), na mbunge 2.5 (1936 x 1296). Mpangilio wa saizi ya juu inamaanisha picha kubwa na saizi kubwa ya faili. Mpangilio wa saizi ya chini hufanya picha ndogo na saizi ndogo ya faili. Kulingana na kamera yako, kunaweza kuwa na saizi tofauti zinazopatikana.


Saizi ya Faili: Hii ni kiasi cha nafasi ambayo faili ya picha inachukua kwenye kadi yako ya kumbukumbu, au kumbukumbu ya ndani ikiwa kamera yako ina moja. Inapimwa katika megabytes. Saizi halisi ya faili inategemea saizi ya picha na mipangilio ya ubora wa picha iliyochaguliwa kwenye kamera.


Ubora wa picha: Hii inaamuru ni kiasi gani cha kushinikiza hutumiwa kurekodi habari ya faili. Kamera zingine za dijiti zina mpangilio mzuri na wa kawaida ambapo mpangilio mzuri hutumia compression kidogo kuliko mpangilio wa kawaida. Kwa hivyo, maelezo ya picha iliyochukuliwa na mpangilio mzuri ni nyembamba kuliko moja iliyochukuliwa na mpangilio wa kawaida. Sawa na mpangilio wa saizi ya picha iliyojadiliwa hapo juu, hii pia inaathiri saizi ya faili. Kwa kuwa mpangilio mzuri hutumia compression kidogo na rekodi ya undani zaidi, saizi ya faili itakuwa kubwa kuliko ile iliyorekodiwa na mpangilio wa kawaida.

question_src: Kwa nini sina msimamo kwenye baiskeli yangu wakati ni ya stationary lakini sio wakati inasonga?
report_src: Sababu kuu ni kwamba baiskeli inayosimama ina sehemu mbili tu za mawasiliano na ardhi, hivyo msingi wake wa msaada ni mstari mwembamba badala ya pointi tatu au zaidi zinazohitajika kwa uthabiti; matokeo yake ni rahisi kuanguka ukiwa umesimama [2]. Zaidi ya hapo, magurudumu yaliyokoma hayana kasi ya mzunguko, kwa hiyo torque ndogo kutoka kwa mvuto au kutikisika kidogo inatosha kubadilisha mwelekeo wake na kuiangusha [2]. Unapoanza kusonga, magurudumu huzalisha kasi ya angular na mfumo wako na baiskeli hufuata kanuni ya uhifadhi wa kasi hiyo, hivyo inahitaji nguvu kubwa zaidi kuiangusha na hivyo huongeza uthabiti [2]. Wakati huohuo usukani na umbali unaoitwa ‘trail’ huruhusu gurudumu la mbele kujirekebisha kiotomatiki ili kituo cha mvuto kibaki juu ya mstari wa mawasiliano, jambo linaloifanya baiskeli ijisawazishe kadiri kasi inavyoongezeka [1]. Kwa hivyo, ukiwa umesimama unakosa msingi mpana na pia unakosa faida ya kasi ya magurudumu na marekebisho ya haraka ya usukani, ilhali ukiwa unaendesha, sababu hizo tatu—kasi ya mzunguko, uhifadhi wa mwendo na kujirekebisha kwa usukani—hufanya baiskeli iwe thabiti bila jitihada kubwa.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Kwa nini baiskeli inayosonga inakaa? (www.science20.com)
Content: Kwa kuwa baiskeli iligunduliwa, wahusika wakuu wameandika sababu tofauti za kwanini baiskeli imejiimarisha juu ya kasi fulani. Makubaliano yamekuwa kwamba utulivu wa baiskeli unahusiana na sababu mbili: kwanza, magurudumu yanayozunguka ya baiskeli hutoa utulivu kupitia athari za gyroscopic; Pili, kwamba 'uchaguzi', umbali ambao mahali pa mawasiliano ya gurudumu la mbele hufuata nyuma ya mhimili wa usukani, inachukua sehemu muhimu.

Utafiti mpya katika sayansi unadai kuwa umetatua suala hilo - athari za gyroscopic na msaada wa uchaguzi, anasema mtafiti Dk Arend Schwab wa kitivo cha 3ME huko TU Delft, lakini sio lazima juu ya kasi fulani. Katika kesi ya 2007 ya kifungu cha Royal Society (DOI: 10.1098/rspa.2007.1857), mfano wa kihesabu na vigezo 25 vya mwili vilitengenezwa wakati huo ambao ulionekana kutabiri ikiwa, na kwa kasi gani, muundo fulani wa baiskeli ungekuwa thabiti.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Balancing on a Bicycle: The Phenomena (www.mentalfloss.com)
Content: A bicycle, on the other hand, is statically unstable because it only has two contact points with the ground (whatever portion of the front and back wheels happen to be touching the ground) and its base of support is a line segment. A good base of support needs at least three contact points with the ground, so bikes are hard to keep upright when they're still. Bikes are, however, dynamically stable, or stable when moving forward, because steering allows a rider to move the bike's points of support around under the center of gravity and keep it balanced, often with steering adjustments small enough that the rider may not even realize they're making them. It's sort of like standing on one foot. If you don't hop around a little, and you start falling sideways, you can't recover and you fall over. If you do hop, though, you can move your foot around to keep your center of gravity above it and keep your balance.


A bike has two features that help this dynamic stability immensely: its wheels. Spinning wheels have angular momentum, and when you're sitting on a bike, you and it and its wheels make up a system that obeys the principle of conservation of angular momentum. Unless torque, or twisting force, is applied from outside the system to change the wheels' angular momentum, that momentum and the direction of the momentum remain constant. In a nutshell, once the wheels line up a certain way, they want to stay lined up like that. It's easy for you to move them, but hard for an outside force to do the same, and so the bike is easy to keep balanced but doesn't topple easily. A non-moving bike has wheels that aren't spinning and zero angular momentum, which makes it very easy for external torque to change the wheels' direction, making the bike harder to balance.

Wakati huohuo usukani na umbali unaoitwa ‘trail’ huruhusu gurudumu la mbele kujirekebisha kiotomatiki ili kituo cha mvuto kibaki juu ya mstari wa mawasiliano, jambo linaloifanya baiskeli ijisawazishe kadiri kasi inavyoongezeka [1].

Kwa hivyo, ukiwa umesimama unakosa msingi mpana na pia unakosa faida ya kasi ya magurudumu na marekebisho ya haraka ya usukani, ilhali ukiwa unaendesha, sababu hizo tatu—kasi ya mzunguko, uhifadhi wa mwendo na kujirekebisha kwa usukani—hufanya baiskeli iwe thabiti bila jitihada kubwa.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Kwa nini baiskeli inayosonga inakaa? (www.science20.com)
Content: Kwa kuwa baiskeli iligunduliwa, wahusika wakuu wameandika sababu tofauti za kwanini baiskeli imejiimarisha juu ya kasi fulani. Makubaliano yamekuwa kwamba utulivu wa baiskeli unahusiana na sababu mbili: kwanza, magurudumu yanayozunguka ya baiskeli hutoa utulivu kupitia athari za gyroscopic; Pili, kwamba 'uchaguzi', umbali ambao mahali pa mawasiliano ya gurudumu la mbele hufuata nyuma ya mhimili wa usukani, inachukua sehemu muhimu.

Utafiti mpya katika sayansi unadai kuwa umetatua suala hilo - athari za gyroscopic na msaada wa uchaguzi, anasema mtafiti Dk Arend Schwab wa kitivo cha 3ME huko TU Delft, lakini sio lazima juu ya kasi fulani. Katika kesi ya 2007 ya kifungu cha Royal Society (DOI: 10.1098/rspa.2007.1857), mfano wa kihesabu na vigezo 25 vya mwili vilitengenezwa wakati huo ambao ulionekana kutabiri ikiwa, na kwa kasi gani, muundo fulani wa baiskeli ungekuwa thabiti.

Document ID: 2
Title: Balancing on a Bicycle: The Phenomena (www.mentalfloss.com)
Content: A bicycle, on the other hand, is statically unstable because it only has two contact points with the ground (whatever portion of the front and back wheels happen to be touching the ground) and its base of support is a line segment. A good base of support needs at least three contact points with the ground, so bikes are hard to keep upright when they're still. Bikes are, however, dynamically stable, or stable when moving forward, because steering allows a rider to move the bike's points of support around under the center of gravity and keep it balanced, often with steering adjustments small enough that the rider may not even realize they're making them. It's sort of like standing on one foot. If you don't hop around a little, and you start falling sideways, you can't recover and you fall over. If you do hop, though, you can move your foot around to keep your center of gravity above it and keep your balance.


A bike has two features that help this dynamic stability immensely: its wheels. Spinning wheels have angular momentum, and when you're sitting on a bike, you and it and its wheels make up a system that obeys the principle of conservation of angular momentum. Unless torque, or twisting force, is applied from outside the system to change the wheels' angular momentum, that momentum and the direction of the momentum remain constant. In a nutshell, once the wheels line up a certain way, they want to stay lined up like that. It's easy for you to move them, but hard for an outside force to do the same, and so the bike is easy to keep balanced but doesn't topple easily. A non-moving bike has wheels that aren't spinning and zero angular momentum, which makes it very easy for external torque to change the wheels' direction, making the bike harder to balance.
---

Title: YouTube Keeps Buffering? - Best Way to Fix It (www.istarapps.com)
Content: Interestingly, YouTube buffering can happen even if you have a high-speed internet connection. That can happen due to slower servers from their end, and your connection speed doesn’t affect that.


As we already know, YouTube is equipped with the most powerful internet connections in the world. Also, their servers and other infrastructure come with cutting edge technology. However, that doesn’t prevent YouTube from experiencing occasional hiccups, particularly when there is heavy traffic.


In fact, when plenty of users visit YouTube and watch videos simultaneously, the performance of the servers is tested. In that case, the servers have to communicate with all the clients and transfer data constantly. If something goes wrong, the users will experience various issues, and YouTube keeps buffering is one of those issues.

question_src: Je! Kwa nini Sheria ya Madai ya Shirikisho ilihitajika, nilidhani Muswada wa Haki ulitupa haki ya kwenda kortini dhidi ya serikali ya Amerika?
report_src: Muswada wa Haki unalinda uhuru wa kimsingi kama kusema, waandishi wa habari na dini, lakini haukutoa njia maalum ya madai ya fidia dhidi ya serikali ya shirikisho inapofanya uzembe au kitendo kibaya [2]; kwa karne nyingi, kanuni ya “sovereign immunity” ilizuia raia kumpeleka serikali mahakamani bila idhini yake rasmi. Sheria ya Madai ya Shirikisho (FTCA) ya 1946 iliundwa kuondoa kizuizi hicho kwa sehemu kwa “kuamuru utaratibu sawa wa kushughulikia madai dhidi ya Merika, kwa uharibifu wa pesa tu… kwa jeraha la kibinafsi, uharibifu wa mali au kifo kilichosababishwa na uzembe wa mfanyakazi wa serikali akitekeleza kazi zake” [1]. Sheria hii inafanya kile ambacho Muswada wa Haki haukufafanua: inaiagiza serikali kukubali kuwajibika mahakamani kama “mtu mmoja” katika mazingira fulani, inahitaji mlalamikaji kuwasilisha dai kwanza kiutawala, na inapunguza fidia kwa malipo ya pesa pekee [3]. Hivyo, FTCA ilihitajika ili kutoa utaratibu maalum na idhini ya kisheria ya kushitaki serikali, badala ya kutegemea tu kanuni za jumla za haki zilizo kwenye Katiba.
all_claims: Muswada wa Haki unalinda uhuru wa kimsingi kama kusema, waandishi wa habari na dini, lakini haukutoa njia maalum ya madai ya fidia dhidi ya serikali ya shirikisho inapofanya uzembe au kitendo kibaya [2]; kwa karne nyingi, kanuni ya “sovereign immunity” ilizuia raia kumpeleka serikali mahakamani bila idhini yake rasmi.

question_src: Je! Mabara, nchi na maeneo ya pwani vilikuwaje kabla ya uvumbuzi wa satelaiti?
report_src: Kabla ya satelaiti, sura ya mabara, nchi na maeneo ya pwani ilichorwa kwa kutegemea uchunguzi kutoka meli: marubani walipima mwelekeo wa dira na umbali, kisha “kuzaa” alama kadiri walivyoiona kutoka baharini ili kufafanua mstari wa mwambao, urambazaji huu ukiwa sahihi zaidi majini kuliko ardhini [1]. Mpaka katikati ya karne ya 18, walipotumia Dead Reckoning, makosa yalijilimbikiza kadri safari ilivyorefuka, hivyo ramani zilipata upotovu unaoongezeka mbali na bandari zilizojulikana [2]. Kuanzia mwishoni mwa 1700, urambazaji wa mbinguni uliwezesha wasafiri kupata nafasi yao ndani ya maili chache, jambo lililopunguza sana hitilafu na kuongeza uaminifu wa ramani za pwani na mipaka ya nchi [2]. Wachoraji ramani walianza kutoka “vipengele vya kutegemewa” kama visiwa au miamba iliyothibitishwa ili kujenga mtandao wa vipimo unaoenea kufikia bara, kwa sababu usahihi ulitegemea kwanza kujua mahali ulipo unapotazama eneo jipya [3]. Uvumbuzi wa makadirio ya Mercator mwaka 1569 uliwaruhusu wanamaji kuchora kozi ya dira kama mstari mnyoofu, kuweka sehemu zilizopimwa kwenye ramani tambarare bila kubadili mwelekeo, na hadi karne ya 19 chati hizi zilikuwa msingi wa safari ndefu baharini [4]. Matokeo yake, kabla ya satelaiti, ramani zilikuwa na maelezo mazuri zaidi kando ya njia za majini na katika bandari muhimu, huku maeneo ya ndani yakibaki na upungufu wa usahihi na maumbo yasiyo kamili.

Document ID: 2
Title: Je! Watengenezaji wa katuni walitoa vipi mwambao kabla ya nyakati za kisasa? (nje.stackexchange.com)
Content: Kabla ya katikati ya miaka ya 1700, njia za msingi za urambazaji zilikuwa Dead Reckoning (DR). Hii inahitaji kuendeleza msimamo wako kwenye ramani kutoka kwa nafasi yako ya mwisho inayojulikana kwa kutumia mwelekeo na wakati/umbali. Kwa kweli, baada ya muda, makosa yatasababisha kusababisha usahihi wa kupunguzwa. Lazima uwe na njia ya kupima mwelekeo wako wa kusafiri na (kiasi fulani) thamani sahihi kwa kasi yako.


Baadaye katika miaka ya 1700, iliwezekana kuzunguka kwa usahihi zaidi kwa kutumia urambazaji wa mbinguni. Hii iliruhusu navigator mwenye ujuzi kuamua msimamo wake badala ya usahihi (kawaida ndani ya maili chache) wakati wowote kwenye ulimwengu. Nafasi hiyo ilipatikana mara moja kila siku na ya juu kwa kutumia DR kama inahitajika.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Je! Watengenezaji wa katuni walitoa vipi mwambao kabla ya nyakati za kisasa? (nje.stackexchange.com)
Content: Mada za urambazaji na katuni ni pande mbili za sarafu moja, na kuna vitabu vyote vilivyoandikwa juu ya kila moja. Inafurahisha kusoma historia ya katuni kwa sababu inaonyesha sana maboresho yanayolingana katika urambazaji kwa wakati.


Ili kutengeneza ramani sahihi, unahitaji kujua kwanza ambapo unafanya uchunguzi wako kutoka. Kufanya uchunguzi kutoka kwa msimamo unaojulikana hapo awali utasababisha usahihi zaidi. Nafasi hii inaweza kuwa imeanzishwa na uchunguzi wa mapema (kwa mfano, kufanya kazi kutoka kwa hatua inayojulikana kwenye ramani iliyopo) au kwa kuweza kujua kwa uhuru msimamo wako kwa uhakika mzuri juu ya msimamo wa ulimwengu.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Siri ya ramani sahihi za zamani (www.discovermagazine.com)
Content: Shida ilikuwa ukosefu wa ramani ya Portolan 'ya njia ya utaratibu wa kupunguza ardhi ya spherical kuwa ramani ya gorofa. Hiyo haikuwa na matokeo kidogo kwa safari fupi lakini ilikuwa na maana zaidi wakati wa kusafiri umbali mrefu zaidi. Mnamo 1569, jiografia ya Ubelgiji na mwandishi wa katuni Gerardus Mercator aliunda njia yake ya kuwasilisha ulimwengu wa spherical kwenye ramani ya gorofa, ile inayojulikana kwetu leo. Mbinu hii ya kutengeneza ramani, ingawa ilinyoosha na kushinikiza alama na umbali kati yao, ilikuwa na faida kubwa kwamba kozi ya moja kwa moja ya dira iliwakilishwa na mstari wa moja kwa moja kwenye ramani.


Makadirio ya Mercator yakaanza kutumika kusafiri kwa bahari wazi mapema miaka ya 1800, wakati huo chati za Portolan zilikuwa zimepotea sana. Lakini umuhimu wao hauwezekani. "Ukuzaji wa ramani hizi ulibadilisha jinsi watu walivyogundua nafasi, kama vile Google Earth imefanya katika maisha yetu," Hessler anasema. "Kuelewa jinsi teknolojia ilivyotengenezwa inatupa ufahamu juu ya jinsi tulivyofika hapa, na labda mahali tunapoenda."
---

Content: "Kujaribu". Na marubani, unaamua eneo lako kwa kutumia fani kutoka kwa vidokezo vya kumbukumbu kwenye ramani sahihi. Hapa, tunatumia kuzaa kwa vitu kuamua msimamo wa alama kando ya ukingo wa pwani. Bado, inafanya kazi kwa njia ile ile.

Document ID: 2
Title: How did cartographers map out shores before modern times? (outdoors.stackexchange.com)
Content: Prior to the mid-1700's, the primary means of navigation was dead reckoning (DR). This requires that you iteratively advance your position on the map from your last known position using direction and time/distance. Of course, over time, errors will compound resulting in reduced accuracy. You must have a way of measuring your direction of travel and a (somewhat) accurate value for your speed.


Later in the 1700's, it was possible to navigate more accurately using celestial navigation. This allowed a skilled navigator to determine his position rather accurately (typically within a few miles) at any point on the globe. The position was typically found once each day and advanced using DR as necessary.

Kinyume chake, Msalaba wa Chuma ulikuwa tu tuzo ya kijeshi ya Ujerumani ya karne ya 19; ingawa Wanazi waliuongezea swastika na pia waliutumia, baada ya vita ulitengwa na ukatumiwa upya na makundi mbalimbali ya Marekani—hasa waendesha pikipiki—kuashiria uasi na mshtuko kuliko itikadi ya ubaguzi, na kufikia miaka ya 2000 alama hii “iliyotengwa” (ikiuonekana bila swastika au alama nyingine za chuki) ikawa ya kawaida katika mavazi na chapa za michezo kali hadi ikawa vigumu kuihesabu kiotomatiki kama ishara ya chuki [4]. Hivyo, swastika bado ina mzigo mzito wa kihistoria unaorudisha kumbukumbu za mauaji ya mamilioni, ilhali Msalaba wa Chuma katika sura yake isiyo na swastika mara nyingi huonekana kama nembo ya “rebeli” isiyo na ujumbe wa wazi wa ubaguzi, ingawa bado huweza kutumiwa na vikundi vya chuki, na kwa hiyo muktadha wake ni muhimu [3].
all_claims: Swastika imebaki kuwa mwiko kwa sababu baada ya Wanazi kuiweka katikati ya propaganda yao kama “alama ya mbio za Aryan,” inahusishwa moja kwa moja na Nazism, Holocaust na chuki dhidi ya Wayahudi, hivyo watu wengi Magharibi huiangalia kama ishara ya chuki isiyovumilika hata leo [1].

Title: Swastika (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: In the Western world, it was a symbol of auspiciousness and good luck until the 1930s[4] when the right-facing tilted form became a feature of Nazi symbolism as an emblem of the Aryan race. As a result of World War II and the Holocaust, many people in the West still strongly associate it with Nazism and antisemitism.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Historia ya swastika (encyclopedia.ushmm.org)
Content: Chama cha Nazi haikuwa chama pekee cha kutumia swastika huko Ujerumani. Baada ya Vita vya Kwanza vya Ulimwengu, idadi ya harakati za kitaifa za kulia zilipitisha Swastika. Kama ishara, ilihusishwa na wazo la hali ya "safi". Kufikia wakati Wanazi walipata udhibiti wa Ujerumani, maelewano ya swastika yalikuwa yamebadilika milele.

Document ID: 3
Title: Iron Cross (www.adl.org)
Content: Iron Cross ni medali maarufu ya kijeshi ya Ujerumani iliyoanzia karne ya 19. Wakati wa miaka ya 1930, serikali ya Nazi huko Ujerumani ilizidisha swastika kwenye medali ya jadi, na kuibadilisha kuwa ishara ya Nazi. Baada ya Vita vya Kidunia vya pili, medali hiyo ilikataliwa lakini Neo-Nazi na wakuu wengine wazungu waliipitisha kama ishara ya chuki na imekuwa ishara ya chuki ya kawaida tangu hapo.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Iron Cross (www.adl.org)
Content: Huko Merika, hata hivyo, Cross ya Iron pia ikawa moja ya alama kadhaa za Nazi-era zilizopitishwa na baiskeli za sheria, zaidi kuashiria uasi au mshtuko kuliko kwa itikadi yoyote ya juu ya supremacist. Kufikia miaka ya 2000 mapema, matumizi haya mengine ya Cross ya Iron yalikuwa yameenea kutoka kwa baiskeli hadi skateboarders na washiriki wengi wa michezo uliokithiri na ikawa sehemu ya nembo ya kampuni kadhaa tofauti zinazozalisha vifaa na mavazi kwa hadhira hii. Kwa hivyo, utumiaji wa msalaba wa chuma katika muktadha usio wa ubaguzi wa rangi umeenea sana huko Merika, hadi kufikia kwamba msalaba wa chuma uliotengwa (i.e., bila swastika iliyo wazi au bila alama zingine za chuki) haziwezi kuamua kuwa ishara ya chuki.

claim: CRISPR ni zana ya uhariri wa jeni inayotumia mlolongo mfupi wa RNA unaoongoza protini ya Cas9 kutambua na kukata sehemu mahususi ya DNA; jina lake linatokana na vichapuko vinavyorudiarudia vinavyoitwa “clustered regularly interspaced palindromic repeats”
question_src: Je! CRISPR inafanyaje kazi kwa maana?
report_src: CRISPR ni zana ya uhariri wa jeni inayotumia mlolongo mfupi wa RNA unaoongoza protini ya Cas9 kutambua na kukata sehemu mahususi ya DNA; jina lake linatokana na vichapuko vinavyorudiarudia vinavyoitwa “clustered regularly interspaced palindromic repeats” [1]. Mfumo huu wa CRISPR/Cas9 ulielezewa kwa mara ya kwanza miaka ya 2012–2013 na kuifanya maabara nyingi duniani kuanza kubadilisha jenomu za viumbe mbalimbali [2]. Cas9 hufanya kama mkasi wa molekuli: ikifika kwenye mlengo unaolingana na mwongozo wa RNA hukata nyuzi zote mbili za DNA, kisha seli hutumia michakato yake ya kurekebisha DNA ama “kuzima” jeni kwa kuunganisha vipande visivyolingana, ama “kuandika upya” jeni kwa kutumia kiolezo kipya cha DNA kilichoingizwa na mtafiti. Uchaguzi sahihi wa mwongozo wa RNA huwezesha karibu kila jeni katika mmea au mnyama kubadilishwa haraka na kwa ufanisi [3]. Vifaa vya CRISPR sasa vinapatikana mtandaoni kwa takribani dola 130, jambo linalorahisisha kuenea kwa teknolojia hii [5]. Tayari imetumika kutibu magonjwa ya urithi kwa wanyama, kupambana na virusi na kuandaa viungo vya kupandikiza kwa binadamu [3].
all_claims: CRISPR ni zana ya uhariri wa jeni inayotumia mlolongo mfupi wa RNA unaoongoza protini ya Cas9 kutambua na kukata sehemu mahususi ya DNA; jina lake linatokana na vichapuko vinavyorudiarudia vinavyoitwa “clustered regularly interspaced palindromic repeats” [1].
Mfumo huu wa CRISPR/Cas9 ulielezewa kwa mara ya kwanza miaka ya 2012–2013 na kuifanya maabara nyingi duniani kuanza kubadilisha jenomu za viumbe mbalimbali [2].

Title: Mfafanuzi: Jinsi CRISPR inavyofanya kazi (www.sciencenewsforstudents.org)
Content: Chombo hiki kinaweza haraka na kwa ufanisi karibu na jeni yoyote katika mmea wowote au mnyama. Title: Future ya Xenobot inakuja - mipango ya kuanza sasa (www.wired.com)
Content: CRISPR inaweza kuwa mpya, lakini mambo muhimu ya mazungumzo yetu hayakuwa ya asili. Tulizingatia wasiwasi wa wanasayansi - kutokuwa na uhakika wa kisheria, upatikanaji wa utafiti wa fedha, umiliki wa miliki -na juu ya wasiwasi wa maafisa wa serikali - usalama wa kitaifa na kurudi nyuma kwa umma kwa "watoto wabuni." Mazungumzo kama hayo yalitokea mnamo 1991 wakati majaribio ya tiba ya kwanza ya jeni yalipoanza kwa wanadamu, na tena mnamo 1996 na kuzaliwa kwa Dolly, kondoo aliyefungwa. Miaka michache baadaye, mnamo 2003, mpangilio wa genome la kwanza la mwanadamu ulizua wasiwasi huo. Maswali yalikuwa nyembamba na ya kupunguza, kwa sehemu kwa sababu wale wanaouliza maswali walifikiria tu siku zijazo ambazo tulikata, kunakili, na kubandika vifaa vya maumbile vilivyopo. Walishindwa kuona siku zijazo ambazo mtu yeyote anaweza kuunda maisha kutoka mwanzo.

---
Document ID: 2
Title: Mfafanuzi: Jinsi CRISPR inavyofanya kazi (www.sciencenewsforstudents.org)
Content: Chombo hiki cha CRISPR/Cas9 kilielezewa kwanza mnamo 2012 na 2013. Maabara ya sayansi kote ulimwenguni ilianza kuitumia kubadilisha genome ya kiumbe - seti nzima ya maagizo yake ya DNA.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Explainer: How CRISPR works (www.sciencenewsforstudents.org)
Content: This tool can quickly and efficiently tweak almost any gene in any plant or animal. Researchers already have used it to fix genetic diseases in animals, to combat viruses and to sterilize mosquitoes. They have also used it to prepare pig organs for human transplants and to beef up the muscles in beagles.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Future ya Xenobot inakuja - mipango ya kuanza sasa (www.wired.com)
Content: CRISPR inaweza kuwa mpya, lakini mambo muhimu ya mazungumzo yetu hayakuwa ya asili. Tulizingatia wasiwasi wa wanasayansi - kutokuwa na uhakika wa kisheria, upatikanaji wa utafiti wa fedha, umiliki wa miliki -na juu ya wasiwasi wa maafisa wa serikali - usalama wa kitaifa na kurudi nyuma kwa umma kwa "watoto wabuni." Mazungumzo kama hayo yalitokea mnamo 1991 wakati majaribio ya tiba ya kwanza ya jeni yalipoanza kwa wanadamu, na tena mnamo 1996 na kuzaliwa kwa Dolly, kondoo aliyefungwa. Miaka michache baadaye, mnamo 2003, mpangilio wa genome la kwanza la mwanadamu ulizua wasiwasi huo. Maswali yalikuwa nyembamba na ya kupunguza, kwa sehemu kwa sababu wale wanaouliza maswali walifikiria tu siku zijazo ambazo tulikata, kunakili, na kubandika vifaa vya maumbile vilivyopo. Walishindwa kuona siku zijazo ambazo mtu yeyote anaweza kuunda maisha kutoka mwanzo.
---
Document ID: 5
Title: Mbinu mpya ambayo inawaruhusu wanasayansi kuhariri DNA ni kubadilisha sayansi -na kuongeza maswali magumu (wakati.com)
Content: Ilikuwa. Kazi ya Zhang ilionyesha kuwa CRISPR inaweza kutumika kwa usahihi na kwa ufanisi kuhariri DNA ya seli za binadamu. Na kwa hiyo, mapinduzi yalikuwa yanaendelea.


Leo unaweza kwenda mkondoni kwa idadi yoyote ya kampuni za usambazaji wa kibaolojia na kuagiza kitengo chako cha CRISPR kwa kidogo kama $ 130.

question_src: Je! CRISPR inafanyaje kazi kwa maana?
report_src: CRISPR ni zana ya uhariri wa jeni inayotumia mlolongo mfupi wa RNA unaoongoza protini ya Cas9 kutambua na kukata sehemu mahususi ya DNA; jina lake linatokana na vichapuko vinavyorudiarudia vinavyoitwa “clustered regularly interspaced palindromic repeats” [1]. Mfumo huu wa CRISPR/Cas9 ulielezewa kwa mara ya kwanza miaka ya 2012–2013 na kuifanya maabara nyingi duniani kuanza kubadilisha jenomu za viumbe mbalimbali [2]. Cas9 hufanya kama mkasi wa molekuli: ikifika kwenye mlengo unaolingana na mwongozo wa RNA hukata nyuzi zote mbili za DNA, kisha seli hutumia michakato yake ya kurekebisha DNA ama “kuzima” jeni kwa kuunganisha vipande visivyolingana, ama “kuandika upya” jeni kwa kutumia kiolezo kipya cha DNA kilichoingizwa na mtafiti. Uchaguzi sahihi wa mwongozo wa RNA huwezesha karibu kila jeni katika mmea au mnyama kubadilishwa haraka na kwa ufanisi [3]. Vifaa vya CRISPR sasa vinapatikana mtandaoni kwa takribani dola 130, jambo linalorahisisha kuenea kwa teknolojia hii [5]. Tayari imetumika kutibu magonjwa ya urithi kwa wanyama, kupambana na virusi na kuandaa viungo vya kupandikiza kwa binadamu [3].

claim: Katika Ugiriki ya kale hakukuwa na mfumo mmoja wa kuhesabu mwaka; Waathene, kwa mfano, walitumia “kalenda ya tamasha” ya miezi ya kibulaniti iliyobadilishana kati ya siku 29 na 30 kulingana na uchunguzi wa mwezi, bila fomula ngumu iliyowekwa
question_src: Kuhesabu mwaka katika Ugiriki ya kale
report_src: Katika Ugiriki ya kale hakukuwa na mfumo mmoja wa kuhesabu mwaka; Waathene, kwa mfano, walitumia “kalenda ya tamasha” ya miezi ya kibulaniti iliyobadilishana kati ya siku 29 na 30 kulingana na uchunguzi wa mwezi, bila fomula ngumu iliyowekwa[1]. Sambamba nao kulikuwapo “kalenda ya kisiasa” iliyogawanya mwaka katika prytany, kila moja ikiendana na phyle (kabila la uraia); hadi 307 KK kulikuwa na phyle 10, kisha idadi ikabadilika kati ya 11 na 13 (mara nyingi 12), hivyo pia idadi ya prytany ilibadilika[1]. Kwa kuwa ulinganifu kati ya kalenda hizi mbili haukuwa thabiti, hati zilizotiwa tarehe kwa prytany huwa ngumu kubadili kuwa tarehe za Juliano, na watafiti hutoa makadirio tu[1]. Mbali na kalenda za miji, wanahistoria wa Kiaugiriki waliweka majira makuu ya Panheleni kwa kuhesabu Olimpiki; kila mzunguko ulidumu miaka minne, na mwaka wa kwanza ulioitwa Ol. 1,1 umeunganishwa na 776 KK, ambao hutumiwa kama nukta sahihi ya ulinganifu na enzi ya kawaida[2]. Orodha za washindi na kulinganisha na maafisa wa miji husaidia kubadilisha matukio, kama vile kupatwa kwa jua katika Ol. 117,3 linalolingana na 15 Agosti 310 KK[2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: The Ancient Greek Calendar | Polysyllabic (www.polysyllabic.com)
Content: The Athenians seem to have taken a rather casual attitude towards their calendar. It appears they used neither a regular formula nor continuous direct observation to determine the length of the months. Most likely, they followed a general rule of alternating months (29 and 30 days long), subject to periodic correction by observation.

In addition to this calendar, which has been called the festival calendar, Athenians maintained a second calendar for the political year. This "conciliar" year divided the year into "prytanies," one for each of the "phylai," the subdivisions of Athenian citizens. The number of phylai, and hence the number of prytanies, varies over time. Until 307 BCE, there were 10 phylai.

After that the number varies between 11 and 13 (usually 12). Even more confusing, while the conciliar and festival years were basically the same length in the 4th century BCE, such was not regularly the case earlier or later. Thus documents dated by prytany are frequently very difficult to assign to a particular equivalent in the Julian calendar, although we are usually secure in assigning an approximate date
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Kalenda ya Uigiriki ya Kale | Polysyllabic (www.polysyllabic.com)
Content: Wanahistoria wa zamani wa tarehe ya Olimpiki kwa kutoa idadi ya Olimpiki na mwaka ulio ndani ya mzunguko, 1-4 (Olimpiki yenyewe ilifanyika mwaka 1). Kwa kuongeza, orodha za washindi wa Olimpiki zilitunzwa, na 3 c. Mwandishi wa BCE Timaios aliandaa orodha ya kusawazisha kulinganisha washindi wa Olimpiki, Athene Archons, Spartan Kings, na makuhani wa Hera kutoka Argos.

Olimpiki 1,1 inahusiana hadi 776 KWK. Kwa kweli hatuhitaji kuamini sikukuu halisi ilifanyika tarehe hii, lakini wakati wanahistoria wa Uigiriki wanaandika katika nyakati za baadaye, wanapata matukio yao wenyewe kwa kutumia hii kama wakati. Tunaweza kuanzisha uunganisho sahihi kwa enzi ya kawaida kutoka kwa vyanzo tofauti, lakini dhahiri zaidi hutoka kwa kifungu huko Diodorus, ambapo anaanza mwaka wa kupatwa kwa jua kwa jua kwa utawala wa Athene Archon Hieromnemon, ambao pia hutoa kama Ol. 117,3. Tarehe pekee inayowezekana ya kisayansi kwa hafla hii ni Agosti 15, 310 KWK, ambayo hurekebisha wakati wetu

Title: The Ancient Greek Calendar | Polysyllabic (www.polysyllabic.com)
Content: The Athenians seem to have taken a rather casual attitude towards their calendar. It appears they used neither a regular formula nor continuous direct observation to determine the length of the months. Most likely, they followed a general rule of alternating months (29 and 30 days long), subject to periodic correction by observation.

In addition to this calendar, which has been called the festival calendar, Athenians maintained a second calendar for the political year. This "conciliar" year divided the year into "prytanies," one for each of the "phylai," the subdivisions of Athenian citizens. The number of phylai, and hence the number of prytanies, varies over time. Until 307 BCE, there were 10 phylai.

After that the number varies between 11 and 13 (usually 12). Even more confusing, while the conciliar and festival years were basically the same length in the 4th century BCE, such was not regularly the case earlier or later. Thus documents dated by prytany are frequently very difficult to assign to a particular equivalent in the Julian calendar, although we are usually secure in assigning an approximate date

Title: The Ancient Greek Calendar | Polysyllabic (www.polysyllabic.com)
Content: Ancient historians date by Olympiad by giving both the number of the Olympiad and the year within the cycle, 1-4 (the Olympiad itself was held on year 1). Additionally, lists of Olympic winners were maintained, and the 3rd c. BCE writer Timaios compiled a synchronic list comparing Olympic winners, Athenian archons, Spartan kings, and the priests of Hera from Argos.

Olympiad 1,1 correlates to 776 BCE. We do not actually need to believe an actual festival was held on this date, but when Greek historians are writing in later times, they date their own events using this as the epoch. We can establish a precise correlation to the common era from a variety of different sources, but the most definitive comes from a passage in Diodorus, where he dates the year of a total solar eclipse to the reign of the Athenian archon Hieromnemon, which he also gives as Ol. 117,3. The only astronomically possible date for this event is August 15, 310 BCE, which fixes our epoch

claim: Mara tu wimbo unapoanzishwa kwenye simu, kigeuzi cha ndani hubadilisha data ya dijiti kuwa ishara ya sauti ya analog, kisha ishara hiyo huingia kwenye kebo ya aux yenye waya wa shaba; hapa inasafiri kama wimbi linalobadilika la umeme kwa sababu nyaya za AUX husambaza tu ishara za analog na si dijiti
question_src: Je! Wimbo husafirishwaje kwenye kebo ya aux kutoka kwa simu na kucheza kwenye gari?
report_src: Mara tu wimbo unapoanzishwa kwenye simu, kigeuzi cha ndani hubadilisha data ya dijiti kuwa ishara ya sauti ya analog, kisha ishara hiyo huingia kwenye kebo ya aux yenye waya wa shaba; hapa inasafiri kama wimbi linalobadilika la umeme kwa sababu nyaya za AUX husambaza tu ishara za analog na si dijiti [2]. Waya huo wa shaba hubeba “wimbi endelevu la habari ya umeme” kuelekea pembejeo ya aux ya redio ya gari [1]. Redio huchukua ishara hiyo, huiimarisha na kuielekeza kwenye spika. Ndani ya spika, mkondo wa umeme unaopita kwenye koili unaunda uga wa sumaku unaobadilika ambao unashirikiana na sumaku ya kudumu, kusukuma na kuvuta koni ya spika na hivyo kutikisa hewa, hatua inayofanya tufe sauti halisi inayosikika ndani ya gari [3]. Hivyo mchakato ni: ubadilishaji dijiti-kuwa-analog → usafirishaji wa mkondo katika kebo ya shaba → ukuzaji (amplification) → mwendo wa koni ya spika → sauti.

Content: The main difference between a USB (Universal Serial Bus) connection and an auxiliary input is that USB cords send digital information while aux cables send analog signals. question_src: Mtu anawezaje kuniweka gerezani ikiwa sina hatia?
report_src: Mtu anaweza kukuweka gerezani hata ukiwa huna hatia kutokana na mchanganyiko wa makosa na ufisadi katika mchakato wa upelelezi na mashtaka, jambo linaloeleza kwa nini asilimia 2–10 ya waliopo gerezani Marekani—sawa na watu 46,000–230,000—huenda hawana hatia [1]. Polisi wasio waaminifu wanaweza kuficha, kubadilisha au kutunga ushahidi, kutisha mashahidi, na hata kupanga utambulisho wa shuhuda ili kukuonyesha kama mkosaji [2]. Waendesha mashtaka wanaopindisha haki huficha ushahidi unaokuondolea lawama, kuwahamasisha mashahidi kutoa taarifa za uongo, au kuwasilisha “wataalamu” hewa kuthibitisha tuhuma batili [3]. Vilevile, ukizuiliwa na kuhojiwa kwa muda mrefu—hadi masaa 10—ukikabiliwa na mbinu za kisaikolojia na vitisho, unaweza kukiri uhalifu usiolifanya; karibu robo ya watu 330 waliotakaswa kwa DNA kati ya 1989–2015 walitoa maungamo ya uwongo baada ya mazingira kama hayo [4]. Mbinu hizi zinapoungana, zinatengeneza kesi bandia inayoweza kumshawishi jaji au baraza la mahakama kwamba una hatia, hivyo kukuhukumu kifungo bila makosa yako.

Title: Why the innocent end up in prison (www.chicagotribune.com)
Content: False confessions. Most jurors find it impossible to believe that a suspect would confess to a serious crime he didn't commit. question_src: Kwa kusema kisayansi, kuna uwezekano gani kwamba uwepo wetu ni mdogo sana?
report_src: Kulingana na “Nadharia ya Nadra ya Dunia”, uwepo wa viumbe vyenye akili kama wanadamu unaweza kuwa tukio adimu sana kwa sababu unategemea mfululizo mrefu wa bahati mbaya ya hali mahususi: nyota na mfumo wa sayari lazima wawe katika eneo linaloweza kuishi, sayari yenyewe iwe na ulinganifu sahihi wa misa, iwe na walinzi wa gesi kama Mshtarii kuikinga na athari nyingi, iwe na satelaiti kubwa, gesi uhamaji (tectonics) na uwanja wa sumaku unaoleta utulivu wa muda mrefu kwa angahewa, pamoja na mzunguko sahihi wa elementi za kemikali katika bahari na angahewa [1]. Zaidi ya hayo, hatua muhimu za kibiolojia—kuibuka kwa seli za eukaryoti, uzazi wa kijinsia, “mlipuko” wa Cambrian, na hatimaye mageuzi ya akili ya kibinadamu—zinaweza kuwa zinahitaji matukio mengine adimu yasiyotarajiwa [1]. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Rare Earth hypothesis (en.wikipedia.org)
Content: The Rare Earth hypothesis argues that the evolution of biological complexity anywhere in the universe requires the coincidence of a large number of fortuitous circumstances, including, among others, a galactic habitable zone; a central star and planetary system having the requisite character (i.e. a circumstellar habitable zone); a terrestrial planet of the right mass; the advantage of one or more gas giant guardians like Jupiter and possibly a large natural satellite to shield the planet from frequent impact events; conditions needed to ensure the planet has a magnetosphere and plate tectonics; a chemistry similar to that present in the Earth's lithosphere, atmosphere, and oceans; the influence of periodic "evolutionary pumps" such as massive glaciations and bolide impacts; and whatever factors may have led to the emergence of eukaryotic cells, sexual reproduction, and the Cambrian explosion of animal, plant, and fungi phyla. The evolution of human beings and of human intelligence may have required yet further specific events and circumstances, all of which are extremely unlikely to have happened

question_src: Je! Ndege zinajuaje ni njia gani Kusini wakati wa kuhamia kwa msimu wa baridi?
report_src: Ndege wanaohama hutegemea mchanganyiko wa viashiria vya anga, kijiografia na kibaolojia ili kujua njia ya kuelekea Kusini wakati wa msimu wa baridi. Mchana hutumia nafasi ya Jua ambalo huchomoza mashariki na kuzama magharibi kama dira ya asili, wakirekebisha mwelekeo kadiri linavyosogea angani [1]. Usiku, nyota na miungano yake huchukua nafasi ya Jua, na ndege huelekeza safari zao kwa kutazama usanifu wa anga kama walivyofanya mabaharia wa zamani [1]. Mbali na viashiria hivi, ndege hufuata alama za ardhini kama mito, mabonde, barabara au vilele vya milima ambavyo hujichora vyema kutoka juu, na hivyo kurahisisha ufuatiliaji wa njia zinazoshuka kuelekea maeneo ya joto [3]. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: How Do Birds Know Which Way is South? (www.wonderopolis.org)
Content: One thing birds definitely rely upon is the Sun. The Sun rises in the east and sets in the west. Birds flying south for the winter can stay on track by using the Sun's position in the sky throughout the day as a guide.


Of course, once the Sun sets, it isn't much help as a guide. Luckily, many birds can also navigate by the position of the stars in the sky once night rolls around. Constellations guided many sailors at night before modern technology came along. Birds can use the stars as navigational aids in the same way.


Birds also have the benefit of a bird's eye view. Human hikers lost in the woods sometimes must climb to the top of the nearest mountain to be able to see natural or man-made landscape features, like roads or coastlines, to find their way home. Birds just take to the sky where they get an awesome view of everything below them. Sometimes traveling south is as simple as following the path of a river that travels south to warmer temperatures.


Finally, some scientists believe some birds may also get some of their guidance from Earth's magnetic field. Some species of birds have a highly-magnetic mineral called magnetite in their brains. Experts believe this mineral may help birds detect Earth's magnetic field and use it to guide them south.
---

Title: Je! Ndege zinajuaje njia gani Kusini? (www.wonderopolis.org)
Content: Jambo moja ndege hutegemea ni Jua. Jua linachomoza mashariki na huweka magharibi. Ndege zinazoruka kusini kwa msimu wa baridi zinaweza kukaa kwenye wimbo kwa kutumia nafasi ya jua angani siku nzima kama mwongozo.


Kwa kweli, jua linapochomoza, sio msaada sana kama mwongozo. Kwa bahati nzuri, ndege wengi wanaweza pia kuzunguka kwa msimamo wa nyota angani mara moja usiku unazunguka. Constellations ziliongoza mabaharia wengi usiku kabla ya teknolojia ya kisasa kuja. Ndege zinaweza kutumia nyota kama misaada ya majini kwa njia ile ile.


Ndege pia zina faida ya mtazamo wa jicho la ndege. Watekaji wa kibinadamu waliopotea msituni wakati mwingine lazima wapanda juu ya mlima wa karibu ili kuweza kuona sura za mazingira au za mwanadamu, kama barabara au pwani, kupata njia yao ya kurudi nyumbani. Ndege huchukua tu angani ambapo wanapata mtazamo mzuri wa kila kitu chini yao. Wakati mwingine kusafiri kusini ni rahisi kama kufuata njia ya mto ambao husafiri kusini kwa joto la joto.


Mwishowe, wanasayansi wengine wanaamini ndege wengine wanaweza pia kupata mwongozo wao kutoka kwa sumaku ya Dunia. Aina zingine za ndege zina madini ya sumaku inayoitwa magnetite kwenye akili zao. Wataalam wanaamini madini haya yanaweza kusaidia ndege kugundua sumaku ya Dunia na kuitumia kuwaongoza kusini.
---

Title: Je! Ndege zinajuaje njia gani Kusini? (www.wonderopolis.org)
Content: Jambo moja ndege hutegemea ni Jua. Jua linachomoza mashariki na huweka magharibi. Ndege zinazoruka kusini kwa msimu wa baridi zinaweza kukaa kwenye wimbo kwa kutumia nafasi ya jua angani siku nzima kama mwongozo.


Kwa kweli, jua linapochomoza, sio msaada sana kama mwongozo. Kwa bahati nzuri, ndege wengi wanaweza pia kuzunguka kwa msimamo wa nyota angani mara moja usiku unazunguka. Constellations ziliongoza mabaharia wengi usiku kabla ya teknolojia ya kisasa kuja. Ndege zinaweza kutumia nyota kama misaada ya majini kwa njia ile ile.


Ndege pia zina faida ya mtazamo wa jicho la ndege. Watekaji wa kibinadamu waliopotea msituni wakati mwingine lazima wapanda juu ya mlima wa karibu ili kuweza kuona sura za mazingira au za mwanadamu, kama barabara au pwani, kupata njia yao ya kurudi nyumbani. Ndege huchukua tu angani ambapo wanapata mtazamo mzuri wa kila kitu chini yao. Wakati mwingine kusafiri kusini ni rahisi kama kufuata njia ya mto ambao husafiri kusini kwa joto la joto.


Mwishowe, wanasayansi wengine wanaamini ndege wengine wanaweza pia kupata mwongozo wao kutoka kwa sumaku ya Dunia. Aina zingine za ndege zina madini ya sumaku inayoitwa magnetite kwenye akili zao. Wataalam wanaamini madini haya yanaweza kusaidia ndege kugundua sumaku ya Dunia na kuitumia kuwaongoza kusini.

Document ID: 2
Title: How Do Birds Navigate? (www.nationalgeographic.org)
Content: The flight paths used by birds in their annual migrations are called flyway s.


Scientists are not entirely sure how birds navigate their flyways. They seem to have an internal global positioning system (GPS) that allows them to follow the same pattern every year. A young bird imprint s on the sun and stars to help orient it. Some researchers think a bird may also recognize landmark s.


Individual organ s also contribute to a bird’s remarkable navigational ability. A bird’s eyes interact with its brain in a region called “cluster N”, which probably helps the bird determine which way is north. Tiny amounts of iron in the neurons of a bird’s inner ear also help in this determination.

question_src: Je! "Mfano mdogo" ni nini?

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Finance 101: How Do Banks Make Money? - Money Under 30 (www.moneyunder30.com)
Content: It all ties back to the fundamental way banks make money: Banks use depositors’ money to make loans. The amount of interest the banks collect on the loans is greater than the amount of interest they pay to customers with savings accounts—and the difference is the banks’ profit.


For example: You currently have an emergency fund of $10,000 in a high yield savings account that may pay 1.50% APY. The bank uses that money to fund someone’s:


* Mortgage at 5.50% APR
* Student loan at 6.65% APR
* Credit card at 16.99% APR


Your bank may have paid you $150 in a year’s time but they earned hundreds or thousands more from the interest on loans (made possible with your money). Now, think about this process repeated with millions of banking customers and billions of dollars.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Fedha 101: Benki hufanyaje pesa? - Pesa chini ya 30 (www.moneyunder30.com)
Content: Ndio, benki hufanya benki nyingi za pesa kutoka kwa malipo ya wakopaji, lakini ada za benki ni za faida tu.


* Ada ya akaunti. Bidhaa zingine za kawaida za kifedha ambazo ada ya malipo ni kuangalia akaunti, akaunti za uwekezaji, na kadi za mkopo. Ada hizi zinasemekana kuwa kwa "madhumuni ya kudumisha" ingawa kudumisha akaunti hizi hugharimu benki kidogo.
* Ada ya ATM. Kutakuwa na wakati ambao huwezi kupata ATM ya benki yako na lazima utatue kwa ATM nyingine ili kupata pesa. Kweli, hiyo itakugharimu $ 3. Hali kama hizi hufanyika wakati wote na inamaanisha pesa zaidi kwa benki.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Fedha 101: Benki hufanyaje pesa? - Pesa chini ya 30 (www.moneyunder30.com)
Content: * Mashtaka ya adhabu. Benki zinapenda kupiga kofi kwa ada ya adhabu kwa kitu ambacho shida za mteja. Inaweza malipo ya kadi ya mkopo ambayo umetuma saa 5:05 jioni. Inaweza kuwa cheki iliyoandikwa kwa kiasi ambacho kilikuwa senti moja juu ya kile ulichokuwa nacho katika akaunti yako ya kuangalia. Chochote kinachoweza kuwa, tarajia kulipa ada ya marehemu au ada mbaya ya overdraft au kati ya $ 25 na $ 40. Inavuta wateja, lakini benki zina mlipuko.
* Tume. Benki nyingi zitakuwa na mgawanyiko wa uwekezaji ambao mara nyingi hufanya kazi kama udalali wa huduma kamili. Kwa kweli, ada yao ya tume ya kutengeneza biashara ni kubwa kuliko madalali wengi wa punguzo.
* Ada ya Maombi. Wakati wowote akopaye anayetarajiwa kutumika kwa mkopo (haswa mkopo wa nyumba) benki nyingi huchaji malipo ya mkopo au ada ya maombi. Na, wanaweza kuchukua uhuru wa kujumuisha kiasi hiki cha ada katika mkuu wa mkopo wako - ambayo inamaanisha kuwa utalipa riba pia! .

prompt:

Title: Fedha 101: Benki hufanyaje pesa? - Pesa chini ya 30 (www.moneyunder30.com)
Content: Yote inafunga nyuma kwa njia ya msingi benki hufanya pesa: Benki hutumia pesa za amana kufanya mikopo. Kiasi cha riba ambacho benki hukusanya kwenye mikopo ni kubwa kuliko kiasi cha riba wanayolipa kwa wateja walio na akaunti za akiba -na tofauti ni faida ya benki.


Kwa mfano: kwa sasa una mfuko wa dharura wa $ 10,000 katika akaunti kubwa ya akiba ya mavuno ambayo inaweza kulipa 1.50% APY. Benki hutumia pesa hizo kufadhili mtu:


* Rehani kwa 5.50% Aprili
* Mkopo wa mwanafunzi kwa 6.65% Aprili
* Kadi ya mkopo kwa 16.99% Aprili


Benki yako inaweza kuwa imekulipa $ 150 kwa wakati wa mwaka lakini walipata mamia au maelfu zaidi kutoka kwa riba juu ya mikopo (iliyowezekana na pesa yako). Sasa, fikiria juu ya mchakato huu unaorudiwa na mamilioni ya wateja wa benki na mabilioni ya dola.

Document ID: 2
Title: Finance 101: How Do Banks Make Money? - Money Under 30 (www.moneyunder30.com)
Content: Yes, banks make a lot of money banks from charging borrowers interest, but the fees banks change are just as lucrative.


* Account fees. Some typical financial products that charge fees are checking accounts, investment accounts, and credit cards. These fees are said to be for “maintenances purposes” even though maintaining these accounts costs banks relatively little.
* ATM fees. There will be times when you can’t find your bank’s ATM and you must settle for another ATM just to get some cash. Well, that’s probably going to cost you $3. Such situations happen all the time and just mean more money for banks.

question_src: Ikiwa ningeunda kampuni, kuwa na deni la $ 1M, kwenda kufilisika, ni vipi kampuni ambayo nina deni kupata pesa zake? lazima nilipe?
report_src: Ukifungua LLC/Shirika, ukakopa $1M, kisha kampuni ikafilisika, deni hilo linageuka kuwa dai dhidi ya mali za kampuni na hukidhiwa kutoka katika mali zitakazouzwa na msimamizi wa kufilisika; ikiwa mali hazitoshi, kiasi kilichobaki hakitalipwa na kampuni tena [1]. Kwa kawaida, wewe binafsi huna wajibu wa kulipa salio ikiwa hukusaini dhamana ya kibinafsi (personal guarantee) au kuahidi mali yako kama dhamana, kwa sababu mkopeshaji anaweza kudai tu mali za kampuni [2]. Hata hivyo, uliposaini dhamana au uliweka nyumba/mali yako kama rehani, mkopeshaji ana haki kuja moja kwa moja kwenye mali zako binafsi ili kukusanya deni hilo [2]. Isitoshe, hata bila dhamana, mkopeshaji anaweza kuomba korti “kupasua pazia la shirika” ikiwa uliunganisha fedha zako na za kampuni, hukufuata taratibu rasmi za ushirika, uliianzisha kampuni bila mtaji wa kutosha au ulifanya udanganyifu; hali hizi zinaweza kukufanya uajibike binafsi kwa deni lote [3]. Kwa hiyo, iwapo haukutoa dhamana wala kufanya vitendo vinavyoruhusu kupasuliwa kwa pazia, deni litabaki kwa kampuni na hutalazimika kulipa kutoka fedha zako binafsi, lakini ukiwa na dhamana au ukiwa na makosa yaliyoelezwa, utachukuliwa kuwajibika.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: If A Company Goes Out of Business Do I Owe Debt to Collection Agency? (www.debtcollectionanswers.com)
Content: The debt you owe as a debtor to a company that goes into bankruptcy administration will become part of the assets of the company in bankruptcy.


However, exactly what happens if you owe money to a company that goes out of business, and how that debt will be collected, depends in part on the status of the debt.



"The fact that a company files for bankruptcy does not automatically erase any


debt you owe."


If a lender is collecting the debt but goes out of business, you will need to continue to make payments on the loan or you risk damage to your credit reports and credit scores. If the company files for bankruptcy, the court will instruct you where to make your monthly payments if that changes. If you have any dispute over whether the debt is valid, raise that dispute as soon as you are notified of the bankruptcy. If you don’t, the debt may be considered valid.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Wakati unaweza kuwajibika kwa LLC au deni la ushirika (www.nolo.com)
Content: Ikiwa unashikilia mkopo wa biashara, unawajibika sawa na Shirika au LLC kuilipa. Kawaida hii ndio njia rahisi zaidi ya kujifanya kwa hiari kuwajibika kwa deni la kampuni yako. Vivyo hivyo, ikiwa unahakikisha jukumu la shirika au LLC basi mkopeshaji anaweza kuja baada ya mali yako ya kibinafsi ikiwa biashara itafanya mkopo kwa mkopo.


## Kuahidi mali yako kama dhamana


Ikiwa una kampuni mpya au kampuni yako haina mali nyingi, mkopeshaji anaweza kukuhitaji kutoa aina fulani ya dhamana kabla ya kupitisha mkopo. Ikiwa unakubali kuahidi nyumba yako au mali zingine za kibinafsi kama dhamana ya mkopo wa biashara, mkopeshaji anaweza kuchukua mali yako na kuiuza ili kukidhi majukumu ya Kampuni.


## Kutoboa pazia la ushirika


Hapo juu tulijadili njia ambazo unaweza kujifanya kwa hiari kuwajibika kwa deni la ushirika au LLC. Walakini, mkopeshaji anaweza pia kujaribu kufuata mali zako za kibinafsi kwa kuondoa ulinzi mdogo wa dhima iliyotolewa na Shirika au LLC. Hii inajulikana kama kutoboa pazia la ushirika.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Wakati unaweza kuwajibika kwa LLC au deni la ushirika (www.nolo.com)

* Taratibu za ushirika, kama vile kufanya mikutano ya kila mwaka na dakika za kutunza, hazikufuatwa.
* Wamiliki wengine walitoa udhibiti mwingi juu ya shirika au LLC.
* Wamiliki waliunganisha fedha za kibinafsi na fedha za kampuni au walitumia pesa za kibinafsi kukidhi majukumu ya kampuni.
* Kampuni haikuwa na mtaji wa kutosha wakati iliundwa.

Wamiliki wa shirika au LLC wanaweza pia kushikiliwa kibinafsi ikiwa wamepatikana wamefanya udanganyifu

Document ID: 2
Title: When You Might Be Personally Liable for LLC or Corporate Debt (www.nolo.com)
Content: If you cosign on a business loan, you are as equally responsible as the corporation or LLC to pay it back. This is usually the simplest way to voluntarily make yourself liable for your company's debts. Similarly, if you personally guarantee an obligation of the corporation or LLC then the creditor can come after your personal assets if the business defaults on the loan.


## Pledging Your Property as Collateral


If you have a new company or your company does not have many assets, a creditor may require you to provide some sort of collateral before approving the loan. If you agree to pledge your house or other personal assets as collateral for the business loan, the creditor may be able to take your property and sell it to satisfy the obligations of the company.


## Piercing the Corporate Veil


Above we discussed the ways you can voluntarily make yourself personally liable for a corporate or LLC debt. However, a creditor can also try to go after your personal assets by eliminating the limited liability protection provided by the corporation or LLC. This is commonly referred to as piercing the corporate veil.

Title: When You Might Be Personally Liable for LLC or Corporate Debt (www.nolo.com)
Content: more likely to pierce the corporate veil if:


* Corporate formalities, such as holding annual meetings and keeping minutes, were not followed.

* The company was not sufficiently capitalized when it was formed.

## Fraud


A corporation or LLC's owners may also be held personally liable if they are found to have committed fraud

Title: Does plucking/pulling of fan leaves shock the plant? (www.rollitup.org)
Content: The big fan leaves absorb light and retain energy for later use by the plant. By pulling these off you are essentially starving your plant of stored nutrients and energy needed for growth and bud production.

question_src: Je! Tumegundua nini juu ya sayari/mwezi/jua katika mfumo wetu wa jua zaidi ya miaka 50 iliyopita?
report_src: Katika nusu karne iliyopita tumepata mwanga mpya kuhusu majirani wetu wa anga. Mnamo 1974 watazamaji waligundua Leda, mwezi mdogo wa Jupita aliyeitwa Jupiter XIII, na mwaka uliofuata wakaongeza orodha hiyo kwa Themisto [1]. Ujumbe wa Mariner 10 mapema miaka ya 1970 ulionyesha kuwa Utiridi wa Zebaki (Mercury) una uso unaofanana na ule wa Mwezi, una mazingira madogo ya heliamu, mabadiliko ya joto yanayofikia ±300 °C na hata uga wa sumaku [3]. Wakati huo huo uchunguzi wa anga ulidhihirisha kuwa Zuhura (Venus) si “dada” salama wa Dunia bali ni sayari yenye hewa iliyo na asilimia 95 dioksidi kaboni na shinikizo la anga mara 75–100 la Dunia, hali inayofanya uwepo wa maji au uhai kuwa vigumu sana [2]. Mnamo 1976, safari za Viking 1 na Viking 2 zilitua kwenye Mirihi (Mars) na kuanzisha majaribio ya kwanza ya kibiolojia na jiolojia moja kwa moja kwenye uso wa sayari nyingine, hatua iliyotoa data za kina kuhusu udongo, angahewa na uwezekano wa viumbe vidogo [4]. Matokeo haya yanaonyesha jinsi teknolojia ya karne ya 20 ilivyopanua ufahamu wetu kuhusu miili ya Mfumo wa Jua.

Title: Effects of Altitude on Water Boiling Time (mountainhouse.com)
Content: It also impacts the boiling point of water: the temperature at which liquid water begins turning to vapor, which occurs when its vapor pressure equals the atmospheric pressure. At a higher elevation, the lower atmospheric pressure means heated water reaches its boiling point more quickly—i.e., at a lower temperature. question_src: Je! Wanadamu ni omnivores? Kwa nini vegans wengi wanasema sisi ni mimea ya mimea?
report_src: Kwa mtazamo wa kibaolojia wanadamu huchukuliwa kama omnivores kwa kuwa jamii zote za kibinadamu humeza nyama, ingawa kiasi chake hutofautiana [1]. Uchunguzi wa anatomia unaonyesha mpangilio wa meno yetu si maalumu kwa wanyama wala mimea pekee bali ni wa mchanganyiko, tabia ya wanyama wanaokula vyakula vya aina zote mbili [3]. Aidha, kibofu chetu cha nyongo ni kikubwa na hifadhi nyongo nyingi inayohitajika kuvunja mafuta mengi, kiadaptasia inayoonekana kwa carnivores na omnivores pekee [2]. Vilevile, mwili wa mwanadamu hufyonza chuma (heme iron) kwa ufanisi kutoka vyanzo vya wanyama, ishara nyingine ya kuzoea lishe inayojumuisha nyama [4]. Hata hivyo, wapenzi wengi wa lishe ya vegan hudai sisi ni mimea ya mimea kwa sababu katika zama za sasa hatuhitaji tena nyama, maziwa au mayai ili kuishi au hata kustawi, hivyo kimaadili ni bora kuepuka bidhaa za wanyama [5]; wao pia husisitiza kuwa hatuna makucha makali, meno ya kuchana nyama au tindikali kali ya tumbo kama ilivyo kwa wawindaji halisi [6].

claim: Catabolism ni mchakato wa kimetaboliki unaovunja miundo mikubwa kama protini, wanga na mafuta kuwa vitengo vidogo—mfano kuvunjwa kwa kipande cha mkate kuwa molekuli rahisi za sukari—na kutoa nishati inayotumika mara moja; ukikosa chakula, huenda hatua hii ikavunja hata misuli na mafuta ya mwili ili kupata nguvu za kuishi
question_src: Anabolism dhidi ya catabolism, ni nini kila, kila mmoja anaathirije mwili wa mwanadamu, ni nini chanya/hasi ni za kila mmoja.
report_src: Catabolism ni mchakato wa kimetaboliki unaovunja miundo mikubwa kama protini, wanga na mafuta kuwa vitengo vidogo—mfano kuvunjwa kwa kipande cha mkate kuwa molekuli rahisi za sukari—na kutoa nishati inayotumika mara moja; ukikosa chakula, huenda hatua hii ikavunja hata misuli na mafuta ya mwili ili kupata nguvu za kuishi [1]. Huchukua chochote usichotumia sasa na kukihifadhi kama mafuta, hivyo huweza kuongeza uzito bila kujali ubora wa chakula unachokula [3]. Anabolism ni kinyume: huchukua vitengo vidogo kama asidi ya amino, virutubishi na seli, kisha kuvifunga kuunda tishu mpya, kuponya majeraha na kujenga misuli, jambo linaloonekana pia kwenye ukuaji wa watoto na kuimarika kwa nguvu ya misuli [2]. Hutegemea upatikanaji wa virutubishi bora kama mboga, matunda na nyama konda ili mwili upate “vifaa vya ujenzi” vya kutosha [3]. Kiumsingi, catabolism hutoa nishati ilhali anabolism hutumia nishati kuunda molekuli mpya [4]. Chanya za catabolism ni upatikanaji wa nishati ya haraka; hasi ni hatari ya kupoteza misuli na kuhifadhi mafuta kupita kiasi. Chanya za anabolism ni ukarabati wa tishu, ukuaji na kujenga misuli; hasi ni utegemezi wake kwa nishati na lishe bora, hivyo hukwama ukikosa virutubishi.
all_claims: Catabolism ni mchakato wa kimetaboliki unaovunja miundo mikubwa kama protini, wanga na mafuta kuwa vitengo vidogo—mfano kuvunjwa kwa kipande cha mkate kuwa molekuli rahisi za sukari—na kutoa nishati inayotumika mara moja; ukikosa chakula, huenda hatua hii ikavunja hata misuli na mafuta ya mwili ili kupata nguvu za kuishi [1].

Title: Anabolism vs. Catabolism: The Role They Play in Your Metabolism (health.clevelandclinic.org)
Content: When you think catabolism, think digestion, says DiMarino. This process takes larger structures like proteins, fats or tissues and breaks them down into smaller units such as cells or fatty acids. 


Catabolism occurs when you’re digesting food. For example, it’s the process that dissolves a piece of bread into simple nutrients your body can use, like glucose (blood sugar). And if your body isn’t getting the food and nutrients it needs to fuel daily living, catabolism is the mechanism that breaks down muscle and fat for energy.

Content: ### What is anabolism? 


Anabolism is the opposite of catabolism: It’s the mechanism that takes smaller units like nutrients, cells, or amino acids and bonds them together to create bigger structures. 


“One example of anabolism in action is when your body is trying to heal a cut. It adds tissue and structures around that wound,” DiMarino explains. “It’s also the process involved in a child’s growth and in building stronger muscles.”

Document ID: 3
Title: Anabolism vs. Catabolism: The Role They Play in Your Metabolism (health.clevelandclinic.org)
Content: Catabolism functions no matter what you give your body, states DiMarino. It breaks down food, whether it’s junky or nutritious. Whatever it doesn’t use for energy now, it stores for later (hello, extra pounds). 


But anabolism is entirely different. It only functions properly when you’re getting enough nutrients through foods like vegetables, fruits and lean meats. Your body needs high-quality building blocks to heal, repair and grow.

question_src: Je! Ni kwanini ni faux-pa kumuuliza mtu ni pesa ngapi? Je! Ni kama hiyo katika tamaduni zingine?

Aidha watu huogopa kuhukumiwa; wanaopata kidogo wanaweza kuhisi huruma au dharau, ilhali wanaopata zaidi wanaweza kuzushiwa wivu au chuki [3]. Kwa jumla, mazungumzo ya pesa “yanapingana na mikusanyiko ya kijamii” nchini humo, yakionekana kutokuwa na ustaarabu [4]. Unyamavu huo pia huwanufaisha wanaoingiza zaidi, kwani huficha ukosefu wa usawa wa kipato hivyo kuepuka lawama au aibu [4]. Matokeo yake, watu huficha mishahara yao isipokuwa pale inapolazimika au inapotafsiriwa kuwa tendo la kujitolea lenye faida, kama anavyobainisha Profesa Eloundou-Eyegue [1]. question_src: Je! Trafiki ya Expressway inaundaje?
report_src: Trafiki kwenye barabara ya expressway mara nyingi huanza pale madereva wanapopunguza kasi na kisha kuharakisha kidogo kidogo; tofauti ndogo hizi za mwendo hujitokeza kama mawimbi ya “stop-and-go” yanayosambaa nyuma ya gari moja hadi jingine, na ni vigumu kurekebisha tabia hii kwa urahisi [1]. Wakati huo huo, upunguzaji wa uwezo wa barabara—kwa mfano kufunga njia moja au zaidi kwa ajili ya ujenzi—huunda shimo la uwezo (bottleneck) linalosababisha msongamano mrefu na kuchelewesha magari kwa muda mrefu, hasa wakati shughuli hizo zinafanyika saa za kilele cha mchana [2]. Mchanganyiko wa mawimbi ya kasi yasiyotabirika na vikwazo vya kimwili (kama matengenezo, ajali au magari kuunganishwa njia moja) husababisha mkusanyiko wa magari kuzidi uwezo wa barabara, na mara kizingiti hicho kinapovukwa, safari zinaweza kuchelewa maradufu au zaidi hata kama hakuna kizuizi kinachoonekana mbele. Ili kupunguza msongamano, wahandisi hudhibiti mwendo kwa ishara mahususi, kuhamisha kazi za ujenzi nyakati zisizo na shughuli nyingi, na kuweka taarifa kwa madereva ili kudhibiti ongezeko la mahitaji kwa muda.

question_src: Je! Kwa nini tunasema "jozi ya suruali/jeans/kaptula" wakati unazungumza juu ya kitu kimoja cha mavazi wakati wazi sio kuzidisha?
report_src: Tunasema “jozi ya suruali/jeans/kaptula” kwa sababu kihistoria vazi hilo lilitengenezwa kama vipande viwili tofauti—kipande kimoja kwa kila mguu—vilivyovaliwa kwa pamoja kisha kufungwa kiunoni, hivyo kuonekana kama vitu viwili vilivyo katika umoja mmoja [1]; matokeo yake, Kiingereza kikaanza kutaja vazi hilo kama “pair” (jozi). Aidha, nomino kama “trousers,” “shorts,” na “jeans” ni plurale tantum, yaani maneno yanayopatikana tu katika wingi; Kamusi ya Kiingereza ya Oxford huainisha aina hii ya nomino kuwa hutumika tu katika fomu ya wingi ili kueleza jambo linalochukuliwa kiakili kama mbili au zaidi, hata kama kimwili ni kitu kimoja [2]. Rekodi za kwanza za matumizi ya “trousers” katika wingi huko Marekani zinaanzia 1840, neno likiwa ufupisho wa “pantaloons,” ambalo chimbuko lake ni mhusika wa tamthilia za Commedia dell’Arte aliyevaa soksi na suruali fupi mbili zinazofanana, jambo lililochochea mtazamo wa “vipande viwili” [3]. Hivyo, mkusanyiko wa historia ya utengenezaji wa vipande viwili na kanuni ya kisarufi ya plurale tantum ndiyo chanzo cha kusema “jozi” tunaporejelea vazi moja la chini.

claim: Kwanza, muundo laini na rangi ya ngozi huchukuliwa kuwa kidokezo cha uzazi na afya njema, hivyo homogeneity ya ngozi ilihusishwa moja kwa moja na ukadiriaji wa kuvutia katika wanaume, ikionyesha kuwa ngozi inaweza kuwa “alama” ya afya ya ndani na ubora wa jeni
question_src: Je! Kuna sababu ya kibaolojia kwamba wanadamu wanavutiwa na tabia fulani za usoni (kama vile taya iliyofafanuliwa) au ni upendeleo wa kitamaduni tu?
report_src: Ndiyo, kuna msingi wa kibaolojia unaoelezea kwa nini watu wengi huvutiwa na tabia fulani za usoni, ingawa ladha za kitamaduni huchangia pia. Kwanza, muundo laini na rangi ya ngozi huchukuliwa kuwa kidokezo cha uzazi na afya njema, hivyo homogeneity ya ngozi ilihusishwa moja kwa moja na ukadiriaji wa kuvutia katika wanaume, ikionyesha kuwa ngozi inaweza kuwa “alama” ya afya ya ndani na ubora wa jeni [1]. Pili, ulinganifu wa uso unaonekana kuvutia zaidi kwa sababu viwango vya juu vya ulinganifu vinapendekeza mtu aliyeepuka magonjwa na vimelea wakati wa kukua, na hivyo kuwa na kinga thabiti na jeni “bora” kupitisha kizazi kijacho [2]. Tatu, taya iliyofafanuliwa—hasa kwa wanaume—inaashiria viwango vya juu vya testosterone vinavyohusishwa na mfumo wa kinga wenye nguvu na uwezo wa uzazi, jambo ambalo wanawake wengi hulitafsiri kama ishara ya virility na nguvu [3]. Hata hivyo, mabadiliko ya kitamaduni yanaweza kubadili “kigezo” kinachopendelewa, kama vile utafiti ulioona ngozi ya giza ikikadiriwa kuvutia zaidi kinyume na matokeo ya zamani, ukionyesha kuwa upendeleo wa uzuri si wa kibiolojia pekee bali pia huathiriwa na maadili ya kijamii yanayobadilika [1].

Wanawake walio na taya kali wanavutia sawa kwa wanaume na taya iliyofafanuliwa vizuri kwa wanawake inachukuliwa kuwa ishara ya nguvu, neema na jukumu; Tabia ambazo zinavutia sana kwa wanaume. Baadhi ya waigizaji mzuri na mifano huzingatiwa kuwa na taya iliyojaa sana.

report_src: Ndiyo, kuna msingi wa kibaolojia unaoelezea kwa nini watu wengi huvutiwa na tabia fulani za usoni, ingawa ladha za kitamaduni huchangia pia. Kwanza, muundo laini na rangi ya ngozi huchukuliwa kuwa kidokezo cha uzazi na afya njema, hivyo homogeneity ya ngozi ilihusishwa moja kwa moja na ukadiriaji wa kuvutia katika wanaume, ikionyesha kuwa ngozi inaweza kuwa “alama” ya afya ya ndani na ubora wa jeni [1]. Pili, ulinganifu wa uso unaonekana kuvutia zaidi kwa sababu viwango vya juu vya ulinganifu vinapendekeza mtu aliyeepuka magonjwa na vimelea wakati wa kukua, na hivyo kuwa na kinga thabiti na jeni “bora” kupitisha kizazi kijacho [2]. Tatu, taya iliyofafanuliwa—hasa kwa wanaume—inaashiria viwango vya juu vya testosterone vinavyohusishwa na mfumo wa kinga wenye nguvu na uwezo wa uzazi, jambo ambalo wanawake wengi hulitafsiri kama ishara ya virility na nguvu [3]. Hata hivyo, mabadiliko ya kitamaduni yanaweza kubadili “kigezo” kinachopendelewa, kama vile utafiti ulioona ngozi ya giza ikikadiriwa kuvutia zaidi kinyume na matokeo ya zamani, ukionyesha kuwa upendeleo wa uzuri si wa kibiolojia pekee bali pia huathiriwa na maadili ya kijamii yanayobadilika [1].

Title: Facial Symmetry and Attractiveness | The Evolution of Human Sexuality (sites.psu.edu)
Content: The Evolutionary Advantage theory proposed that symmetrical faces are perceived as more attractive because the symmetry indicates good health in an individual. Everyone’s genes are designed to develop a face perfectly symmetrical, but as we grow, develop, and then age, disease, infections, and parasites cause imperfection in our appearance (asymmetry). Thus, those that have less asymmetry and imperfections, are perceived as having better and stronger immune systems to withstand the infections and parasites that occur naturally. So, symmetry is a good indicator of a person having good genes to pass on their offspring.

Content: Taya yenye nguvu inavutia jinsia tofauti

claim: Katika hatua fulani za usingizi uwezo wetu wa kudhibiti joto hupungua, na joto kupita kiasi linaweza kutuamsha, hivyo uso uliowekwa kwenye mto moto unaweza kusababisha usumbufu na kuharibu usingizi
question_src: Kwa nini tunapendelea mito baridi kwa mito ya joto?
report_src: Tunapendelea mito baridi kwa sababu mwili huanza kupunguza joto lake la msingi kwa takriban digrii 1-2 kabla ya usingizi ili kuanzisha hali stahiki ya kulala, hivyo uso na kichwa vinatafuta sehemu baridi ili kusaidia mchakato huu [1]; hali ya chumba inayopendekezwa kwa usingizi ni karibu 65°F (≈18°C), ikionyesha kuwa baridi kwa ujumla huhimizwa kwa usingizi mzito na endelevu [2]. Katika hatua fulani za usingizi uwezo wetu wa kudhibiti joto hupungua, na joto kupita kiasi linaweza kutuamsha, hivyo uso uliowekwa kwenye mto moto unaweza kusababisha usumbufu na kuharibu usingizi [3]. Vilevile, kichwa ni mojawapo ya maeneo yanayopoteza joto haraka, kwa hiyo mto baridi husaidia kuondoa joto la ziada na kulinda mwendelezo wa kupoeza [5]. Ikiwa mwili haupati upoaji huu, joto la juu huelezwa kuongeza “kuwashwa” kwa ubongo na kuchelewesha usingizi, jambo linaloonekana kwa watu wenye usingizi ambao mara nyingi wana joto la juu la msingi kabla ya kulala; kubadilisha mazingira kuwa baridi, ikiwemo kutumia mto baridi, huashiria ubongo kuwa ni wakati wa kitanda [4]. Kwa kifupi, mto baridi hujitokeza kama nyenzo rahisi inayounganisha kibaolojia ya upoaji wa usiku na faraja ya usingizi.
all_claims: Tunapendelea mito baridi kwa sababu mwili huanza kupunguza joto lake la msingi kwa takriban digrii 1-2 kabla ya usingizi ili kuanzisha hali stahiki ya kulala, hivyo uso na kichwa vinatafuta sehemu baridi ili kusaidia mchakato huu [1]; hali ya chumba inayopendekezwa kwa usingizi ni karibu 65°F (≈18°C), ikionyesha kuwa baridi kwa ujumla huhimizwa kwa usingizi mzito na endelevu [2].

Katika hatua fulani za usingizi uwezo wetu wa kudhibiti joto hupungua, na joto kupita kiasi linaweza kutuamsha, hivyo uso uliowekwa kwenye mto moto unaweza kusababisha usumbufu na kuharibu usingizi [3].

question_src: Je! Pikipiki "Wobble" hufanyikaje, na ni ngumu kusahihisha kama inavyoonekana?
report_src: “Wobble” ya pikipiki hutokea mbele ya tairi linapoanza kutikisika kutoka upande hadi upande kwa kasi baada ya kuingia kwenye mtetemo unaojirudia, jambo ambalo hufanya mpanda farasi ashindwe kudhibiti mwelekeo wa ghafla wa pikipiki [1]. Kawaida mtetemo huo huanzishwa na sababu kama gurudumu la mbele kuinuka ghafla wakati wa kuharakisha au kugonga shimo, hivyo kushusha uthabiti wa upinde wa mbele na kuruhusu mikono ya ‘handlebar’ kwenda upande–kwa–upande kama “tank-slapper” [4]. Vipengele vinavyochochea zaidi ni matairi yaliyochakaa, pivoti zilizolegea na upakiaji usio sawa, ambavyo hupunguza uwezo wa mfumo wa kusimamisha kuzuia marudio ya mtetemo [3]. Pia, usambazaji wa uzito uliokithiri nyuma unapunguza mzigo kwa gurudumu la mbele na kufanya upinde huo uwe mwepesi, kitu kinachoongeza nafasi ya wobble utokee katika mwendo wa juu [5]. Kwa kuwa mitetemo hujenga kasi ndani ya sekunde chache na inahusisha nguvu kubwa za tairi na fremu, kuisahihisha ni gumu; dereva mara nyingi hukosa muda wa kurejesha uthabiti kabla pikipiki haijapoteza mwelekeo kabisa [1].

Wakati papa wana hisia kali za harufu, taarifa hii inazidiwa sana. Baadhi ya papa zinaweza kutambua damu umbali wa maili, lakini harufu hiyo huwafikia mara moja au lazima kuwafanya kushambulia.


[Picha: Blue Shark Nostrils]


Papa zina hisia ya kunukia na mfumo wa uhuishaji ambao ni mamia ya mara zaidi ya mwanadamu. Pua zao, ziko chini ya snout zao, hutumiwa tu kwa harufu na sio kwa kupumua. Wana uwezo wa kugundua idadi ndogo ya misombo anuwai kwenye maji. prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Can A Shark Really Smell A Drop Of Blood From A Mile Away? (www.ripleys.com)
Content: Even though there’s just a 1 in 3.7 million chance of being killed by a shark, people are so fearful of the predators that they’ve developed myths about them—such as their ability to smell a tiny drop of blood from miles away.


While sharks do have a strong sense of smell, this statement is largely overblown. Some sharks can identify blood a quarter-mile away, but the scent doesn’t reach them instantaneously or necessarily cause them to attack.


[Image: blue shark nostrils]


Sharks have a heightened sense of smell and olfactory system that is hundreds of times stronger than a human’s. Their nostrils, located beneath their snouts, are used only for smelling and not for breathing. They do have the capacity to detect tiny amounts of various compounds in the water. Some types of sharks, such as the lemon shark, can even detect a scent in a large swimming pool or a substance that is several hundred meters away.


But a shark more than a quarter-mile away won’t smell your blood and decide to make you into a yummy snack. Smells reach a shark through the currents, and it would take time for the scent to travel that distance to a shark’s nostrils. The motion of the ocean carries smell molecules with it, so, the more motion, the faster the smell will travel.


If you do start to bleed while swimming in the ocean, there is some time to get safely to shore in case a rogue shark decides to attack.

Baadhi ya papa, kama vile papa wa limao (Negaprion brevirostris), wanaweza kugundua kiwango kidogo cha damu kwenye maji.


Maana ya harufu ni ya mwelekeo, hii inamaanisha kwamba ikiwa harufu inatoka upande wa kushoto wa papa, papa kwanza hugundua kabisa katika fossa ya kushoto badala ya kulia na inaweza kugundua eneo la chanzo cha harufu.


Inahitajika kusisitiza kuwa ni nyeti sana kwa harufu na inaweza kutofautisha mawindo kutoka kwa papa mwingine na hata kutoka kwa mtangulizi na kujibu kwa njia ya kuamua kwa harufu inayozalishwa na mawindo yaliyojeruhiwa au ya kutisha.

question_src: Je! Moto wa moto hufanyaje kazi?
report_src: Firewall ni kifaa au programu inayochuja trafiki ya mtandao na kuruhusu tu data inayopaswa kufika au kuondoka kulingana na sheria ulizoziweka [1]. Pakiti za TCP ni rahisi kuchujwa kwa kuwa vichwa vyake hubeba anwani za chanzo, marudio na taarifa ya mlolongo, hivyo kurahisisha kulinganishwa na sheria za uchujaji [1], ilhali pakiti za UDP hukaguliwa zaidi kwa nambari za bandari kwa sababu hazina maelezo mengi kwenye vichwa vyake [2]. Kitaaluma, kuna aina tatu kuu: firewalls zisizo na hali (stateless) ambazo hukagua kila pakiti moja kwa moja bila kuzingatia mkondo wa data [3]; firewalls zenye hali (stateful) ambazo hukusanya safu ya pakiti, kutathmini hali ya muunganisho na kisha kutumia sheria, hivyo kuongeza usahihi na ufanisi [4]; na firewalls za kiwango cha programu (application firewalls) ambazo huenda mbali zaidi kwa kuchambua yaliyomo halisi ya data, si vichwa pekee [4].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: How do firewalls work? Firewall technology explained (cybersecurity.att.com)
Content: Firewalls filter network traffic so that you only receive data that you should be getting. No firewall works perfectly, and a lot of a firewall's effectiveness depends on how you configure it.


To get a basic grasp of how firewalls work, it's important to understand how TCP packets work.


The data that your computer sends and receives over the internet or an internal network is comprised of TCP packets and UDP packets. TCP packets can be more effectively filtered by firewalls because they contain more information in their headers.


[Image]


TCP packets contain information such as source and destination addresses, packet sequence information, and payload. That information allows your network interface to deliver data properly, and a firewall can compare that information to the rules you configured it with. For example, all HTTPS data is transmitted through TCP packets. When HTTPS data is sent to your computer through your network interface while you surf the web, your operating system will know that it's data that's supposed to go to your web browser. The same applies if you are surfing the web - on your phone, on your PC, or even on a server machine in your datacenter. With the proliferation of the Internet of Things, you might even be surfing the web from a touchscreen embedded in your refrigerator. Your HTTPS data is used the same way regardless.
---
