question_src: Ikiwa watu wanaweza kujenga kompyuta zao, ni nini kinachowazuia watu kujenga smartphones zao wenyewe?
report_src: Tofauti kuu ni kiwango cha ujumuishaji na upatikanaji wa vipuri; sehemu za PC zimekuwa za “plug-and-play” kwa miongo kadhaa, lakini simu huhitaji vipengele vidogo sana vilivyobuniwa kufanya kazi pamoja kwenye ubao mmoja ulioshonwa kiwanda, na sehemu hizi hazipatikani kirahisi kwa rejareja [2]. Kwa mfano, mtengenezaji binafsi atalazimika kupata chipu za kuhifadhi, prosesa, GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, LTE, kamera mbili, kidhibiti cha USB, betri n.k. kutoka kwa zaidi ya wauzaji 100 tofauti nchini China, jambo linaloongeza gharama na ugumu wa usafirishaji, ubora na *firmware* [2]. Hata ukifanikiwa kupata kila kitu, kifaa kitakuwa kikubwa na chenye nguvu ndogo kuliko simu za sokoni kwa sababu huwezi kufungasha vipuri hivyo kwa uthabiti ule ule wa kiwanda [1]. Hatimaye, redio za simu huhitaji uthibitisho wa kisheria (FCC, CE n.k.), zikitaka zana za majaribio ghali na maarifa ya RF ambayo wahobi wengi hawana. Hivyo, ingawa kiufundi inawezekana—kwa kutumia, tuseme, Raspberry Pi na moduli ya GSM—matokeo huwa mradi mzito wa majaribio badala ya mbadala bora wa iPhone au Galaxy [1].
all_claims: Tofauti kuu ni kiwango cha ujumuishaji na upatikanaji wa vipuri; sehemu za PC zimekuwa za “plug-and-play” kwa miongo kadhaa, lakini simu huhitaji vipengele vidogo sana vilivyobuniwa kufanya kazi pamoja kwenye ubao mmoja ulioshonwa kiwanda, na sehemu hizi hazipatikani kirahisi kwa rejareja [2].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Ndio, unaweza kujenga smartphone yako mwenyewe (www.zdnet.com)
Content: Watu kadhaa wameniuliza ikiwa inawezekana kujenga smartphone nje ya sehemu zinazopatikana kwa urahisi. Kabisa. Haitakuwa nyembamba au yenye nguvu kama moja unayoweza kuchukua, na itabidi ujikusanyie mwenyewe, lakini ni moja wapo ya miradi hiyo ambayo inawezekana sana.


Hapa kuna mfano mmoja uliojengwa karibu na bodi ya Raspberry Pi, na bodi ya Adafruit Fona GSM, kamera ya 5-megapixel, 802.11n Wi-Fi, na onyesho la inchi 3.5. Itabidi ununue karibu kwa sehemu zingine, lakini mara ya mwisho nilionekana wote walikuwa bado wanapatikana.


Sasa, hii inaweza kuwa sio kifaa ambacho unataka kubeba karibu na wewe kama smartphone ya kila siku, lakini ni kitu ambacho unaweza kujumuisha katika mradi mkubwa, kama vile kitovu cha IoT au labda kifaa cha rugged cha matumizi katika gari la barabarani au mashua.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: I want to build my own smartphone (forums.tomsguide.com)
Content: It's probably near impossible to build your own smartphone. It's not just that simple that you need the motherboard, and the processor. There are much more things you need to worry about as well. storage chip, accelerometer, compass, two cameras, radio chip (incorporating GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and cellular), USB controller chip, Micro-USB port, LCD panel, capacitive touchscreen, battery, slider, keyboard, case, etc.... Most of the suppliers are from china. And I don't think you live in China. Even if you live in China, you probably have to contact all the suppliers in china (possibly over 100) to get the individual parts of a smartphone.
---
Document ID: 3
Title: Tengeneza simu yako ya rununu kutoka mwanzo. (www.instructables.com)
Content: Kwa kweli, unaweza kutengeneza simu ya rununu kwa njia ile ile ambayo utafanya kitu kingine chochote: pata sehemu zinazofaa, fikiria jinsi ya kuziunganisha pamoja, na jaribu kuifanya kwa njia ambayo inavutia na nguvu. Kwa sababu ya ubiquity wa simu za rununu, kuna kampuni zinatengeneza vifaa ambavyo vimetengenezwa; Na kuchimba kadhaa, niliweza kupata matoleo ya sehemu hizi ambazo zinawezekana kununua kwa idadi ndogo na ambazo zinawezekana kukusanyika kwa mkono. Hii haikuwa rahisi, lakini ni shida tofauti sana kuliko kujaribu kujifunza fizikia inayohitajika kuelewa jinsi mnara wa rununu unavyofanya kazi
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Yes, you can build your own smartphone (www.zdnet.com)
Content: A number of people have asked me whether it possible to build a smartphone out of easily available parts. Absolutely. It won't be as sleek or as powerful as one you could pick up, and you will have to assemble it yourself, but it's one of those projects that's very doable.


Here's one example built around a Raspberry Pi board, and Adafruit Fona GSM board, a 5-megapixel camera, 802.11n Wi-Fi, and a 3.5-inch display. You'll have to shop around for some of these parts, but the last time I looked they were all still available.


Now, this might not be a device that you want to carry around with you as a daily smartphone, but it's something that you could integrate into a bigger project, such as an IoT hub or maybe a rugged handset for use in an off-road vehicle or boat.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Nataka kujenga smartphone yangu mwenyewe (forums.tomsguide.com)
Content: Labda karibu haiwezekani kujenga smartphone yako mwenyewe. Sio rahisi tu kwamba unahitaji ubao wa mama, na processor. Kuna mambo mengi zaidi unahitaji kuwa na wasiwasi juu yake pia. Chip ya kuhifadhi, kasi, dira, kamera mbili, chip ya redio (ikijumuisha GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, na simu za rununu), Chip ya Mdhibiti wa USB, bandari ndogo ya USB, jopo la LCD, skrini ya kugusa, betri, slider, kibodi, kesi, nk .... wengi wa wauzaji ni kutoka China. Na sidhani kama unaishi China. Hata kama unaishi China, labda lazima uwasiliane na wauzaji wote nchini China (ikiwezekana zaidi ya 100) kupata sehemu za kibinafsi za smartphone.
---

Title: Tengeneza simu yako ya rununu kutoka mwanzo. (www.instructables.com)
Content: Kwa kweli, unaweza kutengeneza simu ya rununu kwa njia ile ile ambayo utafanya kitu kingine chochote: pata sehemu zinazofaa, fikiria jinsi ya kuziunganisha pamoja, na jaribu kuifanya kwa njia ambayo inavutia na nguvu. Kwa sababu ya ubiquity wa simu za rununu, kuna kampuni zinatengeneza vifaa ambavyo vimetengenezwa; Na kuchimba kadhaa, niliweza kupata matoleo ya sehemu hizi ambazo zinawezekana kununua kwa idadi ndogo na ambazo zinawezekana kukusanyika kwa mkono. claim: Wakurdi ni watu wa kabila la Irani wanaoishi asili katika eneo lenye milima la Asia Magharibi linaloitwa Kurdistan, linalojumuisha kusini-mashariki mwa Uturuki, kaskazini-magharibi mwa Iran, kaskazini mwa Iraq na kaskazini mwa Syria
question_src: Watu wa Kikurdi ni nani?
report_src: Wakurdi ni watu wa kabila la Irani wanaoishi asili katika eneo lenye milima la Asia Magharibi linaloitwa Kurdistan, linalojumuisha kusini-mashariki mwa Uturuki, kaskazini-magharibi mwa Iran, kaskazini mwa Iraq na kaskazini mwa Syria [1]. Idadi yao inakadiriwa kuwa kati ya milioni 30 hadi 45, hivyo kuwafanya kuwa miongoni mwa makundi makubwa zaidi bila taifa huru duniani [1]. Mbali na ardhi yao ya jadi, wako pia katikati mwa Anatolia, Khorasan, Caucasus, pamoja na diaspora kubwa katika miji ya Uturuki Magharibi (hasa Istanbul) na Ulaya Magharibi (hasa Ujerumani) [1]. Neno “Kurd” lilipata taswira ya ethnonym baada ya ushindi wa Waislamu dhidi ya Waajemi na polepole likaunganisha makabila mbalimbali ya Kiajemi na Irani chini ya utambulisho mmoja [2]. Wakurdi wengi hujiona kuwa ni wazao wa Wamedi wa kale na hutumia kalenda inayoanzia 612 KK, mwaka ambao Ninawi iliangushwa na Wamedi [3]. Ingawa wengi ni Waislamu wa Sunni, ndani ya jamii hiyo zipo dini nyingine pia, hivyo dini si kipengele chao cha msingi cha utambulisho [4]. Kinachowaunganisha zaidi ni kitambulisho cha kikabila na lugha ya Kikurdi ambavyo vilijidhihirisha tangu Zama za Kati [4].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Je! Ni tofauti gani kati ya agnosticism na kutokuwepo kwa Mungu? (www.worldatlas.com)
Content: Watu wa Agnostic wanaamini kuwa uwepo wa Mungu au kiumbe wa asili haijulikani na zaidi ya sababu ya kibinadamu. Maneno "agnosticism" yalitumiwa kwanza na Thomas Henry Huxley dhidi ya watu wa dini ambao walimshtaki kwa kukemea jukumu la Mungu katika uumbaji wa ulimwengu. Huxley aliunga mkono nadharia za mageuzi na Charles Darwin na hakujiunga na imani za kidini. Aliamini kuwa maumbile yalikuwa tofauti sana kuwa yameundwa na kwamba uteuzi wa asili ulitoa maelezo bora yanayoweza kudhibitishwa na ushahidi. Huxley alidhani kwamba agnosticism ilikuwa kanuni na sio imani. Alisisitiza kwamba ni vibaya kwa mtu kudai jambo ni ukweli dhahiri isipokuwa ushahidi wa kimantiki umetolewa. Neno hilo liliundwa kama mpinzani wa kifungu "Gnosticism," ikimaanisha "maarifa." Gnosticism ilikuwa itikadi ya kidini katika karne ya kwanza na ya pili ambayo ilionyesha kwamba ulimwengu wa nyenzo ulikuwa mbaya wakati ulimwengu wa roho ndio chaguo bora. Ingawa agnosticism haikukusudiwa kuibua swali la ikiwa Mungu yuko au la, ilipata njia ya ulimwengu wa kidini. Huxley alihalalisha msimamo wake kwa kudai kwamba hakukataa au kudhibitisha vifo au mwanadamu na kwa hivyo, hakuona sababu ya kuamini au kupinga uwepo wa Mungu. Alimpa changamoto ya kidini na wasioamini kuwa Mungu ili kudhibitisha au kupinga uwepo wa Mungu.

Document ID: 2
Title: What Does "Agnostic" Mean? (www.psychologytoday.com)
Content: “Maybe there is a God, but maybe not. I’m just not sure. I mean, who can really say?”


If you’ve ever uttered such words or heard someone else utter them, you’re dealing with agnosticism.


“Agnostic” is a label people often use to indicate that they embrace an orientation somewhere between the serene surety of knowing that there is a God and the conviction that there isn’t.


That is, while a theist is someone who believes in God, and an atheist is someone who does not believe in God, an agnostic is someone who isn’t convinced that God exists, but at the same time, can’t be totally sure that God doesn’t exist. And given a lack of knowledge concerning the question of God’s existence – or the lack of any possibility of such knowledge -- an agnostic simply sighs and shrugs, offering an unapologetic “Who knows?” to the whole matter.


In the words of philosopher Julian Baggini, an agnostic “claims we cannot know whether God exists and so the only rational option is to reserve judgment.”
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: What Is The Difference Between Agnosticism And Atheism? (www.worldatlas.com)
Content: Agnostic people believe that the existence of God or a supernatural being is unknown and beyond human reason. The phrase “agnosticism” was first used by Thomas Henry Huxley against religious people who accused him of denouncing the role of God in the creation of the universe. Huxley supported the theories of evolution by Charles Darwin and did not subscribe to religious beliefs. He believed that nature was too diverse to have been created and that natural selection provided a better explanation provable by evidence. Huxley thought that agnosticism was a principle and not a belief. He reiterated that it is wrong for one to claim a phenomenon is a definite truth unless logical evidence is provided. The word was coined as the antagonist of the phrase “Gnosticism,” meaning “knowledge.” Gnosticism was a religious ideology in the first and second centuries that suggested that the material world was ungodly while the spirit world was the better choice. Although agnosticism was not intended to raise the question of whether God exists or not, it found its way to the religious world. Huxley justified his stand by claiming that he did not deny or affirm the mortality or human and therefore, did not see the reason to believe or disprove the existence of God. He challenged the religious and atheists to prove or disprove the presence of God.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Je! "Agnostic" inamaanisha nini? (www.psychologytoday.com)
Content: "Labda kuna Mungu, lakini labda sivyo. Sina uhakika. Namaanisha, ni nani anayeweza kusema kweli?"


Ikiwa umewahi kusema maneno kama haya au kusikia mtu mwingine akisema, unashughulika na agnosticism.


"Agnostic" ni lebo ambayo watu hutumia mara nyingi kuashiria kuwa wanakumbatia mwelekeo mahali fulani kati ya dhamana ya kujua kwamba kuna Mungu na imani kwamba hakuna.


Hiyo ni, wakati theist ni mtu anayemwamini Mungu, na mtu asiyeamini kuwa Mungu ni mtu ambaye haamini katika Mungu, mtu asiye na imani ni mtu ambaye haamini kuwa Mungu yuko, lakini wakati huo huo, hawezi kuwa na uhakika kabisa kuwa Mungu hayupo. Na ukizingatia ukosefu wa maarifa juu ya swali la uwepo wa Mungu - au ukosefu wa uwezekano wowote wa maarifa kama hayo - mtu anayeweza kuugua tu na kunasa, akitoa "anajua" nani? " kwa jambo zima.


Kwa maneno ya mwanafalsafa Julian Baggini, agnostic "anadai hatuwezi kujua ikiwa Mungu yuko na kwa hivyo chaguo la busara ni kuhifadhi hukumu."

Title: Mawe ya Salivary (www.hopkinsmedicine.org)
Content: Sababu haijulikani, lakini sababu kadhaa zinahusishwa na malezi ya jiwe la mshono:

---
Document ID: 3
Title: Mawe ya tezi ya tezi: Dalili, sababu, na matibabu (www.webmd.com)
Content: Jiwe la tezi ya tezi - pia huitwa jiwe la duct ya mshono - ni muundo uliowekwa ambao unaweza kuunda ndani ya tezi ya mshono au duct. Inaweza kuzuia mtiririko wa mshono kinywani.


Mawe mengi huathiri tezi ndogo ndogo ziko kwenye sakafu ya mdomo. Chini ya kawaida, mawe huathiri tezi za parotid, ziko ndani ya mashavu, au tezi za chini, ambazo ziko chini ya ulimi. Watu wengi walio na hali hiyo wana mawe mengi.
---
Document ID: 4
Title: Salivary Gland Stones: Symptoms, Causes, and Treatment (www.webmd.com)
Content: Salivary stones form when chemicals in the saliva accumulate in the duct or gland. They mostly contain calcium. The exact cause is not known. But factors contributing to less saliva production and/or thickened saliva may be risk factors for salivary stones. These factors include: dehydration, poor eating, and use of certain medications including some antihistamines, blood pressure drugs, psychiatric drugs, and bladder control drugs. Trauma to the salivary glands may also raise the risk for salivary stones.
---
Document ID: 5
Title: Mawe ya Salivary: Dalili, sababu, na jinsi ya kuwaondoa (www.medicalnewsstoday.com)
Content: Mawe ya mshono ni mara chache mbaya, na mtu mara nyingi anaweza kuwatibu nyumbani.


Tiba za nyumbani kwa kuondoa mawe ya mshono ni pamoja na:


* Kunyonya matunda ya machungwa au pipi ngumu. Kunyonya kwenye kabari ya limao au machungwa huongeza mtiririko wa mshono, ambayo inaweza kusaidia kutengua jiwe. Mtu anaweza pia kujaribu kunyonya fizi isiyo na sukari au pipi ngumu, tamu, kama matone ya limao.
* Kunywa maji mengi. Ulaji wa maji ya kawaida husaidia kuweka mdomo kuwa na maji na inaweza kuongeza mtiririko wa mshono.
* Upole massage. Kuweka kwa upole eneo lililoathiriwa linaweza kupunguza maumivu na kutia moyo jiwe kupita kwenye duct ya mshono. Shirika la Sjogren's Syndrome lina mwongozo ulioonyeshwa juu ya jinsi ya kufanya hivyo kwenye wavuti yao.
* Dawa. Dawa zingine za kukabiliana na, kama vile ibuprofen na acetaminophen, zinaweza kusaidia kupunguza maumivu na uvimbe.
* Kunyonya kwenye cubes za barafu. Kunyonya kitu baridi, kama mchemraba wa barafu au barafu ya barafu, pia inaweza kusaidia kupunguza maumivu na uvimbe unaotokana na mawe ya mshono.

Title: Salivary Gland Stones: Symptoms, Causes, and Treatment (www.webmd.com)
Content: A salivary gland stone -- also called salivary duct stone -- is a calcified structure that may form inside a salivary gland or duct. It can block the flow of saliva into the mouth.


The majority of stones affect the submandibular glands located at the floor of the mouth. Less commonly, the stones affect the parotid glands, located on the inside of the cheeks, or the sublingual glands, which are under the tongue. Many people with the condition have multiple stones.

* Dawa. Dawa zingine za kukabiliana na, kama vile ibuprofen na acetaminophen, zinaweza kusaidia kupunguza maumivu na uvimbe.
* Kunyonya kwenye cubes za barafu. Kunyonya kitu baridi, kama mchemraba wa barafu au barafu ya barafu, pia inaweza kusaidia kupunguza maumivu na uvimbe unaotokana na mawe ya mshono.

Document ID: 5
Title: Salivary stones: Symptoms, causes, and how to get rid of them (www.medicalnewstoday.com)
Content: Salivary stones are rarely serious, and a person can often treat them at home.


Home remedies for getting rid of salivary stones include:


* Sucking on citrus fruits or hard candies. Sucking on a wedge of lemon or orange increases the flow of saliva, which can help dislodge the stone. A person can also try sucking on sugar-free gum or hard, sour candies, such as lemon drops.
* Drinking plenty of fluids. Regular fluid intake helps keep the mouth hydrated and can increase saliva flow.
* Gentle massage. Gently massaging the affected area may relieve pain and encourage the stone to pass through the salivary duct. The Sjogren’s Syndrome Foundation have an illustrated guide on how to do this on their website.
* Medications. Some over-the-counter drugs, such as ibuprofen and acetaminophen, can help relieve pain and swelling.
* Sucking on ice cubes. Sucking on something cold, such as an ice cube or ice pop, may also help reduce pain and swelling resulting from salivary stones.

question_src: Je! Watu ambao husikia kwa mara ya kwanza, baada ya kitu kama kupata viingilio vya kusikia, wanajua watu wengine wanasema nini?
report_src: Mara kipandikizi cha cochlear kinapowashwa, ubongo hupokea ishara za kielektroniki ambazo “hazitakuwa kama kusikia kawaida,” hivyo mtu hawezi mara moja kutambua au kuelewa maneno ya wengine [2]. Kuelewa hotuba kunahitaji muda na mafunzo maalum; wagonjwa hupitia tiba ya hotuba na ukarabati ili kujifunza kutafsiri sauti hizo ipasavyo [3]. Kipindi hiki cha mafunzo kinaweza kudumu kati ya mwaka mmoja hadi hadi miaka 12, kutegemea umri ambao mtu alipata implanti na masuala mengine ya kibinafsi—mwandishi mmoja alianza katika mwaka wa 11 [1]. Ndani ya mwaka wa kwanza wa matumizi, watu wengi wenye vipandikizi vya cochlear hupata “faida kubwa katika kuelewa hotuba,” lakini mafanikio hutofautiana [2]. Hata hivyo, baadhi ya watumiaji hawatawahi kusikia au kuongea kama watu waliozaliwa wanasikia kwa sababu za kipekee za kibaiolojia na mazingira; hivyo, uelewa kamili wa kile watu wengine wanasema si hakikisho kwa kila mtu [1]. Kwa kifupi, kusikia si swichi ya kuwasha, bali ni mchakato wa kujifunza unaohitaji muda na juhudi kabla ya kuelewa hotuba kikamilifu.

Title: Je! Ni nini kwa mtu viziwi kusikia kwa mara ya kwanza? (slate.com)
Content: Watoto wengi watahitaji angalau tiba fulani ya hotuba, kulingana na umri gani walipokea implants zao. Wakati wa mafunzo huanzia mwaka hadi 12 (niliingia saa 11) na hutofautiana katika suala la nguvu. Wanapojifunza jinsi ya kusikiliza, akili zao zinafanya kuinua nzito kwa kuchoma njia mpya za neural. Document ID: 2
Title: Cochlear implants - Mayo Clinic (www.mayoclinic.org)
Content: Cochlear implants use a sound processor that fits behind the ear. The processor captures sound signals and sends them to a receiver implanted under the skin behind the ear. The receiver sends the signals to electrodes implanted in the snail-shaped inner ear (cochlea).


The signals stimulate the auditory nerve, which then directs them to the brain. The brain interprets those signals as sounds, though these sounds won't be just like normal hearing.


It takes time and training to learn to interpret the signals received from a cochlear implant. Within a year of use, most people with cochlear implants make considerable gains in understanding speech.
---

Kipindi hiki cha mafunzo kinaweza kudumu kati ya mwaka mmoja hadi hadi miaka 12, kutegemea umri ambao mtu alipata implanti na masuala mengine ya kibinafsi—mwandishi mmoja alianza katika mwaka wa 11 [1].
Ndani ya mwaka wa kwanza wa matumizi, watu wengi wenye vipandikizi vya cochlear hupata “faida kubwa katika kuelewa hotuba,” lakini mafanikio hutofautiana [2].

Hata hivyo, baadhi ya watumiaji hawatawahi kusikia au kuongea kama watu waliozaliwa wanasikia kwa sababu za kipekee za kibaiolojia na mazingira; hivyo, uelewa kamili wa kile watu wengine wanasema si hakikisho kwa kila mtu [1].
Kwa kifupi, kusikia si swichi ya kuwasha, bali ni mchakato wa kujifunza unaohitaji muda na juhudi kabla ya kuelewa hotuba kikamilifu.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: What’s It Like for a Deaf Person to Hear for the First Time? (slate.com)
Content: Most children will require at least some speech therapy, depending what age they received their implants. Training time ranges from a year to 12 (I clocked in at 11) and varies in terms of intensity. As they learn how to listen, their brains are doing heavy lifting by burning new neural pathways. Some of them will never listen or speak like someone born hearing due to various factors out of people’s control.


Hearing—or, rather, the perception of it—isn’t a light switch you flip on and off. It’s serious business.

Document ID: 2
Title: Vipandikizi vya Cochlear - Kliniki ya Mayo (www.mayoclinic.org)
Content: Vipandikizi vya cochlear hutumia processor ya sauti inayofaa nyuma ya sikio. Processor inachukua ishara za sauti na kuzituma kwa mpokeaji aliyeingizwa chini ya ngozi nyuma ya sikio. Mpokeaji hutuma ishara kwa elektroni zilizoingizwa kwenye sikio la ndani la konokono (cochlea).


Ishara huchochea ujasiri wa ukaguzi, ambao huwaelekeza kwa ubongo. Ubongo hutafsiri ishara hizo kama sauti, ingawa sauti hizi hazitakuwa kama kusikia kawaida.


Inachukua muda na mafunzo kujifunza kutafsiri ishara zilizopokelewa kutoka kwa kuingiza cochlear. Katika mwaka wa matumizi, watu wengi walio na implants cochlear hufanya faida kubwa katika kuelewa hotuba.

Athari hizi za kiteknolojia na mafunzo zilisababisha mwangwi unaofanana katika filamu na rekodi zote za enzi hiyo, na ndipo wasikilizaji wa leo hushuhudia “lafudhi ya zamani.” Baada ya Vita ya Pili ya Dunia, kozi hizi za matamshi zilipoteza umaarufu na lafudhi hiyo “ya kifahari” ikaangamia hata miongoni mwa tabaka la juu la Marekani, ndiyo maana haitasikika tena kwenye rekodi mpya [4].

report_src: Kutupa takataka kwenye lava si wazo zuri kwa sababu, kwanza, si kila kitu kingezama na kuyeyuka; aina nyingi za plastiki, mpira na vitambaa huweza kuelea juu ya lava yenye mnato, hivyo kubaki zikichoma na kutoa mafusho hatari [1]. Title: Kwa nini hatuwezi kutupa takataka zetu zote kwenye volkano? (www.scienceabc.com)
Content: Maziwa ya lava ni ngumu sana na maajabu yasiyotabirika ya maumbile. Kwa kuwa moto sana, wanaweza kuyeyuka vitu vingi, lakini sio kila kitu. Kuna maelfu ya aina ya plastiki, mpira, vitambaa na vifaa vingine ambavyo vinaweza kuelea juu ya lava ya viscous, badala ya kuzama ndani ya utupu wa joto.


[Picha: lava_lake_nyiragongo]


Ziwa la Lava linalotumika (Mikopo ya Picha: Cai Tjeenk Willink /Wikimedia Commons)


Pili, maziwa ya lava sio ya kina kabisa. Takataka yote ambayo iliyeyuka ingelazimika kuishia mahali, na wakati wengi wake wanaweza kutoweka kwa moshi wa moshi na mvuke - moshi unaotokana na uharibifu huo ungekuwa mbaya sana kupumua au kutuma kwenye anga.


Kwa kutisha na kuwa na hasira kama maziwa ya lava, kwa kweli, yana kiwango cha laini, na mara nyingi huwa kwenye harakati za juu na nje ya barabara, kwa sababu ya shinikizo kubwa za kujenga ndani.

Document ID: 2
Title: Why we can't dump all our trash into volcanoes? (www.scienceabc.com)
Content: Lava lakes are unstable beneath their semi-solid, comparatively cool upper layer. If you pierce their surfaces with a relatively cold object, like a piece of trash, the sudden transfer of heat could trigger a chain reaction of explosions. The upper layer starts melting down, releasing pressurized acidic steam and fumes from the vaporized trash. A single tin can might serve as a trigger to start this chain reaction and invoke the wrath of the previously stagnant lava lake!


[Image: Related image]


A chain reaction in action ( https://africageographic.com/blog/hot-as-hell-at-erta-ale/)


Now, imagine the impact of throwing an entire nation’s garbage in a volcano… unimaginably destructive chain reactions would begin. To put this in perspective, minute rockfalls into lava lakes of Hawaiian volcanoes have forced lava more than 85 m (280 feet) into the air. The scenario with tons of garbage would be far more treacherous and perilous for anyone working on the garbage-disposal task.

Kuna idadi ya stratovolcanoes iliyotawanyika duniani, lakini wanajulikana kwa asili yao ya kulipuka. Kwa hivyo, kwa kweli sio mahali pa kutupa.


[Picha]


Mikopo-kitropiki-helicopters

Shida kubwa zaidi ni kwamba hakuna volkeno nyingi za kazi ulimwenguni; Kuna volkano 1500 tu zinazoweza kutumika ulimwenguni. Wakati nchi nyingi hazina volkano yoyote, shida kwa nchi hizo bado ingeendelea.

Title: Kwa nini hatuwezi kutupa takataka zetu zote kwenye volkano? (www.scienceabc.com)
Content: Maziwa ya Lava hayana msimamo chini ya safu yao ya nusu-laini, kulinganisha safu ya juu ya baridi. Ikiwa utatoboa nyuso zao na kitu baridi, kama kipande cha takataka, uhamishaji wa ghafla wa joto unaweza kusababisha athari ya mnyororo wa milipuko. Safu ya juu huanza kuyeyuka, ikitoa mvuke wa asidi ya shinikizo na mafusho kutoka kwa takataka ya mvuke. Bati moja inaweza kutumika kama trigger kuanza athari hii ya mnyororo na kuvuta ghadhabu ya Ziwa la Lava lililokuwa limetulia hapo awali!


[Picha: picha inayohusiana]


Mmenyuko wa mnyororo katika hatua (https://africageographic.com/blog/hot-as-hell-at-erta-ale/)


Sasa, fikiria athari ya kutupa takataka za taifa zima kwenye volkano… athari za uharibifu zisizo na maana zinaweza kuanza. Kuweka maoni haya, milango ya dakika kwenye maziwa ya Lava ya volkeno za Hawaii imelazimisha lava zaidi ya mita 85 (280) hewani. Hali hiyo iliyo na tani za takataka itakuwa ya wasaliti zaidi na hatari kwa mtu yeyote anayefanya kazi kwenye kazi ya kutuliza takataka.

Document ID: 3
Title: Garbage into volcanoes: How safe is it to dump rubbish into volcanoes? (www.scientificmystery.com)
Content: There are three types of volcanoes – strato, shield, and dome. Out of these, an ideal volcano to dump the trash would be a shield volcano. It is low profile lava, i.e. it has a slow eruption, with lave slowly spewing out onto the earth. However, the numbers of them are not very common. There are only 600 shield volcanoes, with most of them being inactive. There is the number of stratovolcanoes scattered on the earth, but they are known for their explosive nature. Thus, they are definitely not the spot for the dump.


[Image]


Credit-Tropical-Helicopters


Above all, disposing the trash into the lava would be a very expensive method. We have to have the endless stream of trucks traveling to the nearest active volcano to dispose of the trash. An even bigger problem is that there are not as many active volcanoes in the world; there are only 1500 potentially active volcanoes worldwide. When most of the countries don’t have any active volcano, the problem for those countries would still persist.

Title: Garbage into volcanoes: How safe is it to dump rubbish into volcanoes? (www.scientificmystery.com)
Content: There are three types of volcanoes – strato, shield, and dome. Out of these, an ideal volcano to dump the trash would be a shield volcano. It is low profile lava, i.e. it has a slow eruption, with lave slowly spewing out onto the earth. However, the numbers of them are not very common. There are only 600 shield volcanoes, with most of them being inactive. There is the number of stratovolcanoes scattered on the earth, but they are known for their explosive nature. Thus, they are definitely not the spot for the dump.


[Image]


Credit-Tropical-Helicopters


Above all, disposing the trash into the lava would be a very expensive method. We have to have the endless stream of trucks traveling to the nearest active volcano to dispose of the trash. An even bigger problem is that there are not as many active volcanoes in the world; there are only 1500 potentially active volcanoes worldwide. When most of the countries don’t have any active volcano, the problem for those countries would still persist.

Katika Windows, faili muhimu za Msajili zikiharibika, mfumo hupoteza maelekezo ya msingi ya uendeshaji na unaweza kujizima au kuanzisha upya bila onyo [2]. Programu hasidi kama virusi au adware inaweza kufunga au kubadilisha huduma muhimu, na hivyo kuibua skrini ya bluu ya kifo (BSOD) [5]. Ukiishiwa kabisa RAM, OS haiwezi kuweka data mpya, na huchagua kusitisha mfumo ili kuepusha rushwa ya kumbukumbu [6]. Title: 5 Benefits of Changing Your Air Filter (www.carsdirect.com)
Content: One of the biggest reasons to change your air filter regularly. Some studies indicate that replacing a dirty air filter increases fuel mileage on older, carburated cars by as much as 14 percent if the filter is so dirty it affects driveability. In addition, changing a clogged air filter can potentially increase acceleration by 6 to 11 percent on modern fuel-injected cars. Other studies claim a 10 percent increase in gas mileage and up to 15¢ per gallon fuel savings. Regardless of the exact figures, it is obvious that a clean air filter improves air flow to the engine and increases engine performance and gas mileage.

Document ID: 2
Title: Tobacco and Cancer | CDC (www.cdc.gov)
Content: Tobacco smoke has at least 70 chemicals that cause cancer, also known as carcinogens. Every time you breathe in that smoke, those chemicals get into your bloodstream, which carries the chemicals to all parts of your body. Many of these chemicals can damage your DNA, which controls how your body makes new cells and directs each kind of cell to do what it is made for. Damaged DNA can make cells grow differently from how they are supposed to. These unusual cells can turn into cancer.

Title: UTIs and urinating after sexual intercourse: What is the link? (www.medicalnewstoday.com)
Content: Experts debate whether urinating after sex helps prevent UTIs.


Many health authorities, including the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), recommend urinating after sex to prevent UTIs. Doing so may help flush away bacteria that are close to the urethra and prevent them from entering the urinary tract.


However, research published in a 2016 edition of American Family Physician suggests that urinating after sex does not have any measurable protective effects. Still, the researchers note, it is a safe and reasonable thing to do.

Document ID: 4
Title: Basic Biomechanics: Levers (www.aaronswansonpt.com)
Content: ## Mechanical Advantage in Biomechanics

It may seem confusing that most of the muscles in the human body are 3rd class levers, since these levers are at a mechanical disadvantage in terms of effort versus load. However, this only holds true in terms of resistance. The opposite is true when you consider the distal lever displacement. A small arc of motion proximally at the muscle insertion will create large angular displacement and velocity distally. Since most human movement is aimed at maximizing angular displacement of a distal segment through space, the use of 3rd class levers for is very efficient.

This creates a relationship between the lever arm distance, distal angular displacement/velocity, and torque production. The shorter the lever arm of the effort force (decreased mechanical advantage), the greater angular displacement and angular velocity of the distal end of the lever for a given arc of displacement of the effort force. The larger the lever arm of the effort force (increased mechanical advantage), the increased torque production.

This lever arm and force/torque production relationship needs to be taken into consideration when assessing movement and prescribing interventions. For example, applying a 5 pound weight at the distal end of a lever during a scaption/SLR exercise creates a mechanical disadvantage for the supraspinatus/illiopsoas. This results in the muscle being overloaded in attempt to create the amount of torque necessary for the distal angular displacement.

Title: Levers work to create movement in the human body (us.humankinetics.com)
Content: Bones, ligaments, and muscles are the structures that form levers in the body to create human movement. In simple terms, a joint (where two or more bones join together) forms the axis (or fulcrum), and the muscles crossing the joint apply the force to move a weight or resistance. Levers are typically labeled as first class, second class, or third class. All three types are found in the body, but most levers in the human body are third class.

Document ID: 4
Title: Biomechanics ya msingi: Levers (www.aarononwansonpt.com)
Content: ## Manufaa ya mitambo katika biomechanics

Inaweza kuonekana kuwa ya kutatanisha kuwa misuli mingi kwenye mwili wa mwanadamu ni levers darasa la tatu, kwani levers hizi ziko kwenye shida ya mitambo katika suala la juhudi dhidi ya mzigo. Walakini, hii inashikilia kweli katika suala la upinzani. Kinyume chake ni kweli wakati unazingatia uhamishaji wa lever ya distal. Arc ndogo ya mwendo haswa kwenye kuingizwa kwa misuli itaunda uhamishaji mkubwa wa angular na kasi ya mbali. Kwa kuwa harakati nyingi za wanadamu zinalenga kuongeza uhamishaji wa angular wa sehemu ya mbali kupitia nafasi, utumiaji wa levers za darasa la 3 ni mzuri sana.

Hii inaunda uhusiano kati ya umbali wa mkono wa lever, uhamishaji wa angular/kasi, na uzalishaji wa torque. Mfupi wa mkono wa nguvu ya nguvu ya juhudi (ilipungua faida ya mitambo), uhamishaji mkubwa wa angular na kasi ya angular ya mwisho wa distal wa lever kwa arc fulani ya kuhamishwa kwa nguvu ya juhudi. Mkono mkubwa wa nguvu ya nguvu ya juhudi (kuongezeka kwa faida ya mitambo), uzalishaji ulioongezeka wa torque.

Urafiki huu wa mkono na nguvu/uhusiano wa uzalishaji wa torque unahitaji kuzingatiwa wakati wa kukagua harakati na kuagiza uingiliaji. Kwa mfano, kutumia uzito wa pauni 5 mwisho wa distal wa lever wakati wa mazoezi ya scaption/SLR huunda shida ya mitambo kwa supraspinatus/illiopsoas. Hii inasababisha misuli kuwa imejaa kupita kiasi kujaribu kuunda kiwango cha torque muhimu kwa uhamishaji wa angular wa distal.
---

claim: Hesabu muhimu (ujumuishaji) ni mojawapo ya matawi mawili makuu ya hesabu, lingine likiwa hesabu tofauti
question_src: Fafanua: hesabu muhimu
report_src: Hesabu muhimu (ujumuishaji) ni mojawapo ya matawi mawili makuu ya hesabu, lingine likiwa hesabu tofauti [1]. Tofauti na hesabu ya kutofautisha inayopima kasi ya mabadiliko, hesabu muhimu hushughulikia jumla ya ukubwa au thamani ya kipimo, ikitoa thamani halisi ya kazi kati ya pointi mbili na hivyo kutumika kupata urefu, maeneo na kiasi [2]. Kiini chake ni kujumlisha vipande vidogo visivyo na kikomo ili kupata jumla endelevu; kielelezo maarufu ni kuhesabu eneo chini ya curve ya kazi ya kihesabu, ambalo ndilo linaloanzisha dhana ya ujumuishaji wa msingi [1]. Kutoka wazo hili mbinu hizo huendelezwa kupata maeneo ya sehemu zisizo kawaida, ujazo wa miili ya mzunguko, na hata vidokezo vya kati vya massa au msongamano [3]. Uwezo wa kubadilisha jumla hizi kuwa taarifa sahihi hufanya hesabu muhimu kuwa chombo muhimu katika fizikia na uhandisi, mahali ambako inahitajika kutathmini nishati, kazi au mtiririko katika mifumo tata [1].

Title: What Is Integral Calculus? (with pictures) (www.wise-geek.com)
Content: Integral calculus, also known as integration, is one of the two branches of calculus, with the other being differentiation. Differentiation describes how the value of a function changes with respect to its variables. Integration is the inverse, in that it gives the exact summation of a function between two values. Integral calculus provides an exact means of calculating the area under the curve of a mathematical function. Integration has a wide range of applications in physics and engineering.

claim: Google Fiber ni huduma ya intaneti ya kasi kubwa inayotumia nyuzi-macho (FTTH) iliyoanzishwa na Google mwaka 2010, ikitoa hadi 1,000 Mbps na malipo ya kila mwezi bila mkataba wa muda mrefu
question_src: Je! Ni nini Google Fibre na itakua nje ya Amerika?
report_src: Google Fiber ni huduma ya intaneti ya kasi kubwa inayotumia nyuzi-macho (FTTH) iliyoanzishwa na Google mwaka 2010, ikitoa hadi 1,000 Mbps na malipo ya kila mwezi bila mkataba wa muda mrefu [1]. Huduma hii kwa sasa inapatikana tu Marekani kwenye takriban miji 18 kama Atlanta, Austin, Denver, San Francisco na Seattle [1]. Google ilisitisha upanuzi mkubwa mwaka 2016, ikipunguza au kusitisha shughuli katika baadhi ya maeneo na kukata nafasi nyingi za kazi zinazohusiana na mradi huo [2]. Tangu hapo imeongeza mji mmoja tu—West Des Moines, Iowa—na hata huko ujenzi unatarajiwa kuchukua miaka kadhaa kukamilika [1]. Linapokuja suala la upanuzi wa kimataifa, kampuni imeeleza wazi kwamba “kwa wakati huu hatuna mipango ya kupanua Google Fiber kimataifa,” hivyo hakuna tarehe wala mpango wa kuipeleka nje ya Marekani, vikiwemo Uingereza na masoko mengine [3].
all_claims: Google Fiber ni huduma ya intaneti ya kasi kubwa inayotumia nyuzi-macho (FTTH) iliyoanzishwa na Google mwaka 2010, ikitoa hadi 1,000 Mbps na malipo ya kila mwezi bila mkataba wa muda mrefu [1].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: 'What is Google Fiber?': Everything you need to know about Google's high-speed internet service (www.businessinsider.com)
Content: Google Fiber is a broadband internet service that Google is currently deploying in 18 cities across the US.
* The service is notable because of its high speed, running up to 1000 Mbps, with a friendly month-to-month, all-inclusive pricing scheme.
* Despite the initial promise of the network, Google has paused expansion of Fiber beyond its current 18 cities, and notably pulled Fiber out of several cities where it attempted to deploy the service.
* Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories.


Google Fiber is Google's fiber optic-based broadband internet service, which debuted in 2010. It's built to deliver high-speed connectivity to businesses and individuals in select cities.


At least, that was the goal. While it once appeared that Google intended to roll out Google Fiber across the entire US, the company "paused" most of its expansion plans, adding only one new city in the last four years — they announced in July 2020 that Fiber would be coming to West Des Moines, IA, but it won't be ready for several years.


Currently, Google Fiber services are available in 18 locations across the country.


## Where Google Fiber currently operates


[Image]


You can visit the Google Fiber website to check its availability and sign up for the service. Dave Johnson/Business Insider


The service is currently operating or rolling out operations in 18 cities, including Atlanta, Georgia; Austin, Texas; Charlotte, North Carolina; Chicago, Illinois; Denver, Colorado; San Francisco, California; and Seattle, Washington.
---

Content: Fiber ya Google inazingatia sana maeneo ya mijini ambapo kanuni zilizopo za nyuzi na jiji hufanya iwezekanavyo kufunga FTTH (nyuzi hadi nyumbani) haraka. Mradi wa Google Fiber umekuwa ukiwa umeshikilia tangu mwaka wa 2016, wakati kampuni ilipoacha kupanua na kuripotiwa kukata kazi nyingi zinazohusiana na mradi huo.

Document ID: 3
Title: What is a Gerund? Definition, Examples of Gerunds (writingexplained.org)
Content: Gerund definition: A gerund is a noun formed from a verb. A gerund will always contain the ending “-ing.”


What are gerunds? Any verb ending in “-ing” and used as a noun is a gerund.


Examples of Gerunds:


Verb/Gerund


* to run/running
* I run every day. / I like running.


In the first sentence, “run” is used as a verb. I am “doing” the action “to run.” In the second sentence, “running” is used as a gerund (noun) and “like” is the verb.


* to sing/singing
* Sara sings. Singing makes Sara happy.


In the first sentence, “sings” is used as a verb. Sara is “doing” the action “to sing.” In the second sentence, “singing” is used as a gerund and “makes” is the verb.


Note: A gerund will always be used as a noun and does not replace the progressive form of the verb.
---

question_src: Je! Ni kwanini nchi kama Iran na Saudi Arabia zinaonekana kuwa hazina wasiwasi (au vinginevyo hazina wasiwasi sana) na kushuka kwa bei ya hivi karibuni kwa bei ya mafuta, lakini uchumi wa Venezuela haraka unakuwa moja mbaya zaidi ulimwenguni, kwa sababu ya kushuka kwa mafuta?
report_src: Venezuela inategemea sana mafuta, kwani zaidi ya 90 % ya mapato yake ya usafirishaji hutoka kwenye sekta hii, hivyo mapato yanatarajiwa kushuka hadi chini ya dola bilioni 8 mwaka 2020 kutoka bilioni 25 mwaka 2019, jambo linalokata nusu ya fedha za serikali na kuufanya uchumi ulegee haraka pindi bei zinapodidimia [2]; hali hii inazidishwa na vikwazo vya Marekani, kuporomoka kwa sarafu na janga la COVID-19 [1]. Kinyume chake, Saudi Arabia ina akiba kubwa na gharama za chini za uchimbaji, na inatarajia kuongeza uzalishaji hadi mapipa milioni 10 kwa siku mwishoni mwa 2021 ili kunufaika na mahitaji yanayorejea, hatua inayochochea utabiri wa ukuaji wa Pato la Taifa kwa 4.5 % mwaka 2021 [3]. Mashariki ya Kati kwa jumla, ikiwemo Iran na Saudi Arabia, inashikilia takriban 48 % ya akiba ya mafuta yasiyosafishwa duniani na 27 % ya uzalishaji wa sasa wa kimataifa, hivyo ina uwezo mkubwa wa kuongeza au kupunguza uzalishaji na kupata mapato hata bei zikishuka [5]. Uwezo huu wa kuzalisha kwa wingi na akiba ya fedha za kigeni hufanya nchi hizi ziwe na mshtuko mdogo wa bei ikilinganishwa na Venezuela, ambayo haina rasilimali mbadala wala hifadhi za fedha.

Uwezo huu wa kuzalisha kwa wingi na akiba ya fedha za kigeni hufanya nchi hizi ziwe na mshtuko mdogo wa bei ikilinganishwa na Venezuela, ambayo haina rasilimali mbadala wala hifadhi za fedha.
claims_retained: Venezuela inategemea sana mafuta, kwani zaidi ya 90 % ya mapato yake ya usafirishaji hutoka kwenye sekta hii, hivyo mapato yanatarajiwa kushuka hadi chini ya dola bilioni 8 mwaka 2020 kutoka bilioni 25 mwaka 2019, jambo linalokata nusu ya fedha za serikali na kuufanya uchumi ulegee haraka pindi bei zinapodidimia [2]; hali hii inazidishwa na vikwazo vya Marekani, kuporomoka kwa sarafu na janga la COVID-19 [1].

Title: Saudi Arabia ya kuongeza uzalishaji wa mafuta hadi milioni 10 bpd kadiri bei inavyoongezeka (Oilprice.com)

Title: Kwa nini Mashariki ya Kati ina mafuta mengi? - fossilfuel.com (fossilfuel.com)

Walakini, nchi hizi zina karibu asilimia 38 ya akiba ya jumla ya gesi asilia ulimwenguni na asilimia 48 ya akiba inayojulikana ya mafuta yasiyosafishwa (Sorkhabi, 2010). Kwa muda mrefu kama mafuta ya mafuta yamekuwa chanzo cha msingi cha nishati ya ulimwengu, Mashariki ya Kati imekuwa moja ya wauzaji wa mafuta na gesi ulimwenguni. Kwa sababu ya uwezo wa mkoa wa kutengeneza na kuuza idadi kubwa ya mafuta na gesi, maendeleo ya uchumi katika Mashariki ya Kati yamechochewa sana na tasnia ya mafuta.
